Vbvrikunamv Abraham lokv Dabid lobv singtam vring gola api go, okv Dabid lokv Bebilon lo nyirabv rila doonam lobv vring gola api singtam go okv hokv naalaikula Jisu Kristonyi bvngnam lobv singtam vring gola api gobv ritoku.
Jisu Kristonyi svbvching mooku so dwrwboklin toku. Ninyigv anv Merinyi Josep gvlo minggag jitoku, vbvritola bunyiv nywng nyilubv rila dooba sutv madvbv hv Darwknv Dow lokv anga go dootvdu vla chinsu toku.
Josep tarwkbaknv nyi go, vkvlvgabv Merinyi nyi vdwgv kaagialo hinying momare mvngla, mingak minsu nama atubongv kayu dukubv rungtoku.
Ho lvkwngbv ninyigv vbv mvngdung rilo, Ahtu gv nyidogindung ako yumalo aala ninyia mintoku, “Josep, Dabid gv husi, Merinyi no gv nywngbv naase nga busu mabvka. Ninyigv kuugvnam v Darwknv Dow lokv gvdunv.
Nw kuunyilo ako bvngri, okv no hum Jisu vla amin minre—ogulvgavbolo hv ninyigv nyi vdwa bunugv rimur loka ringlin reku.”
Vjak so mvnwng si ridu Pwknvyarnv gv kvvlo nyijwk vdwlo minam dvdv nga jvjv bv rilin modubv.
“Darwknv nyijar gunv kuu gvla, okv kuunyilo gubv bvngre, okv ninyia Immanuel vla minre” (So minam si, “Pwknvyarnv ngonugv rikulo reming gvduku,” vnam v).
Vkvlvgabv vdwlo Josep gudung tokudw nw nyidogindung gv ninyia ritokv vla mingkubv nw Merinyi nywngbv naatoku.
Vbvritola nw Meri gv kuunyilo nga bvngtv madv yika nw Merinyi doogvkargv matoku. Okv Josep ninyia Jisu vla amin mintoku.
Judia mookugv Betlehem banggu lo Jisunyi bvngtoku, Herod gv Dvbv bv rila doori hoka. Vbvridanam gula doonyi chaagu mooku lokv nyido takar a chinv nyi mego Jerusalem lo aatoku
okv tvvkato, “Jius vdwgv Dvbv bv rijinv vmi anga nga ogolo bvngpv? Ngonu ninyigv takar a chaagu kiambv chaalin nama kaala ninyia kumdujodubv aapvnv.”
Vdwlo Dvbv Herod sum tvvpa tokudw, hv achialvbv mvngru toku, okv Jerusalem gv nyi mvnwng ngvka.
Nw Nyibu Butvnv mvnwngnga okv pvbv tamsarnv vdwa gokkum tola bunua tvvkato, “Ogolodw Kristonyi dwrwboklin jikuv?”
“Judia mookugv Betlehem lo,” bunu mirwkto. “Vkvlvgavbolo nyijwk vdwv svbv lvkpvpv:
‘Judah mookugv kvdw Betlehem a, no Judah mookugv pamtv mvnwng lokv miang nvgobv ribwng kumare; noogv lokv rigv nvgo linre, hv ngoogv Israel nyi vdwa rigvre.’”
Vkvlvgabv Herod chaagu lokv kaalwknv nyi vdwa kvba doosi kolo goklwk toku okv bunugv lokv chintoku takar v dw tvrwk lo boklin pvnvnyi vla.
Vbvrikunamv nw bunua svbv gaam mingv rikula Betlehem lo vngmu toku: “Vngnyika okv anga nga alvbv makar laka, okv vdwlo nonu mapa ridw, ngaaka chimu labv, ngo ka vngla ninyia kumdujodubv.”
Okv vkvlvgabv bunu vngrap toku, okv bunugv lamtvlo bunu doonyi chaagu kiamgv takar kaanam anga lvkodv kaapa toku. Vdwlo bunu um kaapa tokudw, bunu achialvbv mvngpu laku, bunu achialv himpu punya toku! Hv bunua vngcho-vngcho gvla anga gv dooku lo vnglwk gvtoku.

Bunu naam arwnglo aatoku, okv vdwlo bunu vmi anga nga anv Meri nga lvkobv doodubv kaato kudw, bunu lvbwng ngv kumpvla gublwk dvla ninyia kumtojotoku. Bunugv amin gvnamv ain go, nampunv tvli go, okv nampunv amokayok jungnv guka naalinla ninyia jitoku.
Vbvrikunamv bunu akusunv lamtvbv vngla bunugv mooku lo vngkurla vngtoku, ogulvgavbolo Pwknvyarnv bunua yumalo gamrwto Herod gv dookubv vngpit kumabvkv vla mintoku.
Bunugv vngyuro kochingbv, yuma goloka Ahtu gv nyidogindung gonv Josep gvlo aala mintoku, “Herod vmi anga nga mvkidubv vla ninyia makar kardu. Vkvlvgabv gudung tvka, okv vmi anga hala anv nga vnggv laila Ijipt lo kisum gvtoka, okv vdwlo ngo vnglakukv vla mima redw hoka doobwng laka.”
Josep dokrap toku, vmi anga hala anv nga vnggv laila ayu Ijipt lo kisum toku,
Nw hoka Herod gv sima dvdvlobv dobwngto. So si Ahtu gv nyijwk vdwlo, minpvnam gaam “Ijipt lokv ngoogv Kuunyilo nga gokpv kunv,” vnam a jvjvbv rilin modukubv si ripvnv.
Vdwlo Herod chaagu kiamgv kaalwknv nyi vdwv ninyia mvvpv kunvnyi vla chinto kudw, nw achialvbv dokcha toku. Nw Betlehem okv doosindoin gv vminyilo nyingnyinv okv miangnv mvnwngnga mvkidubv orto go jitoku—so si vbv ritoku vdwlo chaagu kiamgv nyi kaalwknv vdwa takar gv unglin jirilokv nw sum chintoku.
Svbvrila nyijwk Jeremia gv minam v jvjv bv rilin toku:
“Rama lo dutv rungnv adu go tvvpadu, hidwkla kapnam adu go. Rakel gv kuu vdwv siro kunam lvkwngbv: nw maaku jimakv vla, siinyimar mvla kapdu.”
Herod gv siro kochingbv, Ahtu gv nyidogindung ako Ijipt lo Josep gv yumalo aalwk toku
okv minto, “Gudungto, vmi anga hala okv ninyigv anv nga naalaila, Israel mookubv vngkur tokuka, ogulvgavbolo vmia mvkidubv rungnv vdwv siroku.”
Vkvlvgabv Josep gudung toku, vmi hala okv anv ha naalaila, Israel mookubv vngkur gvtoku.
Vbvritola vdwlo Josep Arkelaus Judia lo ninyigv abu Herod gv Dvbv svngtung nga svngsit pvkv vla tvvpa pvkudw, nw hoka vngdubv busuto. Ninyia yumalo abuyabv mintamto, vkvlvgabv hv Galili gv mooku lo vngtoku
okv Najaret vnam banggu lo ninyigv naam a mvtoku. Okv vkvlvgabv nyijwk vdwgv “Ninyia Najarene vla minre” vnammv jvjvbv rilin toku.
Vbvrire hoka Jon Baptist Judia gv chukrimooku lo aala japgo raptoku.
Nw minto, “Nonu rimur lokv mvngdin tokuka, ogulvgavbolo Nyidomooku Karv ngv nvchi dooku!”
Jon vkvnv nyi ako nyijwk Aijaya gv minam angv, Aijaya minto, “Chukrimooku v nyi go gokdungdo, ‘Ahtu gv lvgabv lamtv nga mvkimvak jilakv; ninyia vngmu dubv lamtv nga sorchi dubv mvtokv!’”
Jon gv vjiv kemel amw lokv mvnam go; hv apin hukpia go hukto, okv ninyigv dvnam v takamyarup okv tangungula go.
Jerusalem lokv Judia mooku mvnwng lokv okv Jordan svko nvchi gv mooku lokv nyi vdwv ninyi gvlo aanyato.
Bunu bunugv rimur lokv mvngdin nyatoku okv nw bunua Jordan svko lo baptisma jitoku.
Vdwlo Jon Parisis okv Sadusis vdwa ninyi gvlo baptisma jikudubv aadu bv kaato kudw, nw bunua minto, “Tabw vdw nonu—yvvla nonua Pwknvyarnv gv mvritririt jikulo nonu aamare vla minv?
Nonu rimur lokv lirung pvku vla kaachin dukubv rinam go rito kuka.
Okv nonuno Abraham nonugv abu v vla Pwknvyarnv gv mvritririt mvji kolo aamare vla mvngma bvka. Ngo nonua mindunv Pwknvyarnv so vlwng vdw sum naala Abraham gv husi bv mvlare!
Yagwng ngv singnv nga miami laalubv palin dubv dooriado; singnv alvnv apwasi svvmanv dvdv nga palinla okv vmvlo orlwk dunv.
Nonu mvngdin pvku vla kaatambv ngo nonua isi lokv baptisma jidunv, vbvritola ngoogv kochinglo aarinv angv nonua Darwknv Dow lokv okv vmv lokv nonua baptisma jireku. Nw nga achialvbv kaiyadunv; okv ngo ninyigv lvkiam haka dvbwng yadubvka riyin yakuma.
Nw ninyigv aamtami kapkak nvnv upua doogv sudu. Nw ninyigv amkarmikar a nesunglo gvvlwk reku, vbvritola amsokmisok a nyimanv vmvlo ramyok reku.”
Vbvrire hoka Jisu Galili lokv aalwk la okv Jon gvlo Jordan Svko lo aatoku, nw gvlokv baptisma naadubv vla.
Vbvritola Jon ninyigv mvngnama mvngkurmvngrwk modubv gwngkwto, Jon minto, “Ngo ya no gvlo baptisma naaya svnga, no ngoogvlo ayapvi!”
Vbvritola Jisu ninyia mirwkto, “Vjakgv lvgabv vbv doomu lajuka. Svbv rila Pwknvyarnv gv mvngnam mvnwngnga rilajuka.” Vkvlvgabv Jon mvnglwk minggv toku.
Jisu baapubv baptisma naanam gula, nw isi lokv agum lo daklin toku. Vbvrikunamv Ninyi gvbv nyidomooku ngv kokok jito, okv Nw Pwknvyarnv gv Dow v taakw jvbv ritola ninyi gvlo jarlwk loodubv kaatoku.
Vbvrikunamv nyidomooku tolokv gaamgo minto, “Si ngo atubogv paknam Kuunyilo ngv, ngoogv mvngyum namv.”
Vbvrikunamv Dowv Jisunyi chukrimooku lo okv ninyia Uyu am pokayarka modukubv vnggvto.
Alu champi gula okv ayu champigo dvmabv dooro koching so, Jisu kano toku.
Vbvrikunamv Uyu ninyi gvlo aala minto, “No Pwknvyarnv gv Kuunyilo ngvbolo, so vlwng vdw sum vtwngbv ridubv mintoka.”
Vbvritola Jisu mirwksito, “Darwknv Kitaplo mindu, ‘Nyi si vtwng lokv mwng turma dunv, vbvritola Pwknvyarnv gv minam gaam mvnwngnga dinchi dunv.’”
Vbvrikunamv Uyu ngv Jisunyi Jerusalem bv vnggv toku, Darwknv Pamtv lo, ninyia Pwknvyarnvnaam aoyachoknv mwnglo aolo dakmuto,
okv ninyia minto, “No Pwknvyarnv gv Kuunyilo ngvbolo, atubongv sokv poklu kaatoka, vkvlvgavbolo Darwknv Kitaplo mindu, ‘Pwknvyarnv no gvbv ninyigv nyidogindung nga orto jire; bunu nam bunugv laak lo dvvbwngre, vkvlvgavbolo noogv lvchu nga achidubv vlwng aolo mvmu madubv.’”
Jisu mirwksito, “Vbvritola Darwknv Kitaplo vbv mintadu, ‘Noogv Pwknvyarnvnyi no rikwripak mabvka.’”
Vbvrikunamv Uyu hv Jisunyi vnggv laila moodw aoyachok kolo chaagv toku okv ninyia nyiamooku gv achialvbv kainv karv vdwa kaatam toku.
Uyu v minto, “No nga gublwk dvla kumbojobo lo, nam ngo so gv kaagv dvnam mvnwng sum jire.”
Vbvrikunamv Jisu mirwk toku, “Uyu! No vngroto, Darwknv Kitaplo mindu, “Noogv Pwknvyarnv nyimwng kumlajolaka okv Ninyigv lvgabv rimwng laka!’”
Vbvrikunamv Uyu ngv Jisunyi vngyu toku; okv nyidogindung ngv aala Jisunyi ridur toku.
Jonnyi patwk lwknama vdwlo Jisu tvvpa pvkudw, nw Galili bv vngyu toku.
Nw Najaret lo dooku mato, vbvritola Jibulun gvla Naptali mooku gv Svpar adar lo doonv banggu, Kaparnaum lo doodubv vngtoku.
Svbvrinam si nyijwk Aijaya gv minpv nama jvjvbv rilin modukubv ritoku,
“Jebulun gv Kvdw okv Naptali gv kvdw, lamtv ngv svmasa lo inv, Jordan Svko gv takdv gonvlo, Galili, Jentail vdwgv kvdw!
Kanv arwnglo doonv nyi vdwv, kairungnv Loung go kaapare. Sinv vdwgv kanv mooku lo doonv vdwgvlo loung ngv ungjire.”
Vbvriri lokv Jisu ninyigv doina japrap toku: “Nonuno rimur lokv mvngdin tokuka ogulvgavbolo Nyidomooku gv Karv ngv nvchi duku!”
Jisu Galili gv Svpar gv adar lo vngkar rilo, achiboru sinyi go aminv Saimon (Pitar vnam) okv ninyigv boru Andriu vsap lokv svpar lo ngui naadung dubv kaapato.
Jisu bunua minto, “Nga vngming gvlaka, okv ngo nonua nyi naadubv tamsarre.”
Vjakgobv bunu vsap a kayupila ninyia lvkobv vngming gvtoku.
Nw vngdavngra la kvvbi achiboru sigodv kaapato, Jibedi gv kuunyilo Jon nyila Jemsnyi. Bunu svpw lo vsap a mvgemvrap sila doonyato. Jisu bunua gokto,
okv bunu vjakgobv svpwa okv bunugv abua kayupila ninyia lvkobv vngming gvtoku.
Jisu Galili gv mooku mvnwng lo vnggo karto, Jius kumku-naam lo tamsarla, Nyidomooku gv Karv gv lvkwng nga japgola, nvgwngnv achiapikla lvvmanv nyi vdwa mvpujila ritoku.
Jisu gv vbvrinam gv yunying ngv Sairia gv mooku mvnwnglo dusik kartoku, vkvlvgabv nyi vdwv nyi nvgwngnv achiapik nvnga, okv suru nvnga, nyi uyuvram gvnv nga, okv svmik tabnv nga, okv digwng nvnga, ninyi gvlo aagv nyatoku, okv nw bunu mvnwngnga mvpu jitoku.
Nyi nyipam twngtv nvgo ninyia vngming gvto, hv bunu Galili lokv, okv Dekapolis lokv, Jerusalem, Judia, Jordan Svko gv takdv gonv lokv.
Jisu nyipam vdwa kaatokula okv moodw putungbv chaato, hoka nw dootungto,
okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv ninyia dooyumto, okv bunua tamsar raptoku:
“Yvvbunudw yalu lo heema do vla chindunv; bunu mvngpuv, Nyidomooku gv Karv ngv bunu gvngv!
“Yvvbunudw tinggw dunv, bunu mvngpuv; Pwknvyarnv bunua maare!
“Yvvbunudw nyanyak dunv, bunu mvngpuv; bunu Pwknvyarnv ogugo milv pvdw um naarwk sireku!
“Yvvbunudw Pwknvyarnv gv mvngnam a kaiyachokbv rinwng dunv bunu mvngpuv; Pwknvyarnv bunua mvngnam mvnwngnga nyumchi more!
“Yvvbunudw kvvbi ajina aya mvngpa dunv bunu mvngpuv; Pwknvyarnv bunua aya mvngpare!
“Haapok darwknv vdwv mvngpuv; bunu Pwknvyarnvnyi kaapare!
“Yvvbunudw sarsopoyo gv lvgabv ridunv, bunu mvngpuv; Pwknvyarnv bunua ninyigv umvuu bv minre!
“Yvvbunudw Pwknvyarnv gv mvngnama rigv rila mvdwkmvku nama paadunv hv bunu mvngpuv; Nyidomooku gv Karv ngv bunu gvngvku!
“Nonuno mvngpuv vdwlo nyi vdwv nonua nyarjikaula okv mvdwkmvku la okv nonuno gvlo mvvnamrunam a mvvlwk rulwk la mvrekudw, ogulvgavbolo nonuno ngoogv nyi bv rinam lvkwngbv.
Mvngpula okv sakpu yalaka, nonugv lvgabv kairungnv rijo lakmu kaanam go nyidomooku aotv vvpv jipvnv. Nonua richo dakcho yanv krim gv nyijwk vdwaka mvdwkmvku nyatoku.
“Nonuno nyia opi mvnwng gv lvgabv alu jvbv ridunv. Vbvritola aluv vdwlo tinama nyemu kubolo, um lvkodv tidukubv mvnyu kuma. Hv anyung kaamanvgobv ridu kunv, vkvlvgabv um ora dukunv okv nyi vdwv um chaajap chariap mvdukunv.
“Nonuno nyiamooku mvnwng gv lvgabv loung jvbv ridunv. Moodw putunglo pamtv mvnama vvsi nyuma dunv.
Yvvka mvdurupuma vmv baanu gvrila bati akonv takmam madunv; vbvmabvya hv um ungka kolo vvdin gvrila naam gv nyi mvnwngnga loung ungka modunv.
Hvkv aingbv nonuno nyi vdwgv kaagialo loung bv unglaka, vkvlvgabv nyi vdwv nonugv alvbv rinama kaapa gvrila, nyidomooku lo doonv nonugv Abunyi hartv reku.
“Ngam Moses gv Pvbv ngala nyijwk vdwgv tamsar nama rila ria dubv aapvnvgo vla mvngma bvka. Ngo bunu gvnga ria dubv aama, vbvritola bunugv tamsar nama jvjvbv rilin modubv aapvnv.
Mvngpa laka nyido ngvla kvdwv vdwlo nyemabv doobwng redw, Pvbv gv gaam akor chargoka rilaria nyumare—ogumvnwng gv nyeri loka nyemare.
Vkvlvgabv so Pvbv gv gaam minam akin guka yvvdw tvvma gvrila ajin haka vbv rigv bolo hv Pwknvyarnv gv Karv lo miangyachok nvgobv rire. Kvvbi gaam gunvlo, yvvdw Pvbv gaama tvvgvrila ridula ajin haka vbv rimu bolo, hv Pwknvyarnv gv Karv lo kainvgobv rireku.
Ngo nonua mindunv, nonu Pvbv tamsarnv vdwa okv Parisis vdwa alvyala Pwknvyarnv gv mvnglwkbv ribolo Pwknvyarnv gv Karv lo aalare.
“Nonuno tvvdu krim nyi vdwa minto, ‘Gwngrw gwma bvka; yvvdw gwngrw gwrinv um hinching chingmure.’
Vbvritola vjak ngo nonua mindunv: yvvdw ninyigv achiboru a haachi dunv um hinching chingmure, yvvdw ninyigv achiborua ‘Noogv alvnamv ogu anyung kaama!’ Vla mindunv um kvba lo boolwkre, okv yvvdw ninyigv achiborua anyung kaamanv pvchanvno vla minv ngv vmv maatarbv guku uyumooku lo vngyare.
Vkvlvgabv no vdwlo noogv Pwknvyarnvnyi amin jise nga yugwnglo jitv rinyi hoka no achiboru gv nam rinying nama mvngpa bolo,
noogv amina hoka yugwng hoka kayupila baapubv noogv achiboru gvlo vngla alvbv sarsopoyo dukubv rimisipikula aakur lakula noogv amina Pwknvyarnvnyi jilaka.
“Nam akonv rinyingla kort lo kvba japdubv vnggv rinyi, no kort lo vngtv madvbv baapubv yalung nga japdarjapa minsu laka. No hoka aaku bolo hv nam jwngkadakanv gvlo jilwk reku, hv nam pulis lo laklwkre okv nam patwk tumlwk reku.
Ngo nonua mindunv, no hoka noogv aje nga dornyama dvdvlo doobwng reku.
“Nonuno tvvtoku, ‘Nyimv nyilo bv rimur minsu mabvkv’ vla minam a.
Vbvritola vjak ngo nonua mindunv: yvv akonv mvvga anga doogvkargv daloka vla kaabiu dunv hv ninyigv haapok lo ninyia lvkobv rimur roku.
Vkvlvgabv noogv nyikbik nyikkv naam kaamur moduboloka, um koolinla ora tvka! Hv alvyare noogv ayak aba gonv kaama namv, ayak mvnwngnga uyumooku bolo orlwk komam svnga.
Noogv laak lakbik angv nam rimur gvdubolo, um palin gvrila ora tvka! Hv achialvbv alvyare noogv laak gunv kaama namv, ayak mvnwngnga uyumooku bolo vngmam svnga.
“Sika vbvka minto, ‘Yvv akonv atubogv nywng nga burbolo burdukunv vla mvnwngnga chimpa modubv siti go ninyia jirung laka.’
Vbvritola vjak ngo nonua mindunv: nyi akonv ninyigv nywng nga nyilo rinying koma gvrila kvvbi rimur lokv burdunv, okv nywng ngv kvvbi nyilu go naakubolo nyilu naachonam angv ninyia rimur modukunv; okv yvv ho nyimv anga nywngbv naaya dunv hvvka rimurlo aata dunv.
“Nonuno krim gv svbv minam haka tvvnyato, ‘Noogv milv nama topu mabvka, vbvritola noogv ridubv vla Ahtu gvlo milv nama rito laka.’
Vbvritola ngo vjak nonua mindunv: vdwlo nonu milvnam go minredw, ogugo mintak nvyoka. Nyidomooku a mintak nvyoka, tv Pwknvyarnv gv dogingngv;
sichingmooku haka mintak nvyoka si ninyigv lvpa gv lvnu kongv, Jerusalem haka mintak mabvka so si kainv Dvbv gv pamtv ngv.
Noogv dumpo haka mintakla milv yoka, ogulvgavbolo no dwmw sogo nyika yapung yakia dubv mvnyu mare.
‘Vkv vmalo maakv’ vse nga minda tvka-um lvvbo yadubv noogv minammv Alvmanv Angv gvlokv aadunv.
“Okv nonuno tvvpado svbv minam a, ‘Nyik kvlwk v nyik ngurv go, okv hijung kvlwk v hijung ngurv go.’
Vbvritola ngo vjak nonua mindunv: nonua rimur nvnga mvrwkrirwk siyoka. Nyi gonv nam moobik tanga svbiak bolo, ninyia noogv moochi tangaka svbiak dvmu laka.
Okv nyi gonv noogv jvkoklaklwk ka dvrit laila kort lo nam kvba mintv bolo, ninyia noogv jvkoklaklwk haka jitam yalaka.
Okv sipai akonv nam yikungyira nga lvtw akin go gvji labvkv vla minbolo, no lvtw anyigo gvji laka.
Vdwlo nam nyi gunv ogugo kooridw, ninyia jirung laka; vdwlo nyi gonv nam ogugo narlabvkv vrinyi, um no ninyia narrwk silaka.
“Nonuno tvvpa nyado svbv minam a, ‘Ajin a paklaka, nyiru nvnga kaanwng mabv rilaka.’
Vbvritola vjak ngo nonua mindunv: nam nyirunv vdwa paklaka okv nam mvdwkmvkunv vdwgv lvgabv kumlaka
vbv rigvrikula nonuno nyidomooku lo doonv nonugv Pwknvyarnv Abu gv umvuu bv ridu kubv. Nw tarwkbaknv nyi majeka okv tarwkbaknv nyi jeka ninyigv doonyi a bunu gvlo nyika jimudu. Okv alvbv rinv haka okv alvmabv rinv jeka doochar a sarlu jimudu.
Nonuno nonua paknv nga pakmwng bolo, ogulvgabv Pwknvyarnv nam aya nga jidubv? Lampu naaria nvngvka um risu gvrila!
Okv nonu noogv ajin vdwa gaam raamwng bolo, um no alvnvgo ripv mvngsu duai? Mvngjwng manv vdwvka um rinyadu!
No rilakriku runglaka—noogv Abu nyido tolo doonv gv rilak rikunam aingbv!
“Nonuno hima sulaka, nonugv dormo kumla ridungripa rinama nyi vdwa kaadubv vla nyi kaapam lo rima bvka, hvbv nyi kaapam lo riku bolo, no noogv Pwknvyarnv Abu gvlokv rijo paamare.
“Vkvlvgabv vdwlo no heemanv nyi ha ogugo jitv rinyi, um no nyi vdwa kaibv kaatam mabvka, kaakudubvrinv nyi vdwgv kumkunaam vdwlo okv lamtv sugulo ripia aingbv riyoka. Bunu vkvlvgabv rinyadu nyi vdwv kaagvrila bunuam hartv dubv vla. Ngo nonua jvjvbv mindunv, bunuam jise mvnwngnga jiropvkunv.
Vbvritola vdwlo nonu dvmaheemanv nyi vdwa ogugo ridur tvinyi vbv rilaka noogv dooku lo doonv ajin haka um chimpa madubv.
Vbvrikubolo hv no atugv risunam bv rire. Okv noogv Abu no ogugo ridudw um kaayanv nam rijo nga jire.
“Vdwlo nonu kumredw, kaadubv rinam aingbv rima bvka! Bunu kumkujoku naam lo okv lamtv sugulo daktola kumnwng nyadunv, nyi mvnwngnga kaakudubv vla. Ngo nonua jvjvbv mindunv bunu ogumvnwng nga paaro pvkunv.
Vbvritola vdwlo no kumdubv mvngridw, noogv karchung arwng lo aalaka, agi a koktum laka, okv noogv kaapa manam Abunyi, kumlaka. Okv noogv Abu no ogugo risududw um kaayanv, nam rijo nga jire.
“Vdwlo no kumredw, arin-kamanv gaam mimabvka, Pwknvyarnvnyi chimanv vdwgv ripiabv rima bvka, bunu mvngdu bunugv Pwknvyarnv ngv tvvdunv ogulvgavbolo bunugv kumnam v asunam lvgabv.
Bunugv aingbv rima bvka. Noogv Abu chinchodu, noogv dinchi nama ninyia no kootv madvbv.
Vbvrikunamv so sibv nonuno kumlaka: ‘Nyidomooku lo doonv ngonugv Abu: Noogv darwknv aminv kairungnv;
noogv Karv bv rimu laka; nyidomooku hv oguaingbv ridudw vkv aingbv sichingmooku so noogv mvngnambv rimu laka.
Ngonugv dvsetvngse dinchi nama silu ngonua jilaka.
Ngonua rimur nvnga ngonu oguaingbv mvngnga pvdw, vkv aingbv ngonugv rimur a mvngnga jilabv.
Ngonua hila manv pokayarka go rikw moma bvka, vbvritola ngonua Alvmanv Angv loka ringya labvka.’ [Ogulvgavbolo noogv mooku hv okv jwkrw hv, okv yunglit hv krim lokv doobwng rungnv.’] Amen.
Kvvbi gv nam rimur rinam a no mvngnga bolo, aotolo doonv noogv Abu ka nam mvngnga jire.
Vbvritola no kvvbi ham mvngnga mabolo, aotolo doonv noogv Abu ka, noogv rimur rinam a mvngnga jimare.
“Okv vdwlo nonu yikrinyi, kaadubv rinam aingbv nyukmua mvngrubv kaatamla rimabvka. Bunu ayakka mvngru nvgobv mvsudo ogulvgavbolo nyi mvnwngngv bunu yikla doodu nvnyi vla kaare. Ngo nonua jvjvbv mindunv, bunua achialvbv jijinamha jiro pvkunv.
Vdwlo nonu dvmabv vngrinyi, nonugv nyukmua monyupla okv nonugv dwmw a tai toksu laka,
vbvribolo kvvbiv nonua yikdunv vla chimare—nonugv kaapa manam Abu mwngchik chinre. Okv nonugv Abu nonu ogugo risududw um kaayanv nonua rijo nga jire.
“Bununo atubongv nyiamooku so nyitv nga tvvpv mabvka, soka tapin pungla okv chwnglwng dokla ramla okv dvchonv mvkola chojiku so vvpvyoka.
Vmabvya, noogv nyitv nga nyidomooku lo tvvpv yalaka, tolo tapin pungla ramla mare, okv dvcho nvngv mvkola chola mare.
Okv ogolo noogv nyitv nga tvvpv pvdw haapok hvka hoka doore.
“Nyik si ayak gv lvgabv mvdurrupum gubv ridunv. Noogv nyik hv alvbolo noogv ayak mvnwngngv loung bv ridunv;
vbvritola noogv nyik hv alv mabolo noogv ayak hv kanv arwng lo doodunv. Vkvlvgabv noogv loung ngv kanv arwng lo dooku bolo hv achialvbv mvngru gubv ridu kunv!
“Yvvka atu anyi gv nyirabv rinyu mare; nw akonyi pakri okv akonyi kaanwng mare; nw akonvgv minam a tvvre okv akonyi miakayare. No Pwknvyarnv nyila morko nga lvkobv anyia lvinbv riji-vngji nyulamare.
“Vkvlvgabv nonua ngo mindu, nonu hv turla singnam lvgabv dvkor tvngkor ham mvngdwk mabvka, okv ayak lokv vji vbee lvga ngaaka, ogulvgavbolo turnam hv dvnam mamsenga kaiyama nvri? Okv ayak si vji gvnam mamsenga arv doya madunvre?
Pvta vdwa kaatoka: Bunu aliamu pakma, aamtami nvla, nesunglo gvlwkma; vbvritola noogv Abu nyidomooku lo doonv ngv bunua kaaya tayadu! No pvta vdwa achialvbv arv doya nvngv mai?
Nonu gv lokv akonv vbv mvngrula achuk kaiyago svngnyu re?
“Okv ogubv vji lvgabv mvngdwk dunv? Mootum gv apung agar vdwgv singnam a kaatoka: bunu atu v vji vbee lvgabv mvsu risuma.
Vbvritola ngo nonua minjidunv Dvbv Solomon ka ninyigv nyitv mvnwng lokvka so gv apung agar so gv kaapu aingbv vji gvnam go kaamato.
So si Pwknvyarnv yvvdw mootum gv nvmwng nga vji koomunv-nvmwng ngv silu doodu okv aarunyi dooku majinv, vmvlo ramyok jinamv. Nw jvjv rungbv nonua vji vbee koomu mabv kayure? Nonugv mvngjwng ngv miang dulaka!
“Vkvlvgabv mvngru rungrap kuyoka: ngoogv dvse ngv tvngse ngv okv vji hv ogolo aatv rinvdw vla?’
(So mvngru runam dvdv si Pwknvyarnvnyi chimanv nyi vdwgv lokia mvngnam v.) So mvnwng sum nonu dinchi dvnv vla nonugv Abu nyidomooku doonv ngv chindu.
Vmabvya ogumvnwngnga sv-nga kaiyabv Pwknvyarnv gv Karv nga okv Pwknvyarnv nam ogugo mvngpvdw um dinchi yalaka, vbvribolo Nw nam so ogu kvvbi mvnwng haka jitare.
Vkvlvgabv aaru gv lvgabv mvngdwk mabvka: aaru gv mvngdwk hv dwkgu namgo doosure. Alu gv lokulo adwkaku logv nama, hoka lwktam svgo kaama.
“Kvvbia jwngkadaka mabvka, Pwknvyarnv ka nonua jwngkadaka madubv.
Nonu nyi kvvbia oguaingbv jwngkadaka dudw, vbvdvdvbv Pwknvyarnv ka nonua jwngkadakare, okv nonu nyi kvvbia oguaingbv kiika dudw vbvching Pwknvyarnv ka nonua kiikare.
Ogulvgavbolo nonu atugv nyik nywkrw chartvyanv nga kaama yabv, nonuno achiboru gv nyik nywkrw charching yanv yanga kaadunv?
Nonu oguaingbv nonugv nyik lo nyikrw chartvyanv go doomu gvrila, achiboru gv nyikgv nyikrw charching nvnga naalin laju vla minyu dubv?
Kaakudubvrinv no! Nonu atubogv nyikgv nyikrwa naalin chotoka, vbvribolo nonugv achiboru vdwgv nyikgv nyikrwa naalin dubv nonu kaapa nyulare.
“Darwknv ogu ogua iki vdwa jimabvka-hv bunu tapkur danv nam chvyare. Tasing laktv nga vrikbv orji mabvka—hv bunu lvpa lvkwnglo chaajap chariapre.
“Kolaka, okv nonu koopare; malaka, okv nonu mapare; takdin laka, okv nonu gvbv agi a kokda pvjire.
Ogulvgavbolo mvnwngngv yvv koodunv koopare, okv yvvdw madunv mapare, okv yvvdw takdin dunv ninyigv lvgabv agi a kokda pvji dunv.
Yvvgv abu ngvla kuunyilo nga vtwng go koomu gvrila vlwng pwgo jinv ngv?
Vmalo ninyia ngui nvgo koomu gvrila nonu tabw sogo jiya dubvre?
No vdwgo alvmanv gubv rida jvka, no gv umvuu vdwa alvbv jisv nga chindu, vkv aingbv, nonugv nyido Abu ka, ninyia konv nga, alvbv jisv nga, achialvbv chindunv.
“No kvvbi nyi a no gv lvgabv kainvgo riji svgo vla mvngnam aingbv, no kvvbi nyi gv lvgabvka riji laka: so si Moses gv Pvbv gvla okv nyijwk vdwgv tamsar namgv arin jvngv.
“Lamtv takching kolo vnglaka, ogulvgavbolo uyumooku bv vngnv lamtv ngv geetv koyodo okv ho vngku lamtv ngv vngyin dunv, okv ho nyi vdwv achialvbv vngyadu.
Vbvritola turku lo vngnv lamtv ngv takching dunv okv ho gv vngku lamtv ngv vngru vngya dunv, okv hoka nyi vdwv miang go vngmwngdu.
“Nonu mvvnvrunv nyijwk vdwa hima sulaka; bunu nonugv kaagialo agum mv svlar jvbv ridu, vbvritola bunugv arwng ngv mootum svcha jvbv ridunv.
Bunugv gwngnam rinam lokv nonu chinreku. Hvngnv vrintv lokv anggor svma dunv, tanyum singnv lokv koksitkokrik svvlin madunv.
Bakboknv singnv ngv alvnv apw asi svvdunv, vbvritola yaagampolonv singnv ngv alvmanv apw asi svvdu.
Bakboknv singnv ngv alvmanv apw asi svvnyu madunv, okv yaagampolonv singnv ngv alvnv apw asi svvnyu madunv.
Okv singnv apw asi alvnv svvma nvnga patap gvrila vmvlo orlwk dunv.
Vkvlvgabv, mvvlarula nyijwk vdwa nonu bunugv gwngnam rinam lokv chinreku.
“Nga Ahtu, Ahtu vla goknv mvnwngngv Pwknvyarnv gv Karv lo aala mare, vbvritola yvvdw ngoogv nyido Abu gv mvngkubv ridu vngdunv, hv mvngchik aanyure.
Vdwlo jwngkadaka aluv lori kudw, nyi achialvgo nga minreku, ‘Ahtu, Ahtu! No gv amin lokv ngonu Pwknvyarnv gv doin a japgo pvnv, no gv amin lokv ngonu uyuvram vdwa chara pvnv, okv achialvgo lamrwpanam vkv rila kaatam pvnv!
Vbvrikunamv ngo bunua minreku, ‘Ngo vdwloka nonua chimapvnv. Alvmanv nyi vdwv nonu, ngo gvlokv adu roto!’
“Vkvlvgabv, yvvdw ngoogv gamchar vdwa, tvgvrila um ridu vngdunv, hv mvnglak rilaknv nyi go, ninyigv naam a vlwng aolo mvlwknv aingbv ridunv.
Nyido doochar hv sarluto, svko isi hv tvvluto, okv ritv doori hv rila ho naam ha tvging rigingto. Vbvritola ho naam anga mvyakmvchak nyumato, ogulvgavbolo hv vlwng aolo mvlwknam lvgabv.
“Vbvritola yvvdw ngoogv gamchar vdwa tvgvrila okv um rima vngma dunv, hv pvchanv nyi go ninyigv naam a chukrilo mvlwknv aingbv ridunv.
Nyido doochar hv sarluto, svko isi hv tvvluto, ritv doori rila ho naam a tvging rigingto, okv naam angv taba toku. Okv ho hv achialvbv mvngru runam gubv ritoku.
Vdwlo Jisu gv vbv minya robv, nyipam hv ninyigv tamsar sarku nama tvvla lamrwpanya toku.
Nw Pvbv tamsarnv vdwgv aingbv rima; vmabvya nw kaiyachokbv jwkrw doonv gubvrila tamsar yatoku.
Vdwlo Jisu moodw lokv lvkwngbv ito kudw, nyipam tvngtv nvgo ninyia vngming gvto.
Vbvrikunamv taik rila silvmanv nyi ako ninyi gvlo aatoku, ninyigv kaagia lo lvbwng ngv kumpvla, okv ninyia minto, “Tamsarnv, no mvnggelo nga no darwk dubv mvnyure.
Jisu nw gv lak v laklin daanv okv ninyia mvsit toku. Nw mirwkto, “Ngo mvngdunv,” “Darwk tokuka!” Vto, vbv minam gula vjakgobv nyi angv gv lvvma ngv poya toku.
Vbvrikunamv, Jisu ninyia mintoku, “Tvvriato! Yvvnyika minpa mabvka, vbvritola nyibu gvlo vngdavngra yika okv ninyia no jwngkadaka kolaka; vbvrila no poorung pvku vla nyi mvnwngnga chimu laka, Moses gv ortojinam lokv erinpeelwk svnga rinlaka.”
Vdwlo Jisu Kaparnaum lo aalwk tokudw, Roman nyigam gunv ninyia kaarwksuto okv ridur labv vla kooto:
“Tamsarnv, ngoogv pakbu hv achialvbv lvvmala, naam gadw lo binyu tapnyu mabv, karpvkv.”
Jisu minto, “Ngo vngla ninyia alvdubv mvreku.”
“Oo, Tamsarnv, ma,” vla nyigam angv mirwk toku. “Ngo nam ngoogv naam lo aaji labv vla mvngma. Vjak so orto jimwng tvka, okv ngoogv pakbu ngv poyariku.
Ngo ka kainv nyigam vdwgv arwng lo doonv nyi akonv, okv ngoogv arwng loka sipai hv doodunv. Ngo so doonv anga ‘vngto’ vla orto jibolo hv vngdunv; okv ngo olo doonv anga ‘so aato’ vla orto jibolo, hv aadunv; okv ngo ngoogv pakbu nga, ‘Sum rito’ vla orto jibolo okv hv um ridunv.”

‘Ngonu nonugv lvgabv nyida gungrigungga mvdunv, vbvritola nonuno naas rima! Ngonu nonu gvbv siinyimar rijito vbvritola nonuno kapma!’

Vdwlo Nyia Kuunyilo ngv aato kudw, nw dvtoku okv tvngtoku, nyichar mvnwngngv, ‘So nyi sum kaatoka! Nw dvki tvngki rianv go, lampu nayanv vdwgv okv kvvbi nyi toa kunam vdwgv ajin go!’ Pwknvyarnv gv mvngkimvnglak v ninyigv rinamvngnam lokv jvjv gubv kaadar modu.”
Jisu ogolo ninyigv lamrwpadubv mvnam rinam ma kaiyabv kaatam pvkudw ho banggu gv nyi vdwv bunugv rimur lokv mvngdin manya toku, vkvlvgabv nw ho banggu vdwa haachito.
“Vdwnvgo mvngru runam gubv rire ‘Chorajin’ no! Okv vdwgo mvngru runam gubv ritare, ‘Betsaida’ no! Nonu gvlo lamrwpanam kaatam nama Taire okv Sidon lo rinv guilo krim ho gv nyi vdwv bunu krim rimur lokv mvngdin dukunv vla kaatam nvbv tagiam vji ha kopv kunvpv, okv bunu atu hv mvchu tayu nga taabum sipv kunvpv!
Ngo nonua jvjvbv minjidunv jwngka daka alu lo Pwknvyarnv nonua sv-nga Taire okv Sidon gv nyi vdwa kaiyago aya kaatam yariku!
Okv Kaparnaum no gvbv, no atubongv nyidomooku tolo naacha sidubv mvngpv ai? Nam uyumooku bolo orlu tainv! Nonu gvlo lamrwpanam kaatamnam vdwa Sodom lo kaatam nvgo yilo, hv vjaklodvbv doobwng pvnvpv!
No hum mvngjv lvlaka, jwngkadaka alu lo Pwknvyarnv nonua svnga Sodom ha kaiyago aya kaatam riku!”
Ho dw hoka Jisu minto, “Abu, nyidomooku gvla kvdw mookugv Ahtu! Nam ngo umbonyikv vla mindunv ogulvgavbolo no gv chinvpanv nyi vdwa vvsi nama silu no chimapamunv vdwa kaatam kunam lvgabv.
Vkv Abu so si no gv rimu dvbv vla mvngnam mv.
“Ngo gv Abu nga ogumvnwngnga jipv. Yvvka Kuunyilo nga chima Abu mvngchik, okv yvvka Abunyi chima Kuunyilo ngv mvngchik okv Kuunyilo gv nw atu v kaatam dubv vla darnam nyi vdwv.
“Mvnwngngv ngoogvlo aalaka, yvvdw ainv yikungyira baktola anyu kumabv ridunv, okv ngo nonua doonu modubv jire.
Ngo gv rvngko nga no naala mvlwk sila gvtola ngoogv kochingbv vngming gvtoka, ogulvgavbolo ngo dow lo alvnv okv nyaknyaknv; okv nonuno doonu nama paare.
Ngoogv nonua rvngko jinam angv gvpu dunv okv ngoogv nonua vge bakmu namv haajup dunv.”
Achukgo ayungjvma nga Jius Doonualu golo Jisu radv rongolo vngkarto. Nwgv lvbwlaksu vdwv kano nyato, vkvlvgabv bunu radv dape pikla dvrap nyato.
Vdwlo Parisis vdwv hum kaapa tokudw bunu Jisunyi minto, “Kaatoka, no gv lvbwlaksu vdwv Jius Doonualu so vbvrinamv ngonugv Pvbv nga rinyingdu!”
Jisu mirwksito, “Dabid la ninyigv nyi vdwv vdwlo bunu kano tokudw ogugo ripv hum no vdwloka puri rika mapv nvri?
Nw Pwknvyarnv gv naam arwngbv aato, okv nw la ninyigv nyi vdwv Pwknvyarnv gvlo kumlwk joolwk nam vtwng nga dvto, hum bunu dvbolo Pvbv nga rinying nam gubv riku jvka-ho gv hum nyibu vdwv mvngchik dvmwng dunv.
Okv nonu Moses gv Pvbv ngaaka puri rika mapv nvri Jius Doonualu gv dwkia nyibu dvdv ngv Jius Doonu alu gv pvbv nga mvvkmvrwk ropv, vbvritola bunuv rigakpama duai?
Ngo nonua minjidunv Pwknvyarnvnaam a kaiyanv go sika si doodu.
Darwknv Kitaplo mindu ‘aya kaapa minsunam si ngoogv mvngnam mv, svnwngsvmin rinji nama makv.’ Soogv minam sum no jvjv bv chirung bolo, nonu mia kumare nyi rimur manv vdwa;
Nyia Kuunyilo ngv Jius Doonualu gv Ahtu hv.”
Jisu ho mooku ham vngyula Jius kumkunaam bv vngtoku,
hoka nyi ako laak hv lakpik nvgo dooto. Nyi mego hoka Jisunyi rimur rimu gvrila gungnying lwkdubv vla dooria nyato, vkvlvgabv bunu ninyia tvvkato, “Jius Doonualu lo mvpu jinam si ngonugv Pvbv nga rinying nambv ridu nvri?”

Okv nyi si svlar ham achialvbv kaiyanv gukv! Vkvlvgabv ngonugv Pvbv ngv ngonua Jius Doonualu lo kaadurridur minsu dubv jilin dunv.”
Vbvrikunamv nw nyi lakpiknv hum minto, “Noogv laak hv lakda tvka.” Nw hum lakdakvra jito, okv hv lvkodv alv toku, laak lakgonv aing toku.

okv bunua nw gv lvga nga yvvnyika minji mabvka vla mingap to.
Nw gv svbvrinam si Pwknvyarnv gv nyijwk Aijaya gvlo minam ma jvjv bv rilin modubv rito:
“Ngoogv darnam, pakbu hv si doopv, ngoogv paknam, yvvnyi ngo alvbv mvngpvdw. Ngo ninyigv aolo ngoogv Dow nga jilwkre, okv nw ngoogv jwngkadaka nama diringmooku mvnwnglo gokgo jire.
Nw vdwloka larmare vmalo achialvbv gokmare vmalo banggu lamtv loka sudu pvbin rimare.
Nw vdwloka nvmwng yapchar nvgoka mvrik mare, vmalo mvru gudor manv ngaaka mvngit mare. Nw jvjv nga riya yamuma dvdvlo nw ribwngdvdvre,
okv nw gvlo nyi vdw mvnwngngv mvngging reku.”
Vbvrikunamv nyi vdwv nyikching okv uyuvram gvtola gaam milin nyumanv nyi ako Jisu gvlo aagv jito. Jisu nyi anga mvpu jitoku, vkvlvgabv nyi angv nyiktar laku okv gaam milin nyutoku.
Nyipam nyi mvnwngngv lamngak nyatoku, Jisu gv rinam a kaagv rikula. Bunu tvvkato, “Si nyi si Dabid gv Kuunyilo ngvdw?”.
Vdwlo Parisis vdwv hum tvvpa pvkudw, bunu mvrwkto, “Hv uyuuvram vdwa chara nyudo ogulvgavbolo bunua rigvdogvnv Biljebul ninyia vbv rinyu dubv jwkrw a jipv nvgo.”
Jisu chintoku, bunugv ogugo mvngnam a, vkvlvgabv nw bunua mintoku, “Diringmooku gunv ngv atuv apinain sula akonv ako nvnga mvdar minsu nvngv ayungbv dooma dunv. Okv banggu okv vpin gunv apinain sula akonv ako nvnga mvdar minsu nvngv hv ngoodunv.
Vkvlvgabv Uyu gv karv lo akonv ako nvnga mvdar minsu bolo, hvbv rinam hv manv bunu apinain suro pvku okv baapubv ngoonam bv rireku!
Nonuno nga mindu Biljebul nga jwkrw jinam lvgabv ngo vbv uyuuvram vdwa chara nyudunv vla, Alvdo, vbvrinamv nonua reming gvnv vdwa yvvla bunua chara nyudubv jwkrw jinv ngv? Nonua reming gvnvgv ogugo rinam lokv nonu mimor rungdo vla kaalin modu!
Ma, si Biljebul makv, vbvritola Pwknvyarnv gv Dow v, nw nga uyuuvram vdwa chara nyudubv jwkrw jinv ngv, so si Pwknvyarnv gv Karv ngv nonu gvlo aapvku vla ho kaalin modu.
“Yvvka gwlwknv nyi gv naam lo mvko mvro la aala yikungyira nga naanyu mare, vdwlo nw gwlwknv nyi anga leepv choma bolo; leepv chobolo hv yikungyira nga dvrit nyulare.
“Akonv yvvdw ngogvbv rima dunv hv nga rinying rungdunv; akonv yvvdw nga ridur madunv naakum namvka ayak apak rungdunv.
Okv vkvlvgabv ngo nonua minji dunv nyi vdwgv rimur a okv bunugv alvmanv mimur minam a mvngnga nyure; vbvritola yvvdw Darwknv Dow a alvmabv mimur redw hum vdwloka mvngnga nyulamare.
Yvvdw Nyia Kuunyilo nga alvmabv minyingmiru go minjeka hum mvngnga nyulare; vbvritola yvvdw Darwknv Dow a alvmanv minyingmiru go minredw hum vdwloka mvngnga nyulamare-vjakka okv kokwng nyika.
“Alvnv apwasi paanam lvgabv, no bakboknv singnv sorung laka; no singnv yaagampolonv sobolo apwasi alvmanv paare. Singnv nga apwasi svvlin kolokv kaachin dunv.
Kaakudubvrinv nonu-oguaingbv nonu atubongv alv mapv tvvla, alv nvnga minyu dubv? Haapok gv karukaya nga gaam lokv milin dunv.
Alvnv nyi v ninyigv alvkolokv alvnvnga naalwk dunv; alvmanv nyi v ninyigv alvmaku lokv alvmanv nga naalwk dunv.
“Nonuno mvngjelvlaka jwngkadaka alu lo mvnwngngv alvmanv gaam raanam dvdv nga kikala jidubv rireku.
Nonuno rimur pvdw ma rimur mapvdw, nonugv gamchar dvdv lokv nonua kaadar nvnv reku.”
Vbvrikunamv Pvbv tamsarnv nyi mego okv Parisis nyi mego milin nyato. Bunu minto, “Tamsarnv, ngonu nam lamrwpanam go ridubv kaanwngdo.”
“Silu meru gv nyi vdwsi achialvbv alvmanyado okv pwknvyarnv kaama nyado!” vla Jisu minto. “Nonu ngam lamrwpanam rinam go koodu ai? Ma! Nonua lamrwpanam go kaatam svngv hv nyijwk Jona gv lamrwpanam nga kaatamre.
Jona gv kainv ngui arwnglo alu loum gola ayu yubom go doonam apiabv Nyia Kuunyilo ngvka kvdw arwng bolo alu loum gula okv ayu yubom go doore.
Jwngkadaka alu lo Ninebe gv nyi vdwv dakrap la nonua yamre, ogulvgavbolo bunu vdwlo Jona gv japji nama tvvtokudw mvngdin nyatoku; okv ngo nonua minjidunv Jonanyi kaiyanv go si doopv!
Jwngkadaka alu lo Seba gv Dvnv ngv dakrapla nonua yamre, ogulvgavbolo nw adubv moing vngla ninyigv mooku lokv ngv Solomon gv chinampaanam bv tamsar nama tvbv vngto; okv ngo nonua jvjvbv mindu Solomonnyi kaiyanv go si doopv!
“Vdwlo alvmanv dow v nyi gvlokv linri kudw, hv mooku mvnwnglo dooku makarla vnggo kardunv. Hv vdwlo dooku ako mapa kuma bolo,
hv atubongv minsu dunv, ‘Ngo ngoogv naam lo vngkur reku.’ Vkvlvgabv hv naam aakur laku naam a arochoko dubv, kakakbvrak dubv, okv mvnwngngv alvla doin dubv paadu kunv.
Vbvrikunamv hv vngkur dvla kuring ninyia kaiyabv alvmanv dow kanw go naalwk dukunv, okv bunu aala ho doolwk dukunv. Vkvlvgabv so si vbv rinya vngnya kubolo, ho nyi angv kvvlo gvnga kaiyago alvmayabv ridu kunv. So si vbvku silu meru gv alvmanv nyi vdwa rirekunv.”
Jisu nyi vdwa gaam raadungla doorilo, ninyigv Anv okv boru vdwv aalwkla ninyia gaam mindubv vla agumlo tvkala daknyato.
Vkvlvgabv hoka nyi akonv minto, “Kaatoka, noogv anv okv boru vdwv, nam gaam mindubv vla agum v daknya pv.”
Jisu mirwkto, “Yvvla ngoogv anv ngv? Yvvla ngoogv boru vdwv?”
Vbvrikunamv nw ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa chigap dvla minto, “Kaatoka! So vdw si ngoogv anv okv boru vdwv!
Yvvbunudw ngo Abu nyidomooku tolo doonv gv mvnglwk kaalwk bv ridunv hv bunu ngoogv boruv, ngoogv bormv ngv, okv ngoogv anv ngv.”
Ho alu akin hoka Jisu naam ha vngyula svparsvlv kiambv itoku, hoka nw dootung tvla tamsarto.
Ninyia doyumdochinv nyi vdwv achialvbv twngtv kunam lvgabv nw svpw gulo aala dooto, nyipam gv agum lo dakrilo.
Nw minchisinam minv nvla bunua ogumvnwngnga minjito. “Alu gulo nyi ako rongolo radv chibv vnglinto.
Nw rongolo radv ha chirilo, megonv lamtvlo hopvto, okv pvta vdwv aala hum dvtoku.
Kvgonv lvngtak aolo hopvto, hoka kvdw miang go dooto. Amw v Vjakgobv boksu dato, ogulvgavbolo kvdw v rungrwng mato.
Vbvritola vdwlo doonyi v chaalin tokudw, agar anga kaayok toku; ogulvgavbolo miamiv rungrwngbv harlwk madvto, agar angv baapubv sinyok toku.
Amw kvgonv mootum tv pvdwng lo hopvto, hv singlin toku, singnv vdwv hum yuptwngpatoku.
Vbvritola amw kvgonv alvnv kvdw lo holwk toku, okv radv vdwv svngla dape pelin lakula; kvgonv chaam bv, kvgonv chamkvbv okv kvgonv lwnggobv lintoku.”
Okv Jisu minyabv minto, “Tvvtoka, nonuno nyarung doodu bolo!”
Vbvrikunamv lvbwlaksu vdwv Jisu gvlo aala tvvkato, “No nyi vdwa gaam minrinyi ogubv minchisinam minvla mindunv?”
Jisu mirwkto, “Nyidomooku gv Karv gv lvga nga nonua minji ropvkunv, vbvritola bunua minji madv.
Yvvnyi hv ogugo doodunv hum jitamre, ninyia kaiyayabv doomu kunam lvgabv; vbvritola yvvdw oguka kaama dunv ninyigv achukgo doonam haka dvrit reku.
Ngoogv bunua minchisinam minvla minam gv lvga ngv bunu kaagapdo, vbvritola kaapama, okv bunu tvvdu, vbvritola tvvpama okv chima.
Vkvlvgabv Aijaya gv nyikrw kaanam hv bunua mindu: ‘So nyi vdw si tvvdu okv tvvdu vbvritola tvchinma; bunu kaadi kaadidu, vbvritola kaapa ma,
ogulvgavbolo bunugv haapok vdwv pvcha nyapv, okv bunugv nyarung nga mvtum sinyapv okv bunugv nyik a nyikching sinyapv. Vbv mvmabolo bunugv nyikkv kaapare, bunugv nyarung ngv tvvpare, bunugv haapok v chiri kunvpv, okv bunu nga dakrwk reku, Pwknvyarnv mindu, okv bunua ngo mvpu pvku nvpv.’
“Nonu gvbvdv vdwgo gamdakpv! Nonugv nyik v kaapadu, nonugv nyarung ngv tvvpadu.
Ngo nonua jvjvbv mindunv, nyijwk achialvgo okv Pwknvyarnv gv pakbu achialvgo, nonugv kaagv dvnam a kaadubv mvngyato, vbvritola bunu kaapama, okv nonugv tvvgv dvnam a tvvdubv mvngnyato, vbvritola bunu tvvpa riakuma.
“Vbvrikunamv, tvvria nyato, okv chinlaka amw chinam minchisinam si ogu vdw.
Yvvdw Pwknvyarnv gv Karv gv doin a tvvgv rila hum tvvchin madunv hv lamtvlo amw hoolunv jvbv ridunv. Bunu gvlo amw chilwk nama uyu vrammv aala dvrit dunv.
Amw v lvngtak aolo hopvnv nvngv hobunua mindunv doin a tvdanam gula himpula torwk sinv vdwa.
Vbvritola bunu ho rungrwngbv miami hv harlwk madu, okv bunu doobwng jinv gubv rikuma. Vkvlvgabv vdwlo doin gv lvkwngbv adwkaku vmalo mvdwkmvkuv aari kudw, bunu vjakpi gubv topu riku.
Amw v tvv pvdwng gulo holwknvngv hobunua mindunv doin a tvgvrila; vbvritola ninyigv singdung lvgabv mvngrula, okv nyitvnyigam lvgabv mvngbiu namv doin ha yuptoku, okv bunu apw asi svvlin kuma.
Okv amw hv alvnv kvdw lo chilwk kunam hv ho bunua mindunv yvvdw doin ha tvvgvrila hum tvchin dunv; apw asi svvlin dunv, megonv chaam bv, kvgonv chamkvbv, okv kvgonv lwngbv bv.”
Jisu bunua kvvbi minchisinam go minjito: “Nyidomooku gv Karv ngv svbv ridunv. Nyi ako ninyigv rongolo alvnv amw a chilwkto.
Ayu yupgolo, mvnwngnga yupmu tvla, nyimak ako aala vvng amw mego ampu apumlo paklwk pila vngyu toku.
Vdwlo agar hv garlin tokudw anw hv paalin raptoku vbvrikunamv vvng nga kaapa raptoku.
Nyi hvkvgv pakbuv aala ninyia tvvkato, ‘Atu, no gv rongolo no amw alvnv vkv paklwk pvnv; vvng ngv ogolo lokv aapvnvdw?’
Nw mirwksito, ‘Nyiru nvgonv hum ripv.’ Bunu ninyia tvvkato, ‘No ngonua vngla vvng nga bulin svgo vla mvngdure?’
Nw mirwksito, “Ma, nonuno vvng nga bulin rinyi ampu ngaaka butak linjila.
Vvng hala ampu nga bunyia lvkobv svngba rimutvka Nvvkumdw lobv. Vbvrikunamv ngo nvvkum jinv vdwa vvng nga naakum chotokv, puching tvkv, ramyok tvkv vla minre, okv ampu nga nvvkumla ngoogv nesunglo baglwk laka vla minreku.’”
Jisu bunua kvvbi minchisinam akodv mindvto; “Nyidomooku gv Karv ngv svbv ridunv. Nyi ako yingmw chargo naalaila ninyigv rongolo hum paklwk to.
So si amw mvnwngnga charching yachoknv, vbvritola vdwlo hv svngrap tokudw, hv tamitasa mvnwngnga kaiyachok nvgobv ritoku, hv singnv gubv ritoku, vbvrikunamv pvta mvnwngngv aala ho gv hakbv dvdvlo asup mvlwkla doonya toku.”
Jisu bunua vjaklodvbv minchisinam go minji jidvto: “Nyidomooku gv Karv ngv vbv ridunv. Mvvga ako vpap naala okv hum moida ata keji champigo naala pvchwng lo mvyomvchidu goochama dvdvlobv.”
Jisu minchisinama minv nvla ogumvnwngnga nyipam a minjito; Nw minchisinama mintak mabv bunua ogugoka mimato.
Nw gv svbvrinam si nyijwk gv minpv nama jvjvbv rilin modukubv rito, Vdwlo ngo bunua gaam minridw ngo minchisinam minv nvla minre; Ngo bunua krim Sichingmooku sam pwklinyarlin rilokv naala vjak lobv chima nama minjire.”
Vdwlo Jisu nyipam a vngyula naam lo aato kudw, ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv nw gvlo aala tvvkato, “Tamsarnv, noogv rongo vng nga minchisila minammv ogu hvdw ngonua minjilabv.”
Jisu mirwksito, “Alvnv amw chilwkkunv nyi angv si Nyia Kuunyilo ngv;
rongo ngv nyiamooku si, alvnv amw v Karv gv nyi vdwv; vvng ngv Alvmanv Angv gv nyi vdwv;
okv vvng amw a chilwknv angv Uyudvbv. Nvvkumdw aluv nyiamooku gv ataranya ngv, okv nvvkum rianv vdwv nyidogindung ngv.
Vvng nga oguaingbv nvvkumla vmvlo ramyok dvdw, vkv aingbv rire nyiamooku gv ataranya alulo;
Nyia Kuunyilo ngv ninyigv nyidogindung vdwa vnglin more ninyigv Karv lokv, yvvbunudw nyi vdwa rimur modunv, okv kvvbi alvmanv ridunv, ho vdwa naakum more,
okv bunu vdwa achialvbv vmv gukulo bunu orlwk reku, hoka bunu kapriku okv bunugv hijung nga kotwkkrwk sila dooreku.
Vbvrikunamv Pwknvyarnv gv nyi vdwv bunugv Abu gv Karv lo doonyi ungnam aingbv rireku. Vbvrikunamv nonuno nyarung gvdu nvlo tvvria laka!
“Nyidomooku gv Karv ngv svbv ridunv. Nyi akonv rongo gulo yikungyira vvsi namgo kaapa toku, hum nw lvkodv mvtum toku okv himpu puyingla vnglaku ninyigv ogumvnwngnga piokla kula okv vngkur laku ho gv rongo nga rvvtoku.
“Nyidomooku gv Karv ngv svbv rita dunv. Nyi akonv svngtor singku kaapunv makar dubv rito,
okv vdwlo nw kaapuyaung nvgo kaapa tukudw, nw vnglaku ogugo svnggvrigv pvkudw mvnwngnga piokla kula ho gv svngtor singku nga rvvtoku.
“Nyidomooku gv Karv ngv svbvka rita dunv. Ngui naanv nyi megonv bunugv vsap a svparsvlv lo orlwk nyala nvgwngnv ngui vkv naanyato.
Vdwlo vsaplo yarbing tokudw, bunu hum agum lo svvlin toku okv dootung nyatola ngui a darpin sidula: alv nvnga bunugv pvtak lo lwkto okv alvmanv vdwa ora nyatoku.
Ataranya alu lo vbvching rireku: nyidogindung ngv vnglin nyala alvnv nyi vdwgv apum lo alvmanv nyi vdwa naakum riku
okv bunua achialvbv vmv guku lo orlwk reku, hoka bunu hijung nga kotwkkrwk sila dooreku.
Jisu bunua tvvkato, “Nonuno so vdw sum tvvchinpvri?” Bunu “vkv” vla mirwksito.
Vkvlvgabv nw bunua mirwkto, “Vbvrikunamv so gv minam si Pvbv tamsarnv mvnwngngv Nyidomooku gv Karv lo lvbwlaksu bv rikubolo, hv bunu naam atuv ninyigv karchung gv yikungyira nga aku jeka anw jeka lvkobv naalinnv atu jvbv ridu.”
Vdwlo Jisu so gv minchisinam sum bunua minjila minya tokudw, nw ho mooku a vngyu toku
okv ninyigv banggu lo vngkur toku. Nw jius kumkunaamlo tamsar toku, okv nw gvlo tvvnv vdwv tvngarvnga nyatoku. Bunu tvvkato, “Nw svkvnv mvngkimvnglak kv ogolo paapv nvyu? Okv ninyigv lamrwpanam rinam v oguvkudw?
Nw yikungyira mvnv gv kuunyilo mangvri? Meri ninyigv anv mangvri? Okv Jems, Josep, Saimon, okv Judas bunu ninyigv boru mangvri?
Ninyigv bormv vdwv so dooma dvnvdw? Nw so mvnwng sum ogolokv paapv nvyu?”
Okv vbv bunu ninyia toa nyatoku. Jisu bunua minto, “Nyijwk ka ninyigv banggu naam lo okv nw atugv vpin nyi ngv mvngdv madunv, vbvritola mooku mvnwnglo mvngdv nama paayadunv.”

Vkvlvgabv Jisu vmi go gokla bunugv kaagialo dakmuto,
okv minto, “Ngo nonua milv jidunv vdwlo nonu mvngdinla so vmi so aingbv rima redw, nonu vdwloka Nyidomooku Karv tolo aala mare.
Yvvdw so vmi aingbv rila nyanyak dunv hv Nyidomooku gv Karv tolo kaiyachok nvgobv rireku.
Okv yvvdw svkvnv vmia ngoogv amin bv alvbv naarwk sidunv, hv ngamka naarwk sidunv.”
“Yvv akonv so miangnv vdw sokv akonyi nga mvngjing nvnga mva riadunv, ho nyi angv vbvribolo alvyare ninyigv lvngpo lo vlwng pwktv nvgo paklwk sutola svmasa bolo poklwk sunam mv.

“Kaatoka nonuno miangnv vdw so gv akonyika mvngnyekalo mabvka. Ngo nonua mindu, bunugv nyidogindung ngv lokia nyidomooku lo doonv ngo Abu gvlo dooming gvnya dunv.
Nyia Kuunyilo ngv nyekunv vdwa ringlin tvkubv aapv kunv.

“Noogv achiboru ngv nam rinyingla rimur dubolo, vngla ninyigv rimur a kaatam laka. Vbvritola um nonyi anyi gv pingkolo risila rila ka. Nw noogv minam a tvvdu boloka, no noogv achiboru a ria yaala paakor pvku.

“Okv vkvlvgabv ngo nonua mindunv: nonu sichingmooku so ogugo maakv vrikudw hum nyido mooku toloka maakv vrikunv, okv nonu sichingmooku so ogu gonyi vkv vrikudw hum nyido mooku toloka vkv vriku.
“Okv ngo nonua minta jidunv: Vdwlo nonu sichingmooku so anyi gunv tolwk minsula ogugonyi kumridw, hum nonugv lvgabv ngoogv nyidomooku gv Abu ngv rijireku.

ogulvgavbolo Nyidomooku gv Karv ngv svbv ridunv. Kvlokvcho dvbv ako dooto, nw ninyigv pakbu vdwgv narnamha kaaka dukubv mintoku.

Ngoogv nam aya mvngpanam aingbv, no pakbu ajin a aya mvngpa rungse gui.’

Nyitvnv nyi angv vdwlo hum tvvtokudw nw mvngrula vngyu toku ogulvgavbolo nw achialvbv nyitvto.

Nw lamtv adar hoka koksitkokrik singnv nvgo kaapala ho aalwk toku, vbvritola ogu guka kaapama anvv vmwng. Vkvlvgabv nw singnv nga minto, “No vdwlo lvkoka asi svvlin kumare!” singnv nvngv vjakgobv sinyuk toku.
Lvbwlaksu vdwv hum kaatokula tvngarvnga nyatoku. Bunu tvkato, koksitkokrik singnv ngv vjakgobv oguaingbv sinda yinv gubvri?”
Jisu mirwkto, “Ngo nonua jvjvbv midunv, vdwlo nonu mvngsarmanam go kamabv mvngjwng bolo, nonu ka rilare ngoogv so koksitkokrik singnv nga rinam aingbv. Okv svbv mwngchikma, vbvritola nonu vbvka so gv moodw a minyure, ‘Gudungla no atuv svmasa bolo orlwksuto vbolo,’ hv vbv rijire.
Nonuno mvngjwng bolo, nonu ogugo kumla koopvdw um paare.”
Jisu Pwknvyarnvnaam lo aakur toku; okv ninyigv tamsar rilo, nyibu butvnv vdwv, nyigagaatv vdwv nw gvlo aala tvvkato, “No ogubv mvngla so vdw sum rimin dunv? Nam svbv rila dubv yvvla tujupkunam a jinv ngv?”
Jisu bunua mirwkto, “Ngo nonua gaamgo tvvkare, okv nonuno nga mirwk bolo, ngo ka so vdw sum ogubv rila dunvdw um ngo nonua minjire.
Jon gv baptisma jinammv ogolokv aapvnv: hv Pwknvyarnv gvlokv aapv nvri vmalo nyi gvlo kri?” Bunugv aralo larrap minsuto, “Ngonu ogugo mirwksidubv? Ngonu Pwknvyarnv gvlokv, vla mirwk bolo, nw ngonua minre, vbvrinamv, ogulvgabv nonu Jonnyi mvngjwng mapvnv?”
Vbvritola ngonu ‘Nyi gvlokv’ vla minse ngaaka busudo, ogulvgavbolo mvnwngngv Jonnyi nyijwk akobv mvngnya dukunv.”
Vkvlvgabv bunu Jisunyi “Ngonu chimakv” vla mirwk toku. Okv nw bunua mintoku, “Ngooka nonua minjimare ngo so vdwsum ogubv rila pvnvdw.”
“Vjak, nonuno ogugo mvngdu? Ho hoka nyi ako dooto, hv kuunyilo anyigo dooto. Nw achiyagv dookulo aala okv minto, ‘Kuunyilo, silu no anggor rongo vlo vngla riteka.’
‘Ngo vngnwng ma,’ vla hv mirwkto, vbvritola koching so hv mvngdin lakula vngtoku.
Vbvrikunamv abu angv kuunyilo gunvlo vngla vbvdvdvbv mintoku. ‘Tamsarbo, vkv vla mirwkto, vbvritola nw vngmato.
Yvvla anyi lokv abu gv mvnglwkbv rinv angv?” “Achi ya angv,” vla bunu mirwkto. Vkvlvgabv Jisu bunua mintoku, “Ngo nonua minjidunv: Lampu naayanv okv yookar nvngv nonua Pwknvyarnv gv Karv tolo vngchoyare.
Jon nonu gvlo aala alvnv lamtv nga naamu dubv kaatam jitoku, okv nonuno ninyia mvngjwng mato; vbvritola lampu naayanv vdwv okv yookarnv vdwv ninyia mvngjwng toku. Okv um nonu kaagv rilaka, nonu koching so ka mvngdin nyama okv ninyia mvngjwng kuma.
Jisu minto, “Kvvbi minchisinam godv tvvrianyato. “Kvvlo gwngda mooku atu go dooto, nw anggor rongo go mvlwkto, hum svlung rakyumto, anggor nyumjik dubv ungrung ako dupv toku, okv kaaria nvdubv aokoloknv taabio go mvtoku. Vbvrikunamv nw anggor rongo nga rwktin tinlwk pikula adubv moing vngyu toku.
Vdwlo anggor naakumdwv aato kudw, nw ninyigv nyira vdwa rwktin vdwgvlo anggor naakum kunamha ninyigv baak am naarwk modubv vla vngmuto.
Rwktin vdwv ninyigv nyira nga naatung toku, akonyi dvngto, kvvbia mvkito, okv kvvbi gunyi vlwng orkito.
Lvkodv nyi angv nyira vngmuto, vngcho monam vdwa kaiyanv go, okv rwktin vdwv ho vdwaka vbvdvdvbv mvritto.
Ataranya ngaku nw ninyigv kuunyilo nga bunu gvlo vngmu toku. Nw mintoku, “Bunu ngoogv kuunyilo nga jvjvbv mvngdv yiku nvpv.”
Vbvritola rwktin vdwv vdwlo kuunyilo nga kaapa tokudw, bunu mimi sunyato, ‘Si atu gv kuunyilo ngv, klai mvki laju ninyia, okv ngonu ninyigv yikungyira nga paadu kubv!’
Vkvlvgabv bunu ninyia naatungla anggor rongo agum bv dvlin la okv mvki toku.
Jisu tvvkato, “Vjak, vdwlo anggor rongo atuv aarikunyi ho rongo rwktin vdwa ogubv mvri kudw?”
Bunu mirwksito, “Nw jvjvbv ho nyi alvmanv vdwa mvki reku, okv anggor rongo nga naala kula ninyigv paasv nga jidw lo jilwk jikunv kvvbi rwktin lo tinlwk reku.”
Jisu bunua minto, “Darwknv Kitaplo ogugo minpvdw um nonu vdwloka puri rikw mapv nvri? ‘Naam mvnv vdwgv arin kaama vla toa kunam vlwng ngv mvnwngnga arin doyachoknv gubv ritoku. So si Ahtu gv riku namv; si achialvbv kaasartabo rungnv goku!’
“Okv vkvlvgabv ngo nonua minjidunv,” Jisu mindvjito, “Pwknvyarnv gv Karv nga nonu gvlo konga naalakula okv alvbv apwasi svvlin jikunv nyi vdwlo jireku.”
Yvvdw so vlwng aolo lo hopv rinv hv atung ayung reku; okv vlwng angv akonvgv aolo hopv ridw hum amwkamak dubv mvreku.
Nyibu butvnv vdwv la okv parisis vdwv Jisu gv minchisila minam a tvvtokula nw bunugv lvkwng nga mindu nvgo vla tvvchin nyatoku,

Jisu minchisinam lokv minvla nyi vdwa minto.
Nyidomooku gv Karv ngv svbv ridunv. Kvvlo dvbv ako dooto, nw ninyigv kuunyilo gv lvgabv nyida dvpam go pamgvto.
Nw ninyigv pakbu vdwa nyi goknam vdwa dvpam lo aalwk tokukv vla minpa modubv vngmu toku, vbvritola nyi goknam vdwv bunu aalwk nwngma toku.
Vkvlvgabv nw kvvbi pakbu gunyi nyi goknam vdwgv lvgabv svbv gaam milwk gvrila vngmu toku: ‘Ngo dvpam gv dvnamtvngnama vjak mvpvripv pvkunv; ngoogv svbv svv ngaaka dintwkbv twkpv pvkunv, okv ogumvnwng nga mvpvripv pvkunv. Nyida dvpam lo aalwk nyala kukv!’
Vbvritola nyi goknam vdwv um tvjvkamv nyato okv bunugv pwsepaase lvkwnglo vngnya toku: akonv nw gv rongolo vngtoku, kvvbiv ninyigv dukan lo,
kvvbi gunv pakbu vdwa twkbwng gvrila dvngla, okv bunua mvki nyatoku.
Dvbv ngv achialvbv haachi toku; vkvlvgabv nw ninyigv sipai vdwa vngmutoku, bunu vngla gwngrw gwnv vdwa mvki toku okv bunugv pamtv nga ramyok jitoku.
Vbvrikunamv nw ninyigv pakbu vdwa goklwkla bunua mintoku, ‘Ngoogv nyida dvpam a vjak mvpvripv pvku, vbvritola ngoogv nyi goknam vdwv sum aala dvyin nvbv rima.
Nonu vjak namrwk pinkobv vngnyila nyi kaapanv dvdv nga goktv kuka.’
Vkvlvgabv pakbu vdwv namrwk vdwgv pingkobv vngla bunugv nyi kaapanam mvnwngnga alv jvka alv majvka gokkumto; okv nyida naam lo nyi vdwv yarbing toku.
“Dvbv ngv nyi goknam vdwa kaabv vngtoku, nw nyi ako nyida vji kooma nvgo kaapa toku.
‘Ajin, no nyida vji koomabv oguaingbv so aapvnv?’ Vla dvbv ngv ninyia tvkatoku. Vbvritola nyi angv oguka mirwk simato.
Vbvrikunamv dvbv ngv pakbu vdwa mintoku, ‘Ninyia lvpa okv laakka leetoka, okv agum gv kanv kolo orlwk tvkuka. Hoka nw ninyigv hijung nga kotwkkrwkla kapla dooreku.’”
Okv Jisu minyabv mintoku, “Mvnwngnga gokpv, vbvritola darnamv miang gomwng.”
Vbvrikunamv Parisis vdwv vngyu laku okv Jisunyi tvunam lokv tvgvrikula kupdubv vla rungtoku.

No nyi gv lvgabv Pwknvyarnv gv jvjvnv mvngnam lvkwng nga tamsardu, nyi vdwv ogugo mvngdudw hum chigamrai madu, ogulvgavbolo no nyi gv kai miang nga kimado.
Vbvrikunamv, no ogubv mvngdu, ngonugv Roman Dvbvyachoknyi lampu jinam si ngonugv Pvbv nga rinying dunvri ma rinying madunvre?
Jisu, ogubv rijvka bunugv alvmabv rungnam a chintoku, okv vkvlvgabv nw minto, “Kaakudvbv rinv nonu! Nonu ogulvgabv nga kupdubv rikw nyadunv?
Lampu jise lokdwng nga kaatam labv!” Bunu lokdwng chargo nw gvlo bvnglwk jito,
okv nw bunua tvvkato, “Si yvvgv nyukmu ngvla aminv?”
Bunu mirwk suto, “Dvbvyachok gv.” Vkvlvgabv Jisu bunua minto, “Alvdo, vbvrinamv, Dvbvyachok gvnga Dvbvyachoknyi jilaka, okv Pwknvyarnv gv-nga Pwknvyarnvbv jilaka.”
Vdwlo bunu sum tvvtokudw, bunu lamngak toku; okv bunu ninyia kayu pikula vngtoku.
Nyi si sitokula lvko turkur kumadunv vla minv Sadusis mego ho alu Jisu gvlo aato.

Vjak, achiboru kanw go soka doodung nvgo. Achi yachok angv nyimv naatoku okv umvuu dooma dwbv sitoku, vkvlvgabv ninyigv hvngmi nga hvkvgv boru hv nywng mvtoku.
Vbvdvdvbv boru anyi nvnv loka ritoku, aom nvnv loka, okv Anyungnga achiboru kanw mvnwnglo.
Ataranya ngaku mvvga nvngv sitoku.

Jisu bunuam mirwkto, “Nonu achialvbv mvngmurdu! so si ogulvgavbolo nonuno Darwknv Kitap a vmalo Pwknvyarnv gv jwkrw nga chimanam lvgalo.
Sinv ngv vdwlo turkur rikunyi, bunu nyidogindung jvbv ridunv nyimv nyilo bv naami siku madunv.
Vjak, sinv ngv turkurkunam sum: Pwknvyarnv gv nonua minpv jinam a nonuno lvkoka puri rikw mai? Nw minto,
‘Ngo Abraham gv Pwknvyarnv ngv, Isaak gv Pwknvyarnv ngv, okv Jakop gv Pwknvyarnv ngv.’ Nw turnv vdwgv Pwknvyarnv ngv, sinv gvngvma.”
Vdwlo nyipam v sum tvvtokudw, bunu ninyigv tamsar nama tvvla lamngak nyatoku.

okv bunugv lokv akonv, Pvbv tamsarnv ako Jisunyi tvunam go tvvgv rila mingkup dubv vla rikwto.
Hv Jisunyi tvvkato, “Tamsarnv, Gamkinam gv aralo ogolo angv gamlo yachokkv?”

So si kaiyachoknv okv dinchi yachoknv Gamki namv.
Anyinvbv gamlo yachokkv si: No atubongv oguaingbv paksu dudw vbv namrwk ajin a paklaka.’
Moses gv Pvbv mvnwng ngvla okv nyijwk mvnwng gv minam v so gv Gamkinam anyi gv arwnglo doodunv.”
Vdwlo Parisis mego aakum nyato kudw, Jisu bunua tvvkato,
“Nonuno Kristo gv lvkwng nga ogubv mvngdu? Nw yvvgv husi bv ridunv?” “Nw Dabid gv husi bv ridunv,” vla bunu mirwkto.
Jisu tvvkato, “Vbvrinamv, ogulvgabv Dabidnyi Dow hv ninyia Ahtu vla mimu pvnv? Dabid mintoku,
‘Ahtu ngoogv Ahtunyi minto: Ngo no gv nyimak vdwa no gv lvpa lvkwnglo pvma dvdvlo ngoogv lakbik tangv so dootoka.’
Vbvrinamv Dabid ninyia ‘Ahtu’ vla minpv bolo, oguaingbv Kristo Dabid gv husi bv ridubv?”
Jisunyi yvvka gaam gamgo ka mirwk nyuma toku, okv ho alu lokv yvvka Jisunyi tvu dubv choopu nyuma toku.
Vbvrikunamv Jisu nyitwng ngala okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa mintoku.
“Pvbv tamsarnv vdwv la okv Parisis vdwv Moses gv Pvbv nga miriadubv tolwkkunam vdwvku.
Vkvlvgabv nonuno bunugv ritokv vla minam a tvvrung tvka; vbvrijvka, bunugv rinam a rimwng gvyoka, ogulvgavbolo bunu oguaingbv japdudw vbv bunu rima.
Bunu nyi vdwgv nangkulo ai ngv baknyu madubv baknam go mvlwk jido, ho gv bakjinama baknam lvgabv bunu ridur dubvka lakching ngvka chikka madu.
Bunugv rinam minam mvnwngngv nyi vdwa kaakudubv vla rinam gomwng. Kaatoka bunu darwknv Kitap lokv akor a chartv dubv lvktola atubogv toktam lo lvngbwnglo gvnam a, okv kaadvtvka vji jenyam a asukoyo dubv gvnam a.”
Bunu dvpam tvngpam lo alvyachoknv dooku a doonwng nyadu okv Jius kumkunaamlo dooku a atu tola gakchodu;
Bunu bajar lo mvngdvla salaam mvrwk konwng do okv “Tamsarnv” vla mingku nwngdo.
Nonuv “Tamsarnv” vla mirung mase ngv, ogulvgavbolo nonuv tamsarnv akin gomwng doodu okv nonu mvnwngngv achiboru hvku.
Okv nonuno sichingmooku so yvvnyika ‘Abu’ vla miyoka, ogulvgavbolo nonugv abuv akin gomwng nyidomooku tv doodunv.
Vmaloka nonuno ‘Rigvdakgvnv’ vlaka minse mangngv ogulvgavbolo nonugv rigvdakgvnv Kristo akin mwng.
Nonu mvnwng lokv yvv kaiyachokbv ridunv, hv miang nvgobv rirunglaka.
Yvvdw atubongv kainvgobv mvsu dunv, hv miang nvgobv rire, okv yvvdw atubongv miangbv mvngsudunv, hv kainvgobv rireku.
“Vdwnvgo achialvbv mvngru runam gubv rirekunv, Pvbv tamsarnv okv Parisis kaakudubvrinv nonu lo! Nonu nyi vdwgv kaagialo nyidomooku gv Karv nga mvtum nvngv, okv nonu atuv aama gvri okv nyi v aadu bv vla rikw nvnga ka aamu magvri!
Pvbv tamsarnv okv Parisis kaakudubvrinv nonu achialvbv mvngru runam gubv rire! Nonu hvngmi vdwa riging nvminla okv bunugv naam nesung nga dvritpaapi jila, okv kumrinyi tvvpa modubv vla asu dubv kumla! vbvrinam lvkwngbv nonugv hirukaya hinse ngv achialvbv alvmanv gubv rireku!
“Pvbv tamsarnv okv Parisis kaakudubvrinv nonu achialvbv mvngru runam gubv rire! Nonu nyi ako naalwkkunam lvgabv svmasa vdwa durapla okv mooku mvnwngnga vngbo nyala; okv vdwlo hum rijik rikudw, nonu bunua lvnyi yago uyumooku bolo vngmu dubv mvyadu, nonu atubongv bolo vngrung jinv aingbv!
Kanvpvram lo vnggvnv nonu, achialvbv mvngru runam gubv rire! nonu tamsardo, ‘Yvv akonv Pwknvyarnvnaam lo milv mvngdunv, hv ogu arin kaama, okv yvvdw ain nam Pwknvyarnvnaam lo bvnglwkla milv dunv, hv milvnam lo doorung dunv’ vla.
Nyikchingnv nonu! ogulo angv dinchiyanv, ain vri vmalo ain nam darwk dubv mvnv yugwng yangvri?
Nonu vbvka tamsardu, ‘Yvvnyi gonv Pwknvyarnvnaam lo amin bvnglwkla milv dunv, hv milvvnam gv anyung kaama; vbvritola nw amin go bvnglwkla milv dubolo hv milv namgv anyung doodunv.’
Achialvbv nyikchingnv nonu! ogulo angv alvyanv, amin vri vmalo amen nam darwk monv yugwng vri?
Vkvlvgabv vdwlo akonv Pwknvyarnvnaam lo milv rikudw, nw hum okv ho gv doonv amin mvnwng ngaaka milv dukunv;
okv vdwlo nw Pwknvyarnvnaam lo milv rikudw, nw Naam haka okv hoka doonv Pwknvyarnv nyika milv dukunv;
okv vdwlo yvv nyidomooku a milv nvbolo, nw Pwknvyarnv gv dooging nga okv ho doonv nw nyika milv dukunv.
Pvbv tamsarnv okv Parisis kaakudubv rinv vdw nonu achialvbv mvngru runam gubv rire! nonuno pwnampaanam lokv miangjeka vring lokv akin jinam a jibwng gvri, nonunogv nayam lokv ujiuu miang nvnga ka, vbvritola nonu pvbv lokv dinchi nvnga rimadu hv minkiam miriam manam, aya minsunam, okv alv minsunam, sum nonu rirung svngv, akonyika kayu mabv.
Kanvpvram lo vnggvnv nonu! Nonu nonugv tvngku lokv tanyik jarlwk nvnga naala naa gvri, vbvritola kemel go dvmit gvri!
Pvbv tamsarnv okv Parisis kaakudubvrinv vdw nonu achialvbv mvngru runam gubv rire! Nonu nonugv taali koobu gv agum a harkak do, vbvritola arwng ngv mvvnamrunam mv okv atu mvngwngbv rimin kunam mv awyaje duku.
Nyikchingnv Parisi nonu! Koobu arwng nga kakcho tvka, okv vbvrikubolo agum hvka darwk minggv riku!
Pvbv tamsarnv okv Parisis kaadubv rinv, nonu achialvbv mvngru runam gubv rire! nyibung nga tanu piaknam jvbv ridu, hv agum hv kaarinyi kaapudo vbvritola arwng ngv svma alo ako ngvku yaaku nvngv doodu.
Hvkv aingbv, nonu agum lo mvnwngnga alv nvgubv kaatamdo, vbvritola arwnglo nonuno tanyumtaa ngv rimur doomur v awyaje duku.
Pvbv tamsarnv okv Parisis, kaakudubv rinv nonu achialvgo hirukaya hinre! Nonu nyijwk vdwgv lvgabv alvnv nyibung mvdu okv nyi alvbv svngto kula sinv vdwgv nyibung ngaaka kaapu alvbv kaau pvvnamgo mvdu.
Okv nonuno mindu, nonu nonugv abuapa vdwgv doori ho doonv guilo, bunugv rinam aingbv nyijwk vdwa gwngrw gwma dunvpv.
Vkvlvgabv nonuno nyijwk vdwa gwngrw gwnv gv husi gubv minduku.
Vbvrikunamv, vngnyila nonugv abuapa gv rirap kunam a rime tvkuka!
Tabw nonu okv tabw vdwgv umvuu vdw nonu! Nonuno oguaingbv miyakaya nama paala uyumooku bolo ima rinvpv vla dvmin dunv?
Okv vkvlvgabv ngo nonua hum minpa jidunv, ngo nonu gvlo nyijwk vdwa vngmure okv chinv mvngnv vdwa okv tamsarnv vdwaka; nonu bunua kvgonyi mvkire, kvgonyi daapo lo takire, okv kvgonyi Jius kumkunaamlo svnyakpare, okv bunua banggu lokv banggu gunvlo charare.
Vbvrikunamv, alvnv nyi mvnwngnga gwngrw gwnv vdwa mvritririt svngv nonu gvlo doolwkre, alvnv Abelnyi gwngrw gwnam lokv naalayila Berukia gv kuunyilo Jakarianyi nonugv Pwknvyarnvnaam gvla yugwng gv pingko lo gwngrw gwkunamv.
Ngo minam gvbv nonua jvjvbv minpa jidunv: So gwngrw gwnv mvnwngnga mvritririt svngv vjakgv nyi vdwlo doolwk rikunv!
“Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Nonu nyijwk vdwa mvkito okv Pwknvyarnv gv nonu gvlo gindungpingko vngmunam vdwa nonu vlwng orkito! Vdwnvgo ngo noogv nyi mvnwngnga laakhv laakyum dubv ridukubv, poruk roknv gv ruu vdwa ninyigv laap lokv lapyumnam aingbv, vbvritola nonu ngam vbv rimuma!
Okv vkvlvgabv nonugv Pwknvyarnvnaam ma toapagga laku oguka dooku mare.
Vjakgv lokv rila, ngo nonua mindunv, vdwlo nonu, “Ahtu gv amin lokv aanv nga Pwknvyarnv boktalwkji laka” vla mima dvdvlo, nonu nga vdwloka lvkodv kaapa kumare.
Jisu Pwknvyarnvnaam ma vngyula vngrilo ho ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv aala ho gv naam vdwa kaakw tvkv vla ninyia mintoku.
“Umkv” vla nw minto, “Nonu so mvnwng sum kaanammv alv rungpv. Ngo so nonua minpa dunv: So gv vlwng pwgoka dooku lo doobwng kumare; bunu mvnwngnga ngorlula ngorra rikunv.”
Jisu gv Olib moodw lo dootung rilo, lvbwlaksu vdwv aasila nw gvlo aatoku. Bunu ninyia minto, “Ngonua minpalabv, vdwlo so minam vdw si ritv tvdunv, okv noogv aadw hvku okv so si sichingmooku gv ataranya aluv vla kaachin dubv ogugo ritv tvdunv.”
Jisu bunua mirwkto, “Nonuno hima kaaya sutoka, yvvnyika mvvkup rikup koyoka.
Nyi achialvgo, ngam mingingnv vdwv, aare okv minre, ‘Ngoonv Kristo!’ okv bunu nyi achialvgo mvvkupre.
Nonuno nyimak gv sudu pvbinna, adubv okv nvchibv tvvpa tvdu kunv; vbvritola adwkaku mabvka. Hvkvnvngv rirungjinv, vbvritola hv bunu ataranya alu hv aarikunv vnam kaama.
Diringmooku vdwv mvmi sireku, Karv vdwv pami sireku. Hoka dvmayarwng ngv okv moobi hv mooku mvnwnglo rireku.
So ogumvnwng si kuu bvngtubvngke bv bvngrinyi, achichinam apiabv rire.
“Vbvrikunamv nonua mvritririt dukubv okv mvki mvmar dukubv laklwk reku. Nyi vdw mvnwngngv ngoogv lvkwnglo nonua kaanwng kumare.
Hvbv ririlo achialv nyi go bunugv mvngjwng nga ngoomu reku; bunu koa minsureku okv kaanwng kumabv rimi sireku.
Vbvrikunamv mvvnvrunv nyijwk vdwv aalwk reku okv achialv nyi go mvvkup rikup reku.

Jisu okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv Kaparnaum banggu lo aatoku, okv akonvgv Jius Doonualu lo Jisu Jius kumkunaam lo vngtoku okv tamsar rapto.
Nyi vdwv ninyigv tamsar nama tvvla lamrwpanyato, oglvgavbolo nw pvbv tamsarnvbv mimabv tojupkunam jvbv tamsar yato.
Vjakgobv bunugv Jius kumkunaamlo ho alvmanv dow v nyi ako gvlo aakunamv nw gamtv rungbv segokto,
“Najaret gv Jisu No ngonu gvlo ogugo naadubv? No ngonua soka mvyakmvchak dvbvri? Ngo chindu no yvvdw—No Pwknvyarnv gv darwknv gindungpingko ngv!”
Jisu gamki la dow a minto “Mimabvk, no nyi lokv liro tokuk!”
alvmanv dow v ho nyi ham achirungbv hwkdin moto okv gamtv rungbv segok moto, okv nyi lokv lintoku.
Nyi mvnwngngv achialvbv lamrwpanya lakula akin-akin v mirwk minsu raptoku, “Si ogu goda? Si re jvjvbv ogu gonyi anw bv tamsarnamv? So nyi angv si tojupkunam go nw alvmanv dow vdwaka kaanam namla do okv bunuka ninyia tvvjidu!”
Okv vkvlvgabv Jisu gv lvkwng yunying ngv Galili gv mooku mvnwnglo baapu bv dupwng toku.
Jisu okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv Jems okv Jon bunyia mintala, Jius kumkunaam ha kayupila okv vngdavngrala Saimon okv Andriu gv naamlo vnglwkto.
Saimon gv ayu gadw lo ramla lvvmala dooto, Jisu aachi sopikda, bunu ninyia hvkvgv lvgabv minjito.
Jisu ninyigvlo aato, laak lokv gakbwngto, okv ninyia ridurla dakrap dubv svyinto. Ramnam hv nw lokv ngetoku, okv nw bunua jiraphorap toku.
Doonyi v poklwkro kochingbv ariumrikulo hoka nyi vdwv lvvmanv mvnwngnga okv vram naanam nyi vdwa Jisu gvlo aagvjito.
Banggu hokv nyi mvnwngngv aakumla naam agi lo dakpamto.
Jisu awgo nvgwngnv lvvma nvnga mvpujito okv awgo uyuvram haka chara jito. Nw uyuvram vdwa gaam milin momato, ogulvgavbolo bunu chinsuto nw yvvdw.
Aru gonvgv arukamchi bv puaharing madvbv kanv dvdubv, Jisu gudungla okv naam lokv vngtoku. Nw banggu ha vngboto jimiku mooku golo, hoka nw kumto.
Vbvritola Saimon la ninyigv ajin vdwv vnglinto Jisunyi makarbv,
okv vdwlo bunu nw a kaapa tokudw bunu minto, “Mvnwng hv nam kaakardu.”
Vbvrinamv Jisu mirwksito, “Ngonu vngrung laju kvvbi dokardovr nampum vdw soka. Ngo bunugv lvgabv japtam jidubv, ogulvgavbolo ngo hvkv lvgabv aapvnv.”
Vkvlvgabv nw Galili mookulo mvnwngnga vnggola okv ho vdwgv Jius vdwgv kumkunaamlo mingojito okv uyuvram vdwa charkak jito.
Apin hv yaarikla arwnam lvvmanv nyi go Jisu gvlo aato, lvbwng ngv kumpvto, okv mvdur lvgabv ninyia dinchi rungbv koto. “No mvnggilo,” nw minto, “No nga darwk dubv mvlare.”
Jisu aya mvngpato, okv ninyigv laak v ilindola nyi ham mambwngto. “Ngo mvnggidu,” nw mirwk toku. “Darwk tokuka!”
Vjakgobv nyi agv lvvma ngv ngetoku, okv nw darwk toku.
Vbvrinamv Jisu ninyia kadwk rungbv minto okv ninyia vjakgobv vngmu toku
ninyia “Tvvtoka, so gv rinam sum yvvnyika mintam mabvka,” vla mingv rikula. “Vbvritola nyibu gvlo vngdavngra laka okv ninyia no jwngkadaka kolaka; hvbv rigvrila nyichar mvnwngnga no poorung pvku vla chimu laka, Moses gv ortojinam lokv erinpeelwk a rinto laka.”
Vbvritola nyi angv vngtoku okv minrap toku Yunying nga mooku mvnwnglo dupwng motoku. Nw vbv achialvbv minkunamv Jisu ka banggu lo nyi ha kaapa kodubv vngnyu kumato. Vmabvya, nw agumlo jemataiku mookulo dootoku, okv mooku mvnwng gv nyi vdwv nw gvlo aakumto.
Alu lonyi loom gv kochinglo Jisu kaparnaum lo vngkur toku, okv ho nw naam lo doopvkv vla yunying ngv dusik toku.
Vkvlvgabv hoka nyi vdwv achialvbv aakum kunamv aronv karchung goka dooku mato, okv agi gv agum loka dooku kaamato. Jisu bunua doin japjito.
Vdwlo nyi api v aalwk tokudw, digwngnv nyi go Jisu gvlo joolwk toku.
Nyi twngtv kunam lvgabv, ogubvrijeka, bunu nyi um ninyi gvlo aagv nyumato. Vkvlvgabv Jisu ogolo doopvdw ho tintwbv bunu namwng aolo ungko go mvko toku. Vdwlo bunu mvko tokudw bunu nyi a ninyigv joko lo karmu tvla soolu jitoku.
Bunugv achialvbv mvngjwng kunam a kaagv rikula, Jisu digwngnv nyi anga minto, “Ngoogv kuunyilo, noogv rimur vdwa mvngnga jipvkun.”
Pvbv tamsarnv megonv ho vdwv doodum tvla bunu mvngsu nyato,
“Ogubv so nyi si svbv gaam minladunv? Si Pwknvyarnvnyi nyarjitari namgo! Pwknvyarnv akin mwng yvvdw rimur ham mvngnga ladunv!”
Vjakpi gobv Jisu chintoku ho vdwgv ogugo mvngnam am, vkvlvgabv nw bunua minto, “Ogubv nonu vbv mvngdunv?
Vbvri minpubv minla, so digwngnv nyi sum, ‘No gv rimur vdwa mvngnga pvkunv,’ vmalo mindubai, ‘Gudunglak, naaraplak noogv karpunvnv nga, okv vngkarto’?
Vbvrijvka Nyia Kuunyilo ngv nyiamooku so rimur ham anyubv kayu jidubv tojupkunamv doodu hum ngo kaatam dubv rinam go.” Vkvlvgabv nw digwngnv nyi a minto.
“Ngo nam mindu, dakrap tvkuka, naaraplak noogv karpunvnv nga, okv naam lo vngnyikuka!”
Vbvririlo ho mvnwngngv kaadumto, nyi angv dakrap laku, ninyigv karpunvnv nga naarap toku, okv baapubv vngtoku. Bunu mvnwngngv lamngaknyato okv Pwknvyarnvnyi hartvla, minto, “Ngonu vdwloka svkvnvgo ogugoka kaakw mapvnv!”
Jisu Galili svparsvlv adarlo lvkodv aakur toku. Nyitwng go nw gvlo aakumto, okv nw bunua tamsar rapto.
Nw vbv vngrilo, nw kaapato lampu naakumyanv, Lebi Alpius gv kuunyilo, ninyigv opislo dooto. Jisu ninyia minto, “Nga vngming gvto.” Lebi gudungto okv nw a vngming gvtoku.
Kochinglo Jisu Lebi gv naamlo dvnam dvla dooto. Twngtv rungnv lampu naakumyanv okv toa kunam nyi vdwvka Jisunyi vngming gvto, okv ninyi gvlo megonv aapwngto okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv tvbul adarlo dooto.
Pvbv tamsarnv nyi mego, Parisis nyi vdwv, Jisunyi lampu naakumyanv vdwa okv toa kunam nyi vdwa lvkobv dvdubv kaapato, vkvlvgabv bunu ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa tvuto, “Ogubv nw vkvnv nyi vdwa lvkobv dvdunv?”
Jisu bunuam tvvpato okv mirwkto, “Nyi ngv yvvbunudw chvrv nvngv Daktor a dinchima, vbvritola yvvbunudw lvvmanvngv mwng. Ngo mvngdvnv nyi vdwa gokbv aamato, vbvritola rimurnv vdwa.”
Doopam gulo Jon gv rigvnam vdwv la okv Parisis vdwv bunu yikla doonyato. Nyi megonv Jisu gvlo aato okv ninyia tvuto, “Si ogu vdw Jon gv lvbwlaksu vdwv la okv Pharisis gv lvbwlaksu vdwv yikla doogvre, vbvritola no gvngv dooma dunv?”
Jisu mirwkto, “Nonuno nyidalo doonv vdwa dvmatvngma bv vngmu dukubv dvmin dunvre? Hvbv rirung mare! Makbu v doodv dvbv bunuam, bunu hvbv rimare.
Vbvritola alu go aariku makbu a bunugv loka vnggv roriku, okv vbvrikubolo bunu ho yigrap reku.
“Yvvka vji jenw ariap ham vji jikulo hamtak lwknv kaama; Vbvrikubolo ninyigv jenw hamlwk namv takche rikunyi takgv riku okv ungko ngv kootv yayare.
Yvvka anggor ala anw ham pumchup akulo pwlwknv kaamare; vbvribolo anggor ala anw ngv pumchup aku lo hupokre, okv anggor ala ngvla pumchup v alv mariku. Vmabvya anggor ala anw a pumchup anw lo pwlwk yadunv.”
Jius Doonualu golo Jisu radv rongo apum gulo vngpitla vngto. Nw gv lvbwlaksu vdwa lvkobv vngming gvto, bunu radv damw dooku ham gakbwngla pikrap nyatoku.
Vkvlvgabv Parisi vdwv Jisunyi minto, “Kaato laka, noogv lvbwlaksu vdwv jius Doonualu lo vbvrinam si ngonugv Pvbv nga rinyingdu!”

hoka nw vngtoku Pwknvyarnv gv naamlo okv dvtoku Pwknvyarnv gvlo kumlwknam vtwng nga. Svbvrito vdwlo Abiatar nyibu butvyachok bv ririlo. Ngonugv Pvbv ara lokv nyibu vmwng vtwng nga dvnyu nvngv—vbvritola Dabid um dvtoku okv ninyigv nyi vdwaka jita toku.”
Okv Jisu minya toku, “Nyi si Doonualu lvgabv mvvma; Doonualuv nyi gv alvnam lvgabv mvpvnv;
Vkvlvgabv Nyia Kuunyilo ngv Doonualu gvka Ahtu hv.”
Vbvritola Jisu lvkodv Jius kumkunaamlo aato kuring, ho hoka nyi go dooto hv laak v lakpik nvgo.
Hoka Jisunyi rimur nvgobv vla minjinv nyi mego toyala dooto; Vbv bunu Jisunyi nyi anga Jius Doonualu lo mvpu ridw vla kaagapla doyato.
Jisu nyi anga minto, “Aatoka kaagia so.”
Vbvritola nw tvuto nyi vdwa, “Ogugo ngonugv Pvbv ngv rimudunv Jius Doonualulo? Ridur dubvri vmalo ridur madubvri? Nyi gv singdung nga ringdubvri vmalo ngoomu dubvri?” Vbvritola bunu oguka minkuma.
Jisu haachila bunuam kaitto, vbvritola vjakgobv nw bunua aya mvngpa toku, ogulvgavbolo bunuv achialvbv vlwnghapok bv gvvnyadu okv rimur nyadu. Vbvrikunamv nw minto nyi anga, “Noogv laak v laklinto.” Nw laklinjito, okv hv lvkodv alvtoku.
Vkvlvgabv Parisis vdwv Jius kumkunaam lokv lintoku okv Herod gv nyi vkv lvkobv kaarwksuto, okv bunu Jisunyi mvkidubv rungrap toku.
Jisu okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv Galili gv svparsvlv lo vngtoku, okv kairungnv nyitwng go ninyia vngming gvto. Ho vdwv Galili lokv aatoku, Judia lokv,
Jerusalem lokv, Idumia mooku lokv, Jordan svko chaagu takdv lokv, okv mooku dokarku Taire okv Sidon Pamtv lokv. So nyi mvnwngngv Jisu gvlo aato ogulvgavbolo bunuv ninyigv rinam a tvvpato.
Nyitwng v achialvbv twngtvto ho Jisu minto ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa svpw ako ninyigv lvgabv naapv jidubv, vkvlvgabv ho nyi vdwv ninyia chapma dubv.
Nyi achialvgo nw mvpu kunamv, okv lvvmanv mvnwngngv nw gvlo aala mvsit dubv vla nvngpin nvngyin minsula aanyato.
Okv vdwlo alvmanv dow gvnv nyi vdwv ninyia kaapa tokudw, bunu ninyigv kaagialo guplwkla okv goklinto, “No rung Pwknvyarnv gv Kuunyilo ngv!”
Jisu alvmanv dow vdwa nw yvvdw um yvvnyika minpa mabvkv vla kadwk rungbv mintoku.
Vbvrikunamv Jisu yvvnyi vnggvnvpv mvngpvdw goklaila moodw putung golo chaato. Bunu hoka nw gvlo aato,
Okv nw darlinto vring gola anyigo, yvvnyi nw Apostol vla amin minpvdw. “Ngo nonua darlin pvnv nga lvkobv ridubv,” Nw bunua minto. “Ngo ka nonua agumlo japdubv vngmure,
okv nonu gvlo uyuvram vdwa charkak nvnv jwkrw v doore.”
So vring gola anyi si ninyigv darlinnam: Saimon (Jisu Pitar vla ninyia amin minto);
Jebedi gv kuunyilo Jems okv ninyigv boru Jon (Bunuam Jisu Boanarjes vla amin minto, vnam si “Doogumbv rinv nyi v”);
Andriu, Pilip, Bartolomiu, Metiu, Tomas, Alpius gv kuunyilo Jems, Tadius, Saimon Ringrianv
Okv Judas Iskeriot, yvvdw Jisunyi koanv.
Vbvrikunamv Jisu naam vngtoku. Lvkodv nyi twngtv rungnvgo aakumto ho Jisu okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv dvdw doomato.
Vdwlo ninyigv lvga nga vpin v hum tvvpapvdw, bunu ninyia naatung dubv rito, ogulvgavbolo nyi vdwv minto, “Nw suru duku!”
Pvbv tamsarnv mego Jerusalem lokv aala minto, nw gv arwnglo Biljebul doopv! So si uyuvram vdwgv dvbv ngv yvvdw nw a gwlwk jigvrila bunuam agumlo chara dubv jwkrw jipv nvgo.
Vkvlvgabv Jisu bunuam nw gvlo goklwkto okv bunuam minchisinam go minto: “Oguaingbv Uyu ngv atubonga chara nyudubv?
Mooku gonv yakpin sisula v pami sikubolo hv yagiak reku.
Vpin gonv yakpin sisula vpin akonyi pami sikubolo, v vpin v yagiak reku.
Vkvlvgabv uyu gv karv ngv apumbv yakpin sikubolo, v vdwloka hvngdwng mare, vbvrikubolo yagiak reku okv ala ngeriku.”
“Gwlwknv nyi a leepv choma bolo yvvka hvkvgv naam a mvkola aala oguogua naanyu mare; leepv chobo lomwng naam loka naala vnggv nyure.”
“Ngo nonua jvjvbv mindu, nyi vdwgv rimur mimur rinam mvnwng okv Pwknvyarnv nyika ogu minyingminchu milin nama mvngnga nyudunv;
Vbvritola yvvnyiv Darwknv Dow a minyingminchu nvnga vdwloka mvngnga nyumare, oglvgavbolo nw doobwngnv rimur a ripv.”
(Jisu gv sum minam si ogulvgavbolo nyi twnggonv, “Nw gvlo darwkmanv dow v doodu” vnam lvgabv.)
Vbvrinamv Jisu gv, anv la okv boru vdwv vngchito. Bunu naam gv agumlo dakto okv ninyia tvvkarla gaam gamgo milwkto.
Hoka nyitwng go Jisunyi dookarto, okv bunu ninyia minto, “kaalak, noogv anv okv noogv boru vdwv okv noogv bormv vdwv agum v bunu nam dinchipv.”
Jisu mirwk suto, “Yvv bunula ngoogv anv ngv? Yvv bunula ngoogv boruv?”
Ninyia dokarnv nyi mvnwngnga nw kaitkarto okv minto, “Kaato! Si bunu ngoogv anv okv boru vdwv!
Yvvbunudw Pwknvyarnv gv mvnglwkbv ridunv hv bunu ngoogv anv, ngoogv bormv, boruv.”
Lvkodv Jisu Galili Svparsvlv adarlo tamsar rapto. Nw a ho dokarnv nyitwng v achialvbv twngtvto vkvlvgabv nw svpw arwnglo chaala dooto. Svpw v arwng kiambv vnglinto, okv nyitwng v dakto isi sidar biyagilo.
Nw bunua awgo tamsar dvla minchisinam vkv minvla minjito:
“Tvvto! Kvvlo nyi ako dooto nw radv chibv vnglinto.
Vdwlo nw amw vdwa rongolo chiak rapto kudw, kvgonv lamtvlo olinpvto, okv pvta vdwv aala okv hum dvtoku.
Kvgonv lvngtak lo holula hopvto, hoka kvdw achakgo dooto. Amw v ainbv boklin toku ogulvgavbolo kvdw v rungrwng mato.
Agar miami v rungrwngbv harlwkku kaama laila vbvrinamv, vdwlo doonyi v chaalin tokudw agar a kaayok toku; okv ogulvgavbolo miami v rungrwngbv kvdwlo aamato, agar v baapubv sintoku.
Kvgonv tvv apumlo holwkto, v singtoku okv agar a yuptoku, okv bunu oguka dape peelin mato.
Kvgonv hooluto kvdw alvyaung kolo, okv agar v baapubv garlinto, singto, okv dape peelin toku: kvgonv dasum chaam go kvgonv chamkv, okv kvgonv lwngbv.”
Okv Jisu minya toku, “Vbvrinamv, nonuno nyarung doodu nvlo, tvvtoka!”
Vdwlo Jisu akin tokudw ninyigv minam a tvvnv nyi kvgonv bunu lvbwlaksu vring gola anyi gv lvkobv aala ninyia minchisinama minbwk jilabvkv vtoku.
Jisu mirwksito, “Pwknvyarnv gv rungrwng rungnv Karv gv lvkwng nga nonua jiroku. Vbvritola kvvbinyi vdwv, ogumvnwng nga minchisinam lokv tvvdunv,
vkvlvgavbolo, ‘Bunu kaadv-kaadv la kaare, vbvrijvka kaapa mare; okv tvvdv-tvvdv la tvvre, vbvrijvka tvvchin mare. Vkvlvgavbolo bunu chinv guilo bunu Pwknvyarnvnyi dakrwk dukunvpv, okv nw bunua mvngnga jidu kunvpv.’”
Vbvrinamv Jisu bunuam tvvkato, “Nonu minchisinam sum chimadunvri? Vbvrikubolo nonu oguaingbv kvvbi minchisinam go chindubv?
Amw paknv Pwknvyarnv gv doin a pakje jito.
Kvgonv nyi v ho lamtvlo amw hosoknam jvbv; bunuv baapubv doin a tvvdasopitda, Uyu ngv aareku okv hung naala vnggvreku.
Kvgonv nyi v amw v lvngtak aolo hopvnam jvbv. Bunuv baapubv doin tvvdasopitda bunu himpula hum tvvrwksito.
Vbvritola bunulo rungrwngbv aalwk manam lvgalo, okv bunu vdwloka hvngdwng mare vkvlvgabv vdwlo adwkaku v vmalo mvdwkmvku v aarikudw doin lvga lokv, bunu vjakgobv kayudariku.
Kvgunv nyi v tvv hvdwnglo amw holwk nam jvbv rido. So vdw sinv yvv doin ham tvvdunv,
vbvritola mvngrudu so singse lvgabv, nyitv lvgabv pakyado, okv nvgwng a mvngbiula nyitwng arwnglo okv doin a ngemu duku, okv bunu asi svlin kumanv.
Vbvritola kvgonv nyi v alvnv kvdw lo amw paknam jvbv rito. Bunu doin a tvvgapto, hung tvvrwksito, okv asi svlinto: kvgonv chaam bv, kvgonv chamkvbv, okv kvgonv lwngbv.”
Jisu minbwngto, “Nyi akonv mvdurrupum ako naalwkla okv hum bati kyampwk takmamla vmalo gadw gv kyampwk lo vvpv dvnvri? Hum tunggingnvnv gv aolo nw vvpv madunvri?
Ogugo vvsi pvdw hum agumlo bvnglinla mvko riku, okv ogugo takmam pvkudw v takmam kumare.
Vbvrinamv, tvvto nonuno nyarung doodu nvlo!”
Nw bunua lvkodv mindvto, “Alvbv tvvgapto ogugo no tvvpvdw! Ogu kiinvnv lokv no nyi ham jwngkadaka dvdw vbv kiinvnv lokv Pwknvyarnv ka nam jwngkadaka—vbvritola humka kaiyanvgo rire.
Nyi v yvvdw ogugo doodudw hum kaiyago jire okv nyi v yvv ogugoka domapvdw vkvgvlo achukgo doonam haka naarit reku.”
Jisu minbwngto, “Pwknvyarnv gv karv ngv svbv rido. Nyi akonv ninyigv rongolo amw paklwkkto.
Nw ayulo yuptoku, alu dukubv v gudung toku, okv vbvririlo amw mvnwngngv boksula okv garrap toku. Vjvka um nw oguaingbv ridu nvdw um chinkuma.
Kvdw v atubongv singnv a singmusido okv asi a svlin mosudo. Atukchochukbv radvdada ngv, okv danv ngv, okv ataranyabv dape mvnwng a kaapado.
Vdwlo radv ngv kamkubolo, nyi v parap toku hum ninyigv rioktung lokv, ogulvgavbolo rongo mvdw dw v aatoku.
“Pwknvyarnv gv Karv ngv svbv rido vla ngonu oguaingbv minsedw?” Jisu tvuto. “Ngonu hum ogugonyi minchisinvla minbwk jidubv?
So si svbv ridu. Nyi akonv yingmw go naato, nyiamooku gv amw charching yachoknv, okv um kvdwlo lvvlwk toku.
Ayungjvma nga v singcha toku okv singnv mvnwngnga kaiyachok nvgobv ritoku. Hv hakbv ngv vbv kairungbv harlin toku ho pvta ngv aala bunugv asup vdwa ho gv doonyum lo suplwk toku.”
Jisu ninyigv doina nyi vdwlo japjito, mintaknvto awgo kvvbi minchisinam sibe minvla; nw mintamto bunua vkamgo bunu tvvchin nyodudw.
Nw ogugoka mimato bunua minchisinam mintak mabv, vbvritola vdwlo nw akinpvdw lvbwlaksu vdwa lvkobv, nw ogumvnwng nga bunua minbwk jitoku.
Ho alu akin gv arium hoka, Jisu ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa minto, “Klai svparsvlv takdv gonv durap linlaju.”
Vkvlvgabv bunu nyitwng nga vngyu toku; lvbwlaksu vdwv Jisu gv doolwkku svpw lo aalwk mingvto, okv bunu ninyia bunugv lvkobv vnggv toku. Kvvbi svpw vdwvka hoka dooto.
Dvminmabv kairungbv doori v rirapto, okv sikiok v svpw arwnglo kioklwkto, vkvlvgabv isi v hoka yarbing tvvtoku.
Jisunyi svpw arwng gv koching kiambv dooto, nw domtom golo dumpo ngv dumpv tola yupminto. Lvbwlaksu vdwv ninyia muuto okv minto, “Tamsarnv, no ngonua mvngpa kumare ngonu sida jiku nvlaka?”
Jisu dakrapto okv dooria mintoku, “Choibv dooto!” Okv nw minto sikiok aka, “Doochingbv dooto!” Doori v ringin toku, hoka kairungbv jematai toku.
Vbvrikunamv Jisu ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa minto, “Ogubv nonu busu nyadunv? Vjaklodvbv nonu nga mvngjwng malare?”

Noogv mvngnama Jentail vdwa loung bv kaatam svnga okv noogv Israel nyi vdwlo yungnam gobv naalwk jise nga.”

Okv vbvrila kaatamre bunugv mvngsila mvngnama. Okv mvngdwkkv, noogv atubogv haapok am rioktung ripunv ako nwkko sunam aingbv rire.”

Nyi opi dvdv ngv Pwknvyarnv gv ringlinbaalin a kaapa reku!’”

Nyitwng ngv achialv twngtv kunam lvgalo, bunu ninyia ogoloka arwnglo joolwk jiku mapa matoku. Vkvlvgabv bunu ninyia namwng aolo joocha toku, namwng nga mvkoto, okv ninyia gadw aolo doomu tvla soolu jitoku nyitwng gv pingkolo Jisu gv kaagialo.

Pvbv tamsarnv vdwv okv Parisis vdwv bunu atu v minrap nyato, “Yvvla so nyi si svkvnvgo nyarjitari dunv! Pwknvyarnv mvngchik rimur vdwa mvngnga mvngdunv!”
Jisu bunugv mvngnam a chintoku, okv bunua minto, “Ogubv nonu svkvnvgo mvngdunv?
So si minpubv minse gure, ‘Noogv rimur vdwa mvngnga ropvku,’ vmalo miya svgure ‘Gudung gvrila okv vnglakuka’?
Vbvrinam v, ngo nonua himpa more, Nyia Kuunyilo ngv siching gwngda so jwkrw doodunv rimura mvngnga dubv.” Vkvlvgabv nw digwngnv nyi um minto, “Ngo nam mindunv, gudungto, noogv kartaknvnv nga naarapto, okv naam bv vngnyiku!”
Vjakgobv nyi mvnwnggv kaagialo nyi angv gudung toku, ninyigv dootak kartaknvnv nga naatoku, okv Pwknvyarnvnyi hartvla, naam bv vngtoku.
Bunu mvnwng ngv achialvbv kaangak tangak nyatoku! achialvbv busu datoku, bunu Pwknvyarnvnyi hartv yingla minto “Ngonu silu kaasartabo rungnvgo kaatokubv!”
So kochingbv, Jisu agumlo vnglinto, okv lampu nakumyanv nyigo kaapato aminv Lebi, ninyigv opislo dooto. Jisu ninyia minto, “Nga vngming gvlaak,”
Lebi gudung datoku, ogumvnwngnga kayu toku, okv Jisunyi vngming gvtoku.
Vbvrikunamv Jisu gv lvgabv Lebi ninyigv naamlo kainv dvmam go mvpvtoku, okv goklwknam nyen lokv lampu naakumyanv nyi ngv twngtv yato okv kvvbi nyi hvkv ta.
Parisis nyi megola okv Pvbv tamsarnv nyi mego bunugv apumlo rinvgo bunu Jisu gv lvbwlaksu vdwa miakaayala minto, “Nonu ogubv lampu naayanv vdwa okv toa kunam nyi vdwa dvbam tvngbam dunv?” vla bunu tvuto.
Jisu bunua mirwkto, “Yvvnyi hv chvrv nvngv daktor lodanv mvngma dvnv, vbvritola v bunu mwng yvvbunudw lvvma dunv.
Mvngdwnv nyi vdwa mvngdin modubv ngo aama, vbvritola toa kunam vdwgvbv.”
Nyi mego Jisunyi minto, “Jon gv lvbwlaksu vdwv yikla dookidu okv kumdakumra dvkv, okv Parisis vdwgv lvbwlaksu vdwvkam vbvridu; vbvritola noogv lvbwlaksu vdwv dvki okv twngki nyadu.”
Jisu mirwkto, “No vbv dvminchok dunvri nyidalo makburiji bongngv najibongv okv ninyigv ajin vdwa doodv mogvrila nyen vdwa ogu dvmatvngma bv vngmu dubvi? Vdwloka vbvrirung mare!
vbvritola vkvnv alu hv aare vdwlo makburiji bongngv bunugv lokv naarorikudw vbvrikubolo ho bunu yikrap reku.”
Jisu mindvjito bunua so minchisinam sam: “Yvvka vji jenw nga ariap go pulinla jekulo hamtak lwknv kaama. Nw vbvrikubolo vji jinw nga takmure, okv ho jinw ariap v jekulo ape simare.
Yvvka anggor ala anw nga anggor ala aku pumchup lo pwtamlwknv kaama, ogulvgavbolo vbvribolo pumchup hv takla anggor ala ngv yarpok linla pumchup hv alv kumare.
Ho mabvya anggor ala anw nga pumchup anw lo pwlwk rungsego!
Okv yvvka anggor ala aku tvnggvrila anw lodanv vla mvngmadvnv. Nw mindu, ‘anggor ala aku v alvyadu.’”
Jius Doonu alu golo Jisu ampu rongolo vngkarto. Ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv aam amring nga puik gvrila, lakchulo nepung gvrila achar ha dvto.
Parisis nyi mego tvvkato, “Nonu ngonugv Pvbv lo no Jius Doonualu lo riyoka vnam ham ogubv ridunv?”
