Nw Pwknvyarnv gv naam arwnglo aatoku, Pwknvyarnv gvlo tolwk jinam dvnam ham naatoku, hum dvto okv hum ninyigv nyi vdwaka jitato. Kvvbi nyi gv lvgabv hv ngonugv Pvbv nga rinying kunamv nyibu mvngchik um dvnam um dvmwng dunv.”
Okv Jisu minyala minto, “Nyia Kuunyilo ngv Jius Doonu alu gv Ahtu hv.”
Jius Doonualu gonvnga Jisu Jius kumkunaam lo vngtoku okv tamsarto. Ho nyi ako dooto ninyigv lakbik laak angv digwng nvgo.
Pvbv tamsarnv nyi megonv okv Parisis nyi megonv Jisunyi gungnying lwkdubv rimur lodanv mvngto, vkvlvgabv bunu ninyia Jius Doonualulo mvpu gvi jibvre vla kaagap jinjinla kaariato.
Vbvritola Jisu bunugv mvngnam ha chinto okv nyi anga minto, “Dakrap tvka okv kaagia so aato.” Nyi angv gudungto okv hoka daktoku.

Nw bunu mvnwngnga kaagapla kaagoto; vbvrikunamv nw nyi anga minto, “Noogv laakkv laklinla lakrapto.” Nw vbv rijito okv ninyigv laakkv lvkodv alv tuku.
Bunu achialvbv sakcha toku okv Jisunyi bunu ogugo rila rikunvdw vla bunugv apumlo tvukapak minsi raptoku.
Ho dw lo Jisu kumdubv vla moodw golo chaatoku okv ayu hoka Pwknvyarnvnyi kumyingla dooto.
Vdwlo alu hv loolin tokudw, nw ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa nw gvlo goklwk toku okv bunu vring gola anyia dartoku, bunua Apostol vla amin mintoku:
Saimon (Yvvnyi Pitar vla nw amin minpvkudw) okv ninyigv boru Andriu; Jems okv Jon, Pilip okv Bartolomiu,

Judas Jems gv kuunyilo, okv Judas Iskeriot, yvvdw kupnv gobv rikunv.
Vdwlo Jisu moodw lokv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa lvkobv ito kudw nw mooringku gulo dakto achialvbv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa lvkobv nyi nyitwng twngtv nvgo hoka aato Judia gv mooku mvnwng lokv, okv Jerusalem lokv, okv svtvpambw adar aigv pamtv Taire okv Sidon lokv.
Bunu nw gvlo tvvdubv aato okv yvv bunua alvmanv dow vdwv mvdwkmvku pvkudw bunuka aatoku okv mvpu tuku.
Nyi mvnwng ngv ninyia mvsit dubv vla rikw nyato, ninyi gvlo jwkrw v linla okv bunu mvnwngnga mvpu toku.
Jisu ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa kaagapto okv minto, “Heemanv vdwv nonu mvngpuv; Pwknvyarnv gv Karv ngv nonu gvngv!”
“Vjakgv kanonv vdwv nonu mvngpuv; nonua dvji more!” “Vjakgv kapdunv nonu mvngpuv; nonu nyormin reku!”
“Nyia Kuunyilo gv lvgabv, nyi vdwgv kaanwng manam nonu, toa kunam nonu, mvngsa kunam nonu okv alvma vnam nonu, mvnwngngv mvngpuv!
mvngpu laka vdwlo hv vdwv rirekudw, himpula harkwpajok laka, ogulvgavbolo kainv yikungyira go nonugv lvgabv nyidoomooku lo vvpv jido. Bunugv abuapa vdwvka vbvdvdvbv nyijwk vdwaka rito.”
“Vbvritola vjak yvv nyitv dunv nonu vdwgo mvngdwk rekudw; nonu himpula singcho ropvku!”
“Vjakgv kitvdvlvnv nonu vdwgo mvngdwk rekunv; nonu kanola vngreku!” “Vjakgv nyorminnv vdw nonu vdwgo mvngdwk reku; nonu mvngdwk reku okv kapreku!
“Vdwlo nyi mvnwngngv nonua hartv redw mvngdwk hvla; Bunugv abuapa vdwvka vbvdvdvbv mvvnvrunv nyijwk vdwaka rito.
“Vbvritola nga tvvnv vdwa ngo nonua mindu: Nonua nyirunv vdwa pakto laka, alvnvgo riji laka yvvdw nonua kaanwng madunv,
nonua beenv vdwa boktalwkji yalaka, okv nonua alvmabv rinv vdwgv lvgabv kumto laka.
Ako nvgonv nam nyukmu tagonyi svbiak boloka ninyia nyukmu tagonyika svbiak modvlaka; ako nvgonv noogv jvtvlaklwk a naapv bolo, ninyia noogv lwkjar aka naamu laka.
Jilaka mvnwngnga nonua ogugo koopvdw, okv vdwlo akonv nonugv yikungyira nga naapv bolo, um kookor kuyoka.
Kvvbi nyi gv lvgabv riji laka no bunua noogv lvgabv oguaingbv rijilabv mvngdudw.
“Nonuno nonua paknvrinv nyi vdwa pakmwng bolo, nonu oguaingbv boktalwkji namgo paadubv? Rimurnv vdwvka bunua paknv nga pakrwksidu!
Okv nonuno nonua alvbv rinv vdwa alvbv rimwng dubolo, nonu oguaingbv boktalwkji namgo paadubv? Rimurnv vdwvka um risugvrila!
Okv nonuno yvv gvlo paakor reku mvngnam ma naarrwk nyumbolo, nonuno oguaingbv boktalwkji namgo paadubv? Rimurnv vdwvka rimurnv vdwlo jinama paakor rungreku mvngla narrwk dunv!
Ma! nonua nyirunv vdwa pakto laka okv alv nvgo bunua riji laka okv paakor reku mvngma bvka. Vbvribolo nonu kairungnv amin go paare, okv nonuno kaiyachoknv Pwknvyarnv gv kuu bv rire. Nw kaalwkmabv rinv haka okv alvmanv haka ayadu.
Noogv Abu oguaingbv aya dudw vbv no ayanvbv rilaka.
“Kvvbia jwngkadaka mabvka, okv Pwknvyarnv nam jwngkadaka mare; kvvbia miakaya mabv, okv Pwknvyarnv nam miakaya mare; kvvbia mvngnga laka, okv Pwknvyarnv nam mvngnga re.
Kvvbia jilaka, okv Pwknvyarnv nam jire. Jvjvrungbv, no lvvpok dubv paarungre, ayabv ridur nama, noogv laaklo joolwk jire—no vdwgo bvngla dvdw. Noogv kvvbia kiinv nvnga hum Pwknvyarnv nam kiinv nvre.”
Okv Jisu so minchisinam sam bunua minjito: “Nyikchingnv akonv vdwloka akonyi vnggv nyulamare; nw vnggvbolo, anyiv ungrung golo hoolwkre.
Tamsarnam vmiv tamsar sarnv nga kaiyama doonv; vbvritola tamsarnam vmiv, vdwlo nw risar minsar nama rinya rikudw ninyia tamsarnv aingbv ridukunv.
“No atubogv nyikgv nyikrw nga mvngmabv, ogubv no noogv achiboru gv nyikgv nyikrw nga kaadunv?
No oguaingbv noogv achiborunyi minladubv, achiboru, klvi, noogv nyikgv nyikrw nga ngam naalin molabv, vjakgobv no atubogv nyikgv nyikrw nga kaapa magvrila? Kaakudubvrinv no! no atukchochukbv no atubogv nyikgv nyikrw nga naapak chotoka, okv vbvrikubolo no noogv achiboru gv nyikgv nyikrw nga kaabwk riku okv hum naapak nyureku.
“Baboknv singnv ngv alvmanv asi svvma dunv, yaagampolonv singnv ngv vdwloka alvnv asi svvma dunv.
Asi svvlinnam lokv singnv mvnwngnga chindunv; No tanyum nyumki singnv lokv koksitkokrik pulama vbvmalachin hakar lokv anggor gvma dunv.
Alvnv nyihv haapok lokv alv nvnga mvnglin rilindo, alvmanv nyi ngv arwnglo alvmabv mvngkum nama mvnglin rilindo. Haapok lo ogugo mvngkum pvdw vbv gaam lo milindo.
“Okv ngoogv minam a rima gvrila, nonu nga ogubv ‘Ahtu, Ahtu,’ vla gokdunv?
Yvv akonv ngoogvlo aala ngoogv gaam a tvvdunv okv um ridunv ngo nonua kaatamre hv yvv aingbv ridunv.
Hv nyi ako ninyigv, naam ha, vlwng aolo achialvbv ungrung runglwkla okv mvnv aingdo. Isi hv achialvbv tvvlula okv naam ha tvvgingto vbvrijvka bidubv mvnyu mato, ogulvgavbolo hv alvrungbv mvnam lvgabv.
Vbvritola yvv akonv ngoogv gaam ha tvvgvrila okv hum rimanv hv vkv aingbv rido, nyi ako ninyigv naam ha alvrungbv mvmabv; vdwlo isi hv tvvlu tvkudw ho naam ha tvvgingto hv vjakgobv taba tuku—okv hv achialvbv alvmabv yaknamgobv ritoku!”
Vdwlo Jisu so gv minse mvnwngnga nyi vdwa minya jito kudw, nw Kaparnaum bv vngtoku.
Roman nyigam ako hoka pakbu go dooto hv ninyia achialvbv mongrumara lo aanvgo; hv nyi angv lvvmato okv sida svngvbv ritoku.
Nyigam angv vdwlo Jisu gv lvkwng nga tvvpa tokudw, nw Jius nyiga vkv vngmuto Jisunyi tvula naam aala okv ninyigv pakbua mvpu modubv vla.
Bunu Jisu gvlo aatoku okv ninyia dinchialvbv minto, “So nyi si jvjvrungbv noogv ridur ha dinchi rungdu.
Nw ngonugv nyi ha ayado okv nw atubongv ngonugv lvgabv jius kumkunaam go mvjito.”
Vkvlvgabv Jisu bunua lvkobv vngming gvto. Nw naam lokv adu kuma toku, vdwlo nyigam angv ajin vkv vngmuto ninyia minpa modubv, “Tamsarnv, atubongv agarapi bv mvsuyoka. Nam ngoogv naamlo aamu dubv ngo alvka yama,
vbvmaka ngooka noogv dookulo nyidum gubvrila aadu bv alvnv nyi bvka riyama. Gaam bv milin jimwng boloka okv ngoogv pakbu hv pooya reku.
Ngooka ngam kaiyanv nyigam vdwgv arwnglo doonv nyi go, okv ngoogv arwnglo ngoogv sipai vdwv doodu. Ngo so anga, ‘Vngto’ vla orto jibolo okv nw vngdu; ngo olo doonv anga ‘So aato’ vla orto jibolo hv aadu; okv ngo ngoogv nyira nga ‘Sum rito’ vla orto jibolo hv um ridu.”
Jisu hum tvvgvrila lamtoku; nw dakkur dakrwk dvla ninyia vngming gvnv nyitwng nga minto, “Ngo nonua mindunv, ngo vdwloka svkvnv mvngjwng go himpa tvvma, Israel arwng so lvrika kaama!”
Jokjiyanv vdwv nyigam gv naam lo vngkur toku okv ninyigv pakbuv chvrv dukubv kaatoku.
Ayung madwbv Jisu Nain vnam banggu lo vngtoku, ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv la okv nyitwng go vngming gvtoku.
Nw banggu gv agi lo aachinam gula, svma bvngla vnglinnv vdwa kaapato. Sinv nyi angv hvngmi gv tumpu hotum gubv rito, okv banggu gv nyitwng twngtv nvgo ninyia lvkobv reming gvto.
Vdwlo Jisu hvngmi a kaapa tokudw ninyigv haapok kv achialvbv ninyia aya kaapa toku, okv hvngmi ha minto “Kapma bvka.”
Vbvrikunamv nw vngsito okv maari ha mvsitto, bvngnv nyi vdwv daktungto. Jisu minto, “Nyi yaapa bongv! gudungto, Ngo nam mindunv!”
Nyi sikunv gudung toku okv gaam raarap toku, okv Jisu ninyia ho anv gvlo jikur toku.
Bunu mvnwngngv busuto okv Pwknvyarnvnyi hartv nyato. “Kairungnv nyijwk go ngonu gvlo aapvku!” bunu minto “Pwknvyarnv aapvku ninyigv nyi vdwa ringdukubv!”
Jisu gv lvkwngbv so yunying si jarkar toku mooku mvnwnglo okv adar aigv mooku lo.
Vdwlo Jon gv lvbwlaksu vdwv so gv ogumvnwng nga mintam tokudw, nw bunu gvlo anyi gunyi gokto
okv bunyia Ahtu gvlo tvvka moodubv vla vngmuto, “No rungri Jon gv aainvkv vla minamv, vmalo ngonu aku kvvbi gunyi kaaya dubvri?”
Vdwlo bunu Jisu gvlo aatokudw, bunu minto, “Jon ngonua nam tvvka jilabv vla vngmupvnv ninyigv aainvkv vnam hv no rungre, vmalo ngonu ako gonyi kaaya segore.”
Hoka dw hoka Jisu lvvmanv nyi mego mvpu toku, bunugv achiayakha, okv alvmanv dow vdwa okv nyikchingnv nyi mego kaapa motoku.
Nw Jon gv gindungpingko vdwa mirwkto, “Vngkur yikuka okv Jonnyi minpa teka no ogugo kaadu okv tvvdu: Nyikchingnv kaapa nyuduku, lvpiknv vngla duku, yvvbunudw apin alvmabv lvvmanv vdwa darwk mopvku, rungjinv vdwv tvvpa nyuduku, sinv vdwa turkur moduku, okv Gamlv nga heemanv vdwlo japji duku.
Vdwgo mvngpuv yvvdw ngoogv lvkwng nga mvngngum madunv!”
Jon gv gindungpingko vdwgv vngro kochingbv, Jisu nyitwng nga japji raptoku Jon gv lvkwng nga: “Vdwlo nonu Jon gvlo chukrimooku lo vnglin rikulo, nonu ogugo kaapare vla dvminpvnv? Nvmwng anw hv doorilo yapchar dubv?
Ogugo kaadubv nonuno vnglin pvnv? Nyi ako vji kaapubv gvnv gore? Vkvnv nyi vji kaapubv gvnv okv himpukain bv doonv vdwa dvbvkarv vdwlo paadunv!
Nga minpalabv, nonu ogugo kaadubv vla vnglin pvnv? Nyijwk akore? Am hv jvbo, vbvritola nyijwk ka achialvbv kaiyanv go nonuno kaato.
Jon Darwknv Kitaplo minpanam akonv: ‘Pwknvyarnv minto, ngo ngoogv gindungpingko akonyi nonu gvlo vngcho more nonugv lvgabv lamtv nga mvkok modubv.’
Ngo nonua mindu,” Jisu mindvto, “Jon kaiyanv singcho dvdvnv nyi lokv. Vbvritola yvvdw Pwknvyarnv gv Karv lo miangdunv nw Jonnyi kaiyadunv.”
Nyi mvnwngngv ninyigv minam ha tvvtoku; bunu okv lampu naayanv vdwv yabv Pwknvyarnv gv jvjvklv nga mvngya kunv okv Jon gvlokv baptisma naakunv vdwv.
Vbvritola Parisi vdwv la Pvbv tamsarnv vdwv nwbunugv lvgabv Pwknvyarnv gv mvngnamha toa tuku okv Jon gvlokv baptisma naamare vtoku.
Jisu mindvto, “Vjak ngo ogugonyi mintaknvla minladubv svjak silugv nyi vdwsum? Bunu oguaingbv ripv?
Bunu piokpamdorpamlo vmi dopamnv aingbv rido. Twnggonv twnggonyi gokdu, ‘Ngonu nonugv lvgabv nyida sidupvbin dumuto, vbvritola nonuno harkw pajokma! Ngonu siinyimar mvto, vbvritola nonuno kapma!’
Jon Baptist aatoku, vbvritola nw yikto okv opo tvngmato, okv nonuno minto ‘Nw gvlo uyuvram doodu!’ vla.
Nyia Kuunyilo ngv aatoku, okv dvto okv tvngto, okv nonuno minto, ‘Kaatoka so nyi sam! Nw dvria nvgo okv tvngria nvgo, lampu naayanv vdwgv okv kvvbi nyi toakunam vdwgv ajin go!’
Pwknvyarnv gv mvnglak kv jvjvrungbv kaatamdu, mvnwng gvlo yvvdw um mvngrwk dvdw.”
Parisis akonv Jisunyi gokto ninyia lvkobv achin dvbam dubv vla, okv Jisu ninyigv naam lo aatoku okv dvdukubv dootung toku.
Ho banggu lo nyimv nvgo rimurla doonvgo dooto. Nw Jisunyi Parisis gv naam lo dvla doodukv vla tvvpato, vkvlvgabv nw pumchup golo nampunv ala vkv akomaring dubv bvnglwkto
okv Jisu gv lvpa koching kiambv lvpa nga ninyigv nyikla ngv sarbum dubv kapla dakto, vbvrikunamv nw ninyigv dwmw lokv Jisu gv lvpa nga tipw to, mopup to, okv nampu nvnga lvpa lo pwke toku.
Vdwlo Parisis angv um kaato kudw nw atubongv minsuto, “So nyi si jvjvbv nyijwk guloka, ninyia gakka nvnga chindu nvpv ogu nyimv gudw; ogu rimur go rila nw svngpv nvdw!”
Jisu gamtv rungbv ninyia minto, “Saimon, ngo nam mintam segu doodukv.” “Vkv, tamsarnv,” nw minto, “Nga mintam labv.”
“Ho hoka nyi anyigo dooto bunyi morko narnv gvlo morko narto,” Jisu minrap toku. “Akonv ninyigvlo ain lokdwng lwngu go narto, okv kvvbi angv chamngu go narto.
Bunyi lokv yvvka ninyia jikur nyuma toku, vkvlvgabv nw bunyi gv dvdu doonam a kayu jitoku. Vbvrikunamv, ogolo angv ninyia kaiyabv ayare?”
“Ngo mvngkanamv,” Saimon mirwkto, “Hv ho angv nvpv yvvnyi kaibv kayu jinam angv.” “No minjwk gvibv,” Jisu minto.
Vbvrikunamv nw nyimv nvnga kaarwk toku okv Saimonnyi minto, “No so nyimv sum kaadure? Ngo noogv naam lo aato, okv no ngoogv lvpa lvgabv isi jimato, vbvritola nw ninyigv nyikla lokv ngoogv lvpa nga harkakto okv ninyigv dwmw lokv hum tipw toku.
No ngam naam lo alvbv aamu rilo moopup mato vbvritola nw ngoogv aaro lokv lvpa nga moopup nama topuma.
No ngoogv dumpo lvgabv olib tvli jimato, vbvritola nw ngoogv lvpa nga nampunv vkv harbum pvku.
Ngo nonua mindunv, vbvrikunamv, nw gv kairungbv aya kaatam kunam si ninyigv achialvbv rimur vdwa mvngnga jipvku vla chimu rungduku. Vbvritola yvvnyi miang go mvngnga jipv kudw miang go aya nga kaatam mvngdo.”
Vbvrikunamv Jisu nyimv nvnga mintoku, “Noogv rimur vdwa mvngnga jipvkunv.”
Tvbul lo doodungnv kvvbi vdwv atu hv minrap suto, “Yvvdw si, rimur haka mvngnga jikunv?”
Vbvritola Jisu nyimv nvnga mintoku, “Noogv mvngjwng ngv nam ringsupvku; alvbv vngnyiku.”
Ayungjvma gv kochinglo Jisu banggu vdwlo okv nampum vdwlo vngkarto, Pwknvyarnv gv Karv lvgabv Gamlv nga japgo jito. Lvbwlaksu vring gola anyi vka ninyia lvkobv vngto,
vkv aingbv nyimv vdw—vka yvv bunua alvmanv dow okv lvvma vdwloka mvpu kunam vdwv: Meri (Yvvnyi Magdalene vla minpvdw), yvv gvlokv uyuvram kanw go charlin pvkudw;
Joana, Yvvgv nyilu ngv Chuja yvvdw Herod gv naamlo nyigam bv rinv; okv Susanna, okv achialv nyimv vdwvka yvv bunu atugv pwnampaanam lokv Jisunyi okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa ridur kunv.
Nyi vdwv Jisu gvlo aadung nyato banggu akonvgv kochinglo akonv; okv vdwlo kairungnv nyitwng gubv vngdum tokudw, Jisu mintoku minchisinam sum:
“Alu golo nyi ako rongolo radv chitv bv vnglinto. Ninyigv vbv rongolo amw chirilo, kvgonv lamtv korpv kolo holula hopvto, okv pvta vdwv um pala dvtoku.
Mego-kvgonv lvngtak aolo hopvto, okv vdwlo amw hv boksu tokudw, bunu sintoku ogulvgavbolo kvdw v dwsidwla kaamato.
Amw megonv yamdwng yamchum tvv pvdwng lo holwkto, hv singnv vdwa lvkobv svngto okv bunua yuptoku.
Okv amw megonv alvnv kvdwlo holwkto; agar v svngtoku okv dabak baklin toku, akin-akinlo lwnggobv dachar charlin toku.” Okv Jisu minyabv mintoku, “Vbvrikunamv, tvvtoka nonuno nyarung gvdubolo!”

okv nw mirwkto, “Pwknvyarnv gv Karv gv arwng gaam vdwa nonua chimu pvkunv, vbvritola kvvbi vdwa minchisinam vdwlo aadunv, vkvlvgalo bunu kaadu vbvritola kaapama, okv tvvdu vbvritola tvvchinma.
“Si ogu hv minchisinam gv lvga ngv: Amw ali vdw hv Pwknvyarnv gv gamchar hv.
Amw lamtvlo hopvnv bunu tvvpvdw; vbvritola Uyudvbv hv aala okv doin a bunugv haapok lokv-nga naaro toku ogulvgavbolo bunua mvngjwng okv ringnam lo doomu madubv vla.

Amw hv yamdwng yamchum tvv vdwlo holwknv hum mindo yvv bunu tvvpvkudw; vbvritola nyitv nyigam okv himpukain bv mvngla mvngdwk hv dooyum laku okv bunua yuptoku, okv bunugv asi hv vdwloka ngimareku.
Amw hv alvnv kvdw lo holwknv hum mindo yvv bunu doin a tvgvrila okv um alvbv haapok lo vvpv gvrila mvnggapla rinv, okv bunu asi svvma dvdvlobv rwkrwk mvbwngto.
“Yvvka mvdurupum a runu gvrila okv bati takmamla vmalo gadw kyampwk lo vvpvnv kaama. Ho mabvdv, nw hum tunggingnvnv aolo vvpv yadunv, vkvlvgavbolo nyi vdwv bunu arwng aarilo loung nga kaapa yadubv.
“Ogugo vvsila vvsum pvpvdw agumlo naakok linreku, okv ogugo takmam pvkudw kaapa reku okv lounglo naalin reku.
“Himasuto laka, vbvrinamv, nonu oguaingbv tvvdudw; ogulvgavbolo yvvdw ogugo doodudw jitam yayare, vbvritola yvvdw arochoko dunv ninyigv achukgo doonv ngaaka dvrit reku.”
Jisu gv anv okv boru vdwv ninyi gvlo aato, vbvritola nyi twngtv kunam lvgabv ninyia vngming gvla nyumato.
Nyi gunv Jisunyi minto, “No gv anv okv boru vdwv agum vka dakdungdu okv nam kaanwng pvkv vla.”
Jisu minto bunu mvnwngnga, “Yvvbunudw Pwknvyarnv gv gaam a tvvgap gvrila ridunv v ngoogv anv ngv okv boruv.”
Alu logo lo Jisu svpw golo dooto ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa lvkobv okv bunua minto, “Klai svparsvlv takdv gonvbv vngrap laju.” Vkvlvgabv bunu vnglinla vngrap toku.
Bunu vdwv dula vngrilo Jisu yuplwk toku. Lamdadubv kairungnv dooridoogum go rilula svparsvlv nga rigingto, okv svpw lo isi hv yarlwk raptoku, vkvlvgabv bunu mvnwngngv achialvbv busu kaapala dootoku.
Lvbwlaksu vdwv Jisu gvlo vngtoku okv ninyia mvu toku, vbv miyingto, “Tamsarnv, Tamsarnv! ngonu sida jikunvkv!” Jisu gudung toku okv dooria gaamgo gamkito okv isi sekiok hwknv haka; bunu ringin toku, okv hoka kairungbv sarsopoyo toku.

Jisu gv isi segumlo korpv rilo, ninyi nyi ako kaarwk sito hv banggu lokv ngv okv nw gvlo uyuvram vdwv dooto. Mvngchi kuma nvgo so nyi si vji koomabv relin nvgo okv naam lo dooma nvgo, okv ninyigv singnam ha nyibung bungpam gv lvngpwk lo relwk nvgo.

Nw vbv minto ogulvgavbolo Jisu uyuvram dow ha ninyigv lokv linro toku vla gamkinam lvgalo. Ninyia achialvgo naatung pvla vvkwto, okv ninyia tumla vka lakuka ninyigv lvpa okv laak ha rwngja lokv leela, nw rwngja nga dokpwkto okv uyuvram hv ninyi mvdok laila chukrimooku bv limuto.
Jisu ninyia tvvkato, “No gv aminv ogu hv?” “Ngo gv aminv ‘Mob’” nw mirwkto ogulvgavbolo uyuvram achialvgo nw gvlo aatoku.
Uyuvram hv Jisunyi koodwkkrwkla kooto bunua dotarkamanv ungrong bolo charlu mabvkv vla.
Ho hoka nvchilo vrik riktwng go reto, moodw lo dvkar nyala. Vkvlvgabv uyuvram vdwv Jisunyi koodwkkrwk la kooto bunua riktwng arwnglo vngmulabv vla, okv nw bunua vngmuto.
Bunu nyi golokv lintoku okv riktwnglo aatoku. Riktwng mvnwngngv chapchar minsula tarakbv riolula svparsvlv lo riolwk nyala sitoku.
Riktwng nga kaayanv vdwv ogugo ripvdw um kaatoku, vkvlvgabv bunu joktoku okv yunying nga banggu okv rongo vdwlo dupwng motoku.

Yvv bunu um kaatokudw nyi vdwa minpa toku nyi angv oguaingbv poyapvku nvdw.
Vbvrikunamv ho mooku lokv nyi mvnwngngv Jisunyi mintoku vngro tokuka vla, ogu lvgavbolo bunu achialvbv busu nyatoku. Vkvlvgabv Jisu svpwlo dootoku okv vngyu toku.

“Naam bv vngkur nyikuka okv minpa laka Pwknvyarnv noogv lvgabv ogugo rijipvdw.” Nyi angv Jisu ninyigv lvgabv ogugo rijipvdw, banggu lo vnggola minkar toku.
Vdwlo Jisu svparsvlv takdv gonvlo rapkur lintokudw, nyi vdwv ninyia alvbv kaarwk toku, ogulvgavbolo bunu ninyia kaaya nyatoku.

Ogulvgavbolo ninyigv kuunyijar akin v, yvvdw anying nyingring gola nyingnyi mwngnv, sitv tvku. Jisu gv vngrilo nyipam hv apum bv ninyigvlo pamlwk nyato vngku mvnwng lokv.
Bunu nyipam lokv anvnyimv nvgo yvvdw oyi sarla lvvma la nyingring gola nyingnyi kunvgo; nw gv paanam mvnwngnga daktor vdwlo mva toku, vbvritola yvvka ninyia mvpu nyumato.
Nw nyipamlo aalwk dabuv Jisu gv kochinglo aalwkla okv Jisu gv vji jvlap a mvsit toku, okv vjakgobv ninyigv oyi sarnam hv sarngin toku.

Vbvritola Jisu minto, “Nyi gunv nga mvsit gvibv, ngo um chinto vdwlo jwkrw go ngo gvlokv lintokudw.”

Jisu nyimv nvnga mintoku, “Ngoogv kuunyijar a, noogv mvngjwng ngv nam alv mopvku. Alvbv vngto kulaka.”
Jisu gv vbv mindung rilo, gindungpingko ako aatoku nyigam gv naam lokv. “Noogv kuunyijar hv siro yikubv,” nw Jairasnyi minto; “Tamsarbonyi vkvnvgo mindwkminku mabvk.”
Vbvritola Jisu um tvvpato okv Jairasnyi minto, “Busu mabvka; mvngjwng mvngtoka, okv nw alv reku.”
Vdwlo nw naam lo aachi tokudw, nw yvvnyika ninyia lvkobv arwng lo aamu mato, Pitar, Jon okv Jems mvngchik okv vmi gv anv okv abua.
Hoka nyi mvnwngngv vmi gv lvgabv kapdungto okv mvngdwk dwkdung nyato. Jisu minto, “Kapma bvka; vmiv siima kv—nyi yupmwng dunv!”
Nyi mvnwngngv ninyi nyarji nyato, ogulvgavbolo bunu chintoku nyijar angv siro pvku vla.
Vbvritola Jisu ninyigv laak a gakbwng toku okv goklinto, “Ngoogv anga, gudungto!”
Nw gv turnam hv aakur toku, okv nw vjakgobv dakrap toku, okv Jisu bunua minto ninyia dvnam go jila dvmuto.
Nyijar gv anvabu hv lamrwpatoku, vbvritola Jisu bunua minggapto yvvnyika minpa mabvka ogugo ripvkudw.
Jisu lvbwlaksu vring gola anyia gokdumto okv rigum minggum nvnv nga jitoku okv uyuvram mvnwngnga charanvnv jwkrw haka okv lvvma vdwaka mvpunvnv nga.
Vbvrikunamv nw bunua vnglin motoku Pwknvyarnv gv Karv lvga nga japji modukubv okv lvvma nvnga mvpu modukubv,
bunua miro kochingbv, “Moing lvgabv ogu guka gvyoka: daadwng gvyo, giagonvnv kochak guka gvyo, dvnam gvyo, morko gvyo, jekok borgu lvvya gvma bvka.
Ogolo nonua alvbv aamu pvdw, ho banggu lokv vnglinma dvdvlo naam akinlo doobwng laka;
Ogolo nyi vdwv nonua alvbv aamu mapvdw, ho banggu ha vngyu laka okv lvpa gv pvmar haka kaklu laka bunua rirw mvrw chonam aing gubv.”
Lvbwlaksu vdwv vngtoku nampum mvnwnglo vnggola, Gamlv a japji toku okv mooku mvnwnglo nyi vdwa mvpu toku.
Vdwlo Herod, Galili ha rigvdakgvnv, ogugo ripv kudw ho mvnwng gv lvga nga tvvpa toku, nw achialvbv abwkmato, ogulvgavbolo nyi megonv minto Jon Baptist turkur pvkukv vto.

Apostol vdwv aakur toku okv bunugv rinam mvnwngnga Jisunyi minpa jitoku. Nw bunuam nw gv lvkobv naatoku, okv bunu atuhv Betsaida vnam banggu akolo vngtoku.
Vdwlo nyipam hv ho gv lvga um tvvpa tvkudw, bunu ninyia vngming gvtoku. Nw bunua alvbv aamu tuku, bunua Pwknvyarnv gv Karv lvga nga japji toku, okv dinchinv vdwa mvpu jitoku.
Vdwlo doonyi hv pokga tvvtokudw, lvbwlaksu vring gola anyiv nw gvlo aatoku okv minto, “Nyi vdwa vngmu tukuka ogulvgavbolo bunu nampum vdwlo okv rongo rwktak vdw soka vngla dvnam okv yupku paamu tvka, ogulvgavbolo so si jvmataiku mooku go.”

(Hoka nyiga vdwv hejar angu gobv ritoku) Jisu lvbwlaksu vdwa mintoku, “Nyi vdwa nyipamlo chamngu-chamngu bv mvgvrila doomu tvka.”
Lvbwlaksu vdwgv svbv mvro kochingbv,
Jisu vtwng takngu okv ngui nvnyi a naatoku, nyidomooku bv kaadung to, um Pwknvyarnvnyi umbonyikv vto, um pimwktoku, okv um lvbwlaksu vdwa jitoku nyi vdwlo ormu dubv.
Bunu mvnwngngv dvtoku okv dvgu nyatoku, okv lvbwlaksu vdwv dvlv nga paapi vring gola anyigo naakum toku.
Alu logo lo Jisu akinv kumla doorilo, lvbwlaksu vdwv nw gvlo aatoku. Nw bunua tvvkato “Nyipam v nga yvv vla mindu?”

Nw bunua tvvkato, “Nonu gvbv oguhv?” “Nonu ngam oguhv vla mindunv?” Pitar mirwkto, “No Pwknvyarnv gv Kristo.”
Vbvrikunamv Jisu bunua mingap linlinla minto sum yvvnyika minji mabvkv vla.
Nw bunua mintato, “Nyia Kuunyilo ngv hinching rungre okv nyigagaatv vdwgv, butv vdwgv, okv Pvbv tamsarnv vdwgv toa kunam gobv rire. Ninyi mvki reku, vbvritola alu loom kochingbv nw turkur reku.”

Vkvlvgabv yvvdw atu atubogv singdung nga singmu nvpv mvngdunv um ngoomu re, vbvritola yvvdw ninyigv singdung nga ngoogv lvgabv ngoomu yadunv um singmu yare.
Nyidum gunv mooku mvnwngnga mvgumrigum gvrila vbvritola nw atu v ngooya kunv gubv vmalo yaaku kunv gubv riku bolo hv ogu tuksarnam go paarikudw? Vbvrirung maare!
Nyidum gunv ngam okv ngoogv tamsar sarlwk nama hinying bolo, vbvrikubolo Nyia Kuunyilo vka ninyia hinying reku vdwlo nw gv okv Abu gv okv nyidogindung gvka kairungnv yunglit gubvrila aari kunyi.
Ngo nonua jvjvbv mindunv ho megonv si doodu bunu simare vdwlo Pwknvyarnv gv Karv nga kaama dvdvlo.”
Lokkanw dvse toku nw gv so ogu a minro kochingbv, Jisu nwha lvkobv Pitarnyi, Jonnyi, okv Jemsnyi vnggvla okv kumdubv moodwlo chaatoku.
Nw gv kumdung rilo, nw nyukmu v angu suto, okv nw gv vjiv yapung toji toku.
Lamdadubv hoka nyi anyigo ninyi lvkobv gaam raami suto. Ho anyiv Moses okv Elija,
bunyiv kairungnv nyidomooku gv yunglit nama kaatam toku okv Jisunyi lvkobv gaam raami suto ninyigv Jerusalem lo sigv rila Pwknvyarnv gv minkipvvnam a baapu alvbv rilin jise gv lvkwngbv.

Nyi anyi gv Jisu nyi vngyu tvrilo, Pitar Jisu nyi minto, “Ahtu, ngonugv so doonam si alvrungnv go! ngonu so taabio aom go biore, akonyi no lvgabv, akonyi Moses gvbv, okv akonyi Elija gvbv.” (Nw ogugo mindungdvdw um alvbv chimato.)
Nw gv vbv mindung rilo, haapam ako kaklwkto okv bunua doonyum bv nyumrum toku; okv lvbwlaksu vdwv busu toku haapam gv vbv bunu gvlo kaklwk rilo.
Haapam lokv gaamgo milinto, “Si ngoogv darnam, Kuunyilo ngv—ninyi gvlo tvvtolaka!”
Vdwlo gaam v minya tokudw, hoka mvnwnglo Jisu akin mvngku. So mvnwng gv lvga nga lvbwlaksu vdwv choibv doobwngto, okv bunu ogugo kaapvdw ho dw hoka yvvnyika minpa mato.
Logo nvnga Jisu okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv moodw lokv lvkwng itoku, okv kairungnv nyipam go Jisunyi kaarwksuto.
Nyipam lokv nyi ako gokto, “Tamsarnv! ngo nam kodwkkrwkla koodunv, ngoogv kuunyilo nga kaakato—ngoogv kuunyilo akin a!
Dow v ninyia lamdubv mvrapla okv ninyi semit taplwk modu, vkvlvgabv nw gaam lo sepit taik lindubv mvdu; vbvdvdvbv ninyia achi dubv mvbwngla okv vngnyu madubv ninyia vngmudo!

“Nonu vdwnvgo mvngjwng manv okv rimurnv nyi vdw golaka! ngo nonua lvkobv vdwgo doodubv? Vdwgo ngo nonu gvlo laklwk sula doodubv?” Vbvrikunamv, nw nyi anga minto, “Noogv kuunyilo nga so aagv teka.”
Vmi gv aadungrilo, alvmanv dow hv ninyia kvdw lo hwkluto okv semit taplwk dubv mvtoku. Jisu uyu dow a orto jitoku, vmi a mvpu toku, okv ninyi ninyigv abua jikur toku.
Nyi mvnwngngv Pwknvyarnv gv kairungnv jwkrw a kaala lamrwpanya toku. Nyi vdwv vjaklodvbv lamrwpanyato Jisu gv ogu mvnwng ridung nama, vdwlo nw ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa minto kudw,
“Mvngpa mabv riyoka ngo nonua ogugo mintam tvdudw! Nyia Kuunyilo nga nyi vdwgv laak lo laklwk tvduku.”
Vbvritola lvbwlaksu vdwv chimato ho gv minam v ogu vdw. Bunugv lokv si toosi nam gubv rito vkvlvgabv bunu hum chinyu maatoku, okv ho gv lvga nga bunu ninyia tvvka svngaka busu nyatoku.
Lvbwlaksu vdwv bunugv lokv yvvdw kaiyachok jinv vla larmisinya toku.
Jisu chintoku bunu ogugo mvngdung dudw, vkvlvgabv nw vmi ako naatoku, nw gvlo dakmu toku,
Okv bunua minto, “Yvvdw ngoogv amin bv so vmi sum alvbv torwk sidunv, nga torwk sinamv; okv yvvdw nga torwk sidunv, nga imu nvnga ka torwk sidunv. Vkvlvgabv nonu mvnwng gvlo yvvdw miangyachok dunv hv kaiyachok nvngv.”

Nw gindungpingko vkv vngcho moto, v samaria nampum arwnglo vngto ninyigv lvgabv ogumvnwngnga paala mvkimvak pvvdukubv.
Vbvritola nyi vdwv ninyia naarwk sima toku, ogulvgavbolo ho v nw ninyigv lamtv nga Jerusalem bv vngdu vla abwk toku.
Vdwlo lvbwlaksu Jems okv Jon hum kaatokudw, bunu minto, “Ahtu, no ngonua nyidomooku tolokv vmv go goklu la bunua guyak guchak modubv mvngdure?”
Jisu dakrwk la bunua yamto.
Vbvrikunamv Jisu okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv kvvbi nampum lo vngtoku.
Vbv bunugv lamtvlo bunu vngdungrilo, nyi ako Jisunyi minto, “No Ogolo vngdaka nam ngo vngming gvvre.”
Jisu ninyia minto, “Haaringpaksar ngv ungrung doonyado, okv pvta ngv asup doosu nyadu, vbvritola Nyia Kuunyilo ngv oguloka karku guka okv doonu jiku guka kaayama.”
Nw kvvbinyi akonyika minto, “Nga vngming gvlaak.” Vbvritola ho nyi angv minto, “Tamsarnv, atukchochukbv nga vngkur mola okv ngoogv abunyi svma riiso molabv.”
Jisu mirwkto, “Sinv nga bunugv svma nga risu motoka. No vngnyika Pwknvyarnv gv Karv nga japgo tvka.”
Kvvbinyi akonv minto, “Ngo nam vngming gvvre vbvritola atokchochukbv nga ngoogv vpin a alvbvka vmu labv.”
Jisu nw a minto, “Yvvnyi akonv kvdw a gwor raptokula okv vbvrinamv kochingbv kaakor dvdvnv Pwknvyarnv gv Karv lo rinv nvdu bv rima dunv.”
So kochingbv Jisu kvvbi nyiga vkv chamkanw gula anyi go gokla, nw atu v vngjiku banggu mvnwnglo okv mooku lo anyi anyibv vngcho moto.
Nw bunua minto, “Aam nvvse ngv hoka achialv duku, hum nvvji nvngv miang gumwng. Kumtoka aam atu gv lvgabv nw aam nvvji nvnga vnglin more ninyigv aam nvvse um nvvmure.
Vngnyika! ngo nonua svcha chaapamlo svlar vdw jebv vngmu gvrinvla
Nonu morko vgianvnv, vmalo giagonvgv chapa vmalo lvsup; lamtvlo nyi vdwa alvpvri vla minam a topu mabvka.
Vdwlo nonu naam ako gv arwng aarinyi, atokcho bv minlaka ‘So naam soka mvngpu v lvkobv doolaka.’
Hoka sarsopoyonv nyi go doodu bolo, nonugv sarsopoyo ngaaka ninyigvlo doolwk molaka; vkv kaama bolo, nonugv sarsopoyo nga naakur lakuka.
Ho gv naam akinlo doobwng laka, dvdunglaka okv tvngdung laka oguggo nw nonua jilin dudw, rinv nga ninyigv rijo nga jirung dunv. Naam namgunv lokv kvvbi namgu nvlo vnggo mabvka.
Vdwlo nonu banggu ako gv arwnglo vngrikudw okv alvbv aamu pvkulo, ogu go nonua mvpvripv jipvdw dvlaka,
ho banggu gv lvvma nvnga mvpu jilaka, okv hoka nyi vdwa minlaka ‘Pwknvyarnv gv Karv ngv nonu lo nvchibv aapvku vla.’
Vbvritola vdwlo nonu banggu akolo vngridw okv alvbv aamu mapvlo, vnglin lakuka lamtvlo hoka minlaka,
‘nonugv banggu gv dwmar ngonugv lvpalo doonv haka ngonu nonua rinying bv mvlu jidunv. Vbvritola mvnggap laka Pwknvyarnv gv Karv ngv aapvku nonugv nvchilo!’
Ngo nonua milv jidunv Jwngkadaka Alu lo Pwknvyarnv ho banggu um svnga Sodom a kaiyago aya kaatamre!
“Chorajin! no lvgabv vdwgo mvngdwk dwknam gubv rire, Betsaida! no lvgabvka vdwgo mvngdwk dwknam gubv rire, nonu gvlo lamrwpadubv mvkunam vdwa Taire okv Sidon lo rinv guilo, ho gv nyi vdwv krim doopam dukunvpv, tagiam vjia kooto kula okv mvchu a bunu atu v harbum sitokula, nw bunu rimur lokv mvngdin dukunv vla kaatam bvku ripv kunvpv!
Nonu am svnga kaiyago Pwknvyarnv Taire okv Sidon ha aya kaatamre Jwngkadaka Alu lo.
Karparnaum! Okv no lvgabv, no atu hv nyidomooku ao tolo harsa sidubv mvngdure? Nam uyumooku bolo paalu rinvla!”
Jisu ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa minto, “Yvv bunu nonua tvriadunv hv ngamka tvriadunv; yvv bunu nonua toa dunv hv ngamka toa dunv; okv yvv bunu nga toa dunv hv nga so imu nvngaka toa dunv.”
Nyiga chamkanw kanw gula anyi vdwv aakur toku kairungbv himpula. “Ahtu” bunu minto, “Uyuvram vka tvvdu vdwlo ngonu noogv amin bv bunua mintodw!”
Jisu bunua mirwkto, “Ngo Uyu nga nyidomooku lokv dooriak jvbv hoolu dubv kaato.
Tvriato! ngo nonua jwkrw a jipv kunv, vkvlvgabv nonu tabw vdwgv okv dwkung vdwgv aolo vngla dukubv okv nyimak gv jwkrw mvnwngnga rigum yadubv, okv nonua ogugoka alvmanv rika madubv.
Vbvritola alvmanv dow vdwv nonua tvvdu vla himpu mabvka, vmabvya himpu yalaka ogulvgavbolo nonugv amina nyidomooku tv lvkpv yadu.”
Ho dw lo Jisu himputo Darwknv Dow doonam lvkwng lokv okv minto, “Abu, nyidomooku gvla Sichingmooku gv Ahtu! Ngo nam umbonyika mvngdunv ogulvgavbolo no chima nvnga kaatam jikunam lvgalo noogv chinkichiak okv chinvpanv lokv vvsivrum nama. Vmabv Abu si noogv mvnggv rila rimu nvpv mvngnam a rimunamv.”
“Ngo gv Abu nga ogumvnwng nga jito. Kuunyilo ngv yvvdw um yvvka chinv kaama Abu mvngchik chindu, okv Abu yvvdw um yvvka chinv kaama Kuunyilo mvngchik okv Kuunyilo gv ninyia kaatam dukubv vla darkunam vdwv.”
Vbvrikunamv Jisu lvbwlaksu vdwa dakrwk toku okv bunua minsila minto, “Nonuno gamdak nvgo laka nonugv ogu kaadubv mvngnam a nonu kaapa mindu!
Ngo nonua mintam jidunv vdwnv nyijwk vdwv okv kvvbi vdwv nonugv kaanam um kaanwng nyato, vbvritola bunu kaala matoku, okv nonugv tvvnam hum bunu tvngnwngto vbvritola bunu tvvpa kuma toku.”
Pvbv tamsarnv ako aato okv Jisunyi mingkup tvvto. “Tamsarnv,” nw tvuto, “Turbwngla singnam a paanam lvgabv ngo ogugo rise gubvre?”

Nyi angv mirwkto, “Atunyi, noogv Pwknvyarnvnyi no haapok mvnwng lokv, noogv yalu mvnwng lokv, noogv gwlwk mvnwng lokv, okv noogv mongrumara mvnwng lokv; okv no atu hv oguaingbv paksu dudw vkv aingbv noogv namrwk ajin a pakmi sulaka.”
“No alvbv mingvnyibv,” Jisu mirwk suto; “sum rilaka okv no turriku.”
Vbvritola Pvbv tamsarnv nyi angv atu v abwk nvpv mvngtoku, vkvlvgabv nw Jisunyi tvvkato, “Yvvla ngoogv namrwk doobam ajin v?”

Hum hoka vbv rimutvla lamtv hoka nyibu ako idungto; vbvritola nyibu angv nyi anga vdwlo kaapa tokudw, nw vngyela, kvvbi lamtvbv vngto.
Vbvdvdvbv Libait ako vngtato, vngsito okv nyi anga kaato, okv vbvrikunamv vngyela, kvvbi lamtvbv vngtoku.
Vbvritola samaritan ako ho lamtvlo vngdung nvgo aala nyi angv gv dookulo aato, okv vdwlo nw ho nyi anga kaatokudw, ninyigv haapok hv aya mvngpa toku.
Nw nyi angv gv dookulo aato, nyi angv gv ungvlo tvli okv opo pwbumto okv hum putum toku; vbvrikunamv nw ho nyi a ninyigv svnwng aolo joopvto okv hotel golo baklwk toku, hoka nw nyi anga ringchum yatoku.
Alu logo nvlo nw ain lokdwng charnyi go naalinto okv hum ringchum nvnga jitoku. ‘Ninyia ringchum laka,’ nw ringchum nvnga mintoku, ‘okv vdwlo ngo so lamtvbv vngkur rikudw, no nyi so gv lvgabv ogugo ngoopvdw um ngo nam jireku.’”
Okv Jisu minyabv minto, “Noogv mvngnam lokv, so nyi aom sokv yvvla namrwk ajin jvbv ripvnv dvchonv nyi vdwgv dvngnam nyi anga?”
Pvbv tamsarnv angv mirwkto, “Ninyia ayanv angv.” Jisu mirwkla minto, “Vbvrikunamv no vngnyi, okv vbvdvdvbv rilaka.”
Jisu la ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv bunugv lamtvlo vngrilo nw nampum golo aatoku hoka Marta vnam nyimv go ninyigv naam lo Jisunyi alvbv aamu toku.
Nw bormv ako dooto aminv Meri, nw Jisu gv lvpa lvkwnglo dootola ninyigv tamsar nama tvvriato.
Marta ninyigv gwngserise ngv achialv kunam lvgalo nw timbuto, vkvlvgabv nw aato okv ninyia minto, “Ahtu, ngoogv bormv, nga gwngserise ngv awgo doomu gvrila nga vngyunam sum no kaachin malare? Ninyia ngam ridumdubv mintokv!”
Ahtu ninyia mirwkto, “Marta, Marta! no gwngserise achialv gv aolo timbula okv adwkaku dunvre,
vbvritola akin go dinchi yadu. Meri alvyanv go gakyapv, okv sum nw gvlo vdwloka dvrit nyulamare.”
Alu logolo Jisu mooku golo kumla dooto. Vdwlo nw kumngin tokudw, ninyigv lvbwlaksu akonv ninyia minto, “Ahtu, ngonua kumsar labv, Jon ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa kumsarnam jvbv.”
Jisu bunua minto, “Vdwlo nonu kumrinyi, sum minto: ‘Abu: Noogv darwknv aminv mvngdvnam gubvka; noogv Karv ngv aalaka.
Ngonugv dvsetvngse nga alu-alua jilaka.
Ngonugv rimur vdwa mvngnga jilaka, ngonua rimurnv vdwa ngonu mvngnga jidunv. Okv ngonua alvmanv gwngkarika moyoka.’”
Okv Jisu ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa mintoku, “Svkv aingbv nonu gvlokv akonv ayuyupra nga ajin gv naam lo vngla minre, ‘Ajin, nga vtwng taggom go narlabvkv.
Ngoogv ajin ako moing vngnvgo nw vjakpi ngoogv naam lo aalwkpv, okv ngo ninyigv lvgabv dvnam go dooma!’
Okv svkv aingbv noogv ajin v naam arwng lokv mirwk bolo, ‘Nga no mindwkmingku mabv! vriap agi ngv koktum ropvku, okv ngo la ngoogv kuu vdwv gadw lo doopv kunv. Ngo gudungla nam ogugo jinyuma.’
Alvdo, vbvrikunamv ogugo rire? Ngo nonua minpadu, nw ngoogv ajin v vla gudungla nam ogugo jima jeka noogv hinying mabv koodv-koodvnam lokv nw gudungla nam ogugo jirung reku.
Okv vkvlvgabv ngo nonua mindunv: Kolaka okv no paarungre; makar laka no mapare; takdin laka, okv agi nga no lvgabv kokda pvjire.
Mvnwngngv yvv koodunv hv paadu, okv yvvdw makar dunv mapare, okv yvvdw takdin dunv ninyigv lvgabv agi a kokda pvjire.
Nonu gv abu vdwv yvvla kuu nga vtwng go koomu gvrila tabw go jinv?
Vmalo no ninyia pvpw go koomu gvrila dwkung go jiredw?
No alvmanv gubv rijeka, no chindu oguaing bv alvnvgo kuu nga jise ngvdw. Vbvrikunamv ung achialv kaiyanv go, nyidomooku lo doonv Abu Darwknv Dow a jirungre yvvdw ninyia koodunv!”
Jisu milin momanv uyuvram ako charlin toku; vdwlo uyuvram angv vngro tokudw, nyi angv milin raptoku. Nyipam vdwv lamrwpatoku,
vbvritola megonv nyi vdwv minto, “Si Biljebul pvnv go, uyuvram vdwgv dvbv, v ninyia bunua charanvnv jwkrw a jiriadu.”
Kvvbi vdwv Jisunyi gwngkup dvbv mvngto, vkvlvgabv bunu ninyia lamrwpanam go kaatam labv Pwknvyarnv nam yarlwk pvnvlo vla kooto.
Vbvritola Jisu bunugv mvngnam a chinto, vkvlvgabv nw bunua minto, “Diringmooku gunv atu v apum-apum gubv yakpin sila hv padar minsu kubolo hv vdwloka doobwng lamare; vpin akonv atu v apinain sila rinying minsunv, hv ngoopinngoin dukunv.
Vkvlvgabv Uyu gv karv ngv apum gubvrila padar minsu kubolo, oguaingbv hv doobwng nyudubv? Nonu mindu nga uyuvram vdwa charadu ogulvgavbolo Biljebul ngam jwkrw jinam lokv vbv rimu doonv vla.
Vbv rungbv ngo bunua charlin dunv bolo, nonua reming gvnv vdwv oguaingbv bunua charlindunv? Nonua reming gvnv vdwv nonua rimur do vla gakdu!
Ma ho mabvdv ngo Pwknvyarnv gv jwkrw lokv bunua charlindunv, okv si kaatamdu Pwknvyarnv gv Karv ngv nonu gvlo aapvku vla.”
“Vdwlo gwlwknv nyi akonv, ninyigv panvnaanv nvnga lvkobv doogu sila, atubogv naam a kaaria sikubolo ninyigv yidu vdwv ngemare.
Vbvritola vdwlo nyi gunv ninyia gwlwk yanvgo nw gvlo palwk laku ninyia mvya yaku bolo, atu gv mvngging kunam yidu vdwa gvla yikula okv ogugo dvrit pvkudw orpin-oryin sireku.”
“Yvvdw ngogvbv rima dunv jvjvbv hv nga rinying nvngv; yvvdw nga ridur madunv, naakum nvngv ka jvjvbv ayakapakdu.”
“Vdwlo alvmanv dow v nyidum lokv linri kunyi, hv pvtwngko mooku lo dooku makarla vnggo kardu, hv dooku akoka mapa kuma bolo, hv atu v mindu, ‘Ngo ngoogv naam lo aakur reku.’
Vkvlvgabv nw aakur dukula naam a doin doopa dubv kaapa duku.
Vbvrikunamv vnglinlaku okv ninyia alv mayanv uyu dow kanw go aagv dukunv okv bunu aalaku hoka doolwk duku. Vkvlvgabv vdwlo vbv rirekudw, ho nyi gv rinamdaknam hv kvvlo gvnga kaiyabv alvmayabv ridu kunv.”
Vdwlo Jisu hum minto kudw, nyimv nvgo nyipam lokv goklin la ninyia minto, “Achialv mvngpu v ho nyimv angv nam dwrwboklin la sootv bongv!”
Vbvritola Jisu mirwkto, “Vmabvya, achialv mvngpu v yvvdw Pwknvyarnv gv gaam a tvvdunv okv hum ridunv!”
Nyi vdwv Jisunyi nyipam bv dooyum lvlv toku, nw mimbwngla minto, “Silu meriu gv nyi vdw si achialvbv alvmado! bunu lamrwpanam go koodu, vbvritola Jona gv lamrwpanam a jimwngre kvvbi lamrwpanam yagu bunua jimare.
Ho apiabv nyijwk Jona Ninebe nyi vdwgv kaaringtamanam gobv rito, vkvlvgabv Nyia Kuunyilo vka silu meriu gv nyi vdwgv kaaringtama nam gubv rire.
Jwngkadaka Alu lo Seba gv Dvnv angv dakrapre okv silugv nyi vdwa gungnying milwkre, ogulvgavbolo nw ninyigv mooku lokv lamtv mvnwngnga vngmila vngtoku Solomon gv mvnglakmilak a tvvdubv vla; okv ngo nonua mindu Dvbv Solomon nyika kaiyanv ogugo sika si doopv.
Jwngkadaka Alu lo Ninebe gv nyi vdwv dakrap dvla nonua gungnying milwkre, ogulvgavbolo bunu Jona gv japji nama tvvla bunu bunugv rimur lokv mvngdin toku; okv ngo nonua jvjv bv mindunv Jona nyika kaiyanv go sika si doopv!
“Yvvka mvdurrupum a baanu gvrila vsila vmalo bati lvkwnglo vvpvnv kaama; vmabvya, nw hum tunggingnvnv lo vvpv yadunv, ogulvgavbolo nyi aanv vdwa kaapa modubv.
Noogv nyik vdwv ayak gv lvgabv mvdurrupum jvbv rido. Vdwlo noogv nyik vdwv alvbolo, noogv ayak mvnwnglo loung ngv akomaring do; vbvritola vdwlo noogv nyik vdwv alvmabolo, noogv ayak mvnwngngv kanv arwng lo dooreku.
Vbvrikunamv, mvnggap tvvlaka, no gvlo loung doodunv am kanv madubv.
Noogv ayak mvnwnglo loung yayabv, ogugoka kanvnamgo kamabv ridu bolo, hv mvnwnglo achialvbv loungre, mvdurrupum gonvgv achialvbv ungnam loung ngv, nam ungkanam jvbv rire.”
Vdwlo Jisu mintung nga minya tokudw, Parisis ako ninyia lvkobv dvnam dvbam dubv vla gokto; vkvlvgabv nw vngtoku okv dvdubv vla dootung toku.
Jisu gv dvma dwbv lasok manama Parisis nyi angv kaatokula lamkisak patoku.
Vkvlvgabv Jisu ninyia mintoku, “Vbvrikunamv vjak, nonu Parisis vdwv nonugv koobu okv taali a agum a harkakdu, vbvritola arwnglo nonu dokchanam okv alvmanam v yarbingdu.
Pvchanv! Pwknvyarnv yvv agum gvnga mvnv, arwng gvnga mvmapvnvre?
Vbvritola noogv koobu okv taali arwnglo ogugo doodudw um heemanv vdwa jitoka okv ogu mvnwngngv nonugv lvgabv darwk reku.”
“Vdwnvgo hirukaya gubv rire nonu Parisis nonu vdwa! nonu Pwknvyarnvnyi uji-uu linku loka vring lokv akonyi jinam a jidu, pudina uu okv achialv amok jungnv nvmwng uu okv kvvbi mvnwng uu hvkv nvnga, vbvritola nonu alvbv rinam a okv Pwknvyarnvnyi paknam a rimadu. So vdw sam nonu risar-sise ngvrung, dvbv vdwaka topu mabv.
“Vdwnvgo hirukaya gubv rire nonu Parisis vdwa! nonu Jius kumkunaam vdwlo alvyachoknv doogingnvnv nga mvngbiu nvngv okv piokpam dorpamlo vdwlo alvyochok bv mvngdv konwng nvngv.
Vdwnvgo hirukaya gubv rire nonua! nonuno nyibung bungpam a mvu magvrila nyi vdwgv chimabv vngkarnam jvbv rido.”
Pvbv tamsarnv nyi akonv ninyia minto, “Tamsarnv, vdwlo no svbv minam v ngaaka miyakaya tadunv!”
Jisu mirwksito, “Pvbv tamsarnv nonuaka vdwnvgo hirukaya gubv rire! nonu nyi gv nangkulo bagla madubv vge mvlwkdu, ho vge a bagdubv nonu atu v lakching vka ridur dubv chilin manv.
Nonua vdwnvgo hirukaya gubv rire! nonu nyijwk vdwgv lvgabv alvnv nyibung mvpvdo, ho nyijwk vdwa nonugv abuapa vdwgv gwngrw mingku namv.
Vbvrikunamv nonuka ho aaming gvduku, nonugv abuapa gv rinam am tolwk duku; bunu nyijwk vdwa gwngrw mintoku, okv nonu bunugv nyibung vdwa mvto.
So lvgabv Pwknvyarnv gv mvnglak v minto, ‘Ngo nyijwk vdwa okv gindungpingko vdwa vngmure bunu gvlo; bunu mvkire bunu kvgonam okv kvgunam mvritre.’
Vkvlvgabv selu gv nyi vdw sum mvritre ogu lvga nyiamooku a pwklin rilokv rila nyijwk mvnwngnga mvkijinam lvgalo,
Abelnyi gwngrw gwnam lokv rila Jakarianyi gwngrw gwnam lobv bunua mwkwmwya mwwku gvla darwknv kumku pingkolo mvkitoku. Hum, ngo nonua mindunv, bunu mvnwng gv lvgalo selu gv nyi vdw sum mvritre!”
“Vdwnvgo hirukaya gubv rire Pvbv tamsarnv nonua! nonu chinampanam gv naam a yikoknvnv chabi a vvpv riadu; nonu atu v hoka arwng aama gvri okv kvvbi vdwaka arwng aamu mado!”
Vdwlo Jisu ho mooku a vngyu tokudw, Pvbv tamsarnv vdwv la Parisis vdwv ninyia achialvbv minjimio rapto okv ninyi ogumvnwngnga tvuto,
bunu ninyia kupdubv vla okv rimur go gakdubv vla rikw nyatoku.
Hejar hejar nyi v nyipam bv aakum kunamv, vkvlvgabv bunu chaajap minsu toku, Jisu mintuminke bv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa minto, “Parisis vdwgv vpap am himasuto laka—Ngo minamsi bunugv kaakudubv rinam a.
Ogugonyi mvtum pvdw hum mvkok reku, vvsinam mvnwng vdwa chimu reku.
Vkvlvgabv, nonu ogugo kanv arwnglo minpvkudw hum alulvpa loung kolo tvvpa reku, nonugv naam a koktum tvvla arwnglo japsi nama naam mwnglo aolo chaapv tvvla gokpa reku.”
“Ngo nonua mindunv, ngoogv ajin vdwa, ayakka mvki jinv nga yvvnyika busu mabvka vbvritola ayungjvma kochinglo ogu alvmanvgo rinyu mare.
Yvvnyi busu svngvdw ngo kaatamre: Pwknvyarnvnyi busu laka, nw gvlo, mvkiro kochingbv, uyumooku bolo horlu nyudubv jwkrw doodu. Nga tvjwng laka, ninyinv nonugv busu svngv!”
“Pvdwng nvnga barnyi gubv piokma dvnvri? Vbvrijvka Pwknvyarnv pvdwng nvvkin gunyika mvngpa mabv rima.
Nonu gv dumpo gv dwmw mvnwng haka kingam ropv. Vkvlvgabv busu mabvka; No pvdwng vdwa achialvbv arv doya nvgo!”
Ngo nonua jvjvbv mindunv yvvdw nyi vdwlo ngo gvngv vla nw minpok jidunv, Nyia Kuunyilo ngvka vbvdvdvbv bunua rire nyidogindung vdwgv Pwknvyarnv gv kaagialo.
Vbvritola yvvdw nga nw gvngema vla minpok dunv, Nyia Kuunyilo ngvka bunua nw gvngvma vla mintare nyidogindung vdwgv Pwknvyarnv gv kaagialo.
“Yvvdw Nyia Kuunyilo nga minying dunv hum mvngnga nyulare; Vbvritola yvvdw Darwknv Dow a minying dunv hum vdwloka mvngnga nyulamare.”
“Vdwlo bunu nonua Jius kumkunaamlo rika dubv vmalo gobunor vdwgv kaagialo vmalo kvvbi vdwgvlo, nonu atu v oguaingbv mvnging svngvdw vla vmalo nonu ogugo minsedw vla mvngdwk mabvka.
Nonu ogugo mirung svngvdw hum hoka Darwknv Dow v nonua tamsarre.”
Nyipam lokv nyi ako Jisunyi minto, “Tamsarnv, ngoogv achiboru a minjilabv abu gv yikungyira vngyu nama ngam lvkobv orpin sudubv.”
Jisu ninyia mirwkto, “Ajin, nga nonyi gv pingkolo miriadubv vmalo yikungyira nga baag nyuladubv jinv ngv yvvla?”
Okv nw mvnwngnga minbwngto, “Raarwnv mvnwng gvlokv nonu atuv himasuto laka; ogulvgavbolo nyi gv jvjvbv singnam v ninyigv yikungyira lokv mvvma, nw vdwgo nyitv dajvka.”
Vbvrikunamv Jisu so minchisinam sum bunua miji toku: “Ho hoka nyi ako dooto nw kvdw go rongo ali amw alvbv linji nvgo dooto.
Nw atu v mvngrap sutoku, ‘Ngo ngoogv ali amw a vvpv jikugo kaakuma. Ngo ogugo rila dukunv?
Ngo so svbv rireku,’ nw atu v minsuto; ‘Ngo ngoogv nesung nga mvyak reku okv sungtv nvgo mvgvrekula hoka ngoogv ali amw okv ngoogv yikungyira mvnwngnga vvpv reku.
Vbvrigvrikula ngo atu v minsureku, Gamdaknv nyi go! no achialv anying gv lvgabv dinchijinam alvnv ogu mvnwng ngv doosupvku. Himpu alvbv svngmin laka, dvmin laka, tvngmin laka okv no atuv himpu dubv rimin sulaka!’
Vbvritola Pwknvyarnv ninyia minto, ‘Pvchanvno! Siyu gv ayulo no noogv singnam a topu rungdubv rireku; vbvrikunamv no atubogv lvgabv ogu mvnwng nga mvpvripv kunama paajikunv yvvkudw?’”
Okv Jisu minyabv minto, “Atubogv lvgabv nyitv tvvtola vbvritola Pwknvyarnv gv lvgabv nyitv manv ngv so svbv ridunv.”
Vbvrikunamv Jisu lvbwlaksu vdwa minto, “Okv vkvlvgabv ngo nonua mindunv nonu dvla singdubv vla dvse lvgabv vmalo nonu ayak gv lvgabv vji kose go vla mvngdwk mabvka.
Singnam si dvnam a achialvbv kaiyanv, okv ayak si vji a achialvbv kaiyanv.
Paak ka kaatoka: bunu ali lilwkma vmalo aam nvvma; bunu nesung naam kaama; Pwknvyarnv bunuam dvmu tvngmudu! nonu pvta vdwa achialvbv arv doya nvgo!
Hum mvngdwk gvrila nonu gvlokv akonv yvvla svnggv nama achukgo svngsu yadubv svnglajinv?
No svkvnv ogu miang nvnga rilwk nyuma bolo, ogubv kvvbi ogua mvngdwk yadunv?
Kaatoka mootum gv apung ngv oguaing bv svngdu: bunu ogugo rima vmalo bunu atugv lvgabv vji vbi mvvma. Vbvritola ngo nonua mindunv Dvbv Solomon achialvbv nyitv nvgobv rikubvka vji vbi gvnam vka so apung vdwgv kaapu aingbv rinv gvmato.
So si Pwknvyarnv yvvdw mootum gv nvsing nvmwng nga vji koomunv—nvmwng v silu doodu okv aarunyi nyeji kunv, vmvlo rampak svngv. Nw nonua vji gvmu dubv vla ogumvnwngnga mvngma rungredw? Nonugv mvngjwng ngv miang gomwng doodu!”
“Vkvlvgabv mvnwnglo ogugo dvsvdw okv tvngsedw vla alu gv dwkia mvngap dvdvla mvngdwk mabvka.
(Sichingmooku so gv Pwknvyarnvnyi chimanv vdwv aludwkia so ogu mvnwng gv lvgabv mvnggap dvdv dvnv.) No so vdw sum dinchi dunv vla noogv Abu chindu.
Vmabvya Pwknvyarnv gv Karv lvga nga mvnggap yato, okv nw nonua so gv ogumvnwngnga jire.”
Twngtv manv nonu, busu mabvka, nonugv Abu nonua ninyigv Karv nga jidubv mvngbiudu.
No ogugo doodudw hum mvnwngnga pyoktoka okv morko nga heemanv vdwa jitoka. Morko vgianvnv ungko manvlo no atu v orsu laka, okv no gv nyitv a aomooku tolo tvvpv tvka, tolo vdwloka ngoomare, ogulvgavbolo dvcho nvngv tolo bunu gvlo aachi mare, okv bunua taram dvmwk jinv guka kaamare.
Ogolo no gv nyitv nga tvvpv pvdw hoka no gv haapok vka alu loki a doore.
“Ogugo aaridw ho lvgabv Kaya laka, rinam lvgabv kaya laka, okv no gv mvdurrupum a baanu tvla doogv laka,
Nyira vdwgv bunugv atu v nyida lokv aari kunvpv vla kaayala doonam aingbv. Vdwlo nw aalaku okv takdin kubolo bunu vjakgobv agi nga ninyigv lvgabv kokda jiriku.
Ho nyira vdwv mvngpu v yvvgv atu v aakur rikulo bunua hula doodubv okv kaayala doodubv kaanam vdwv! Ngo nonua mindu, nw ninyigv jvtv am pilin reku, okv bunua dootung dubv minreku, okv bunuam jilahola rireku.
Vdwgo mvngpu guku bunu nw bunua kaayala doodubv kaapa kubolo, nw yupra jama nga aaku jvka vmalo koching nyijvka!
Nonu chinsudo naam namgo gv atu v dvcho nvgv cholwk dwa chincho bolo, nw vdwloka dvcho nvnga ninyigv naam a tarkola amumare.
Okv nonuka, dooya segorung, ogulvgavbolo nyia Kuunyilo ngv nonugv vdwlo dvmin mari gonyika aariku.”
Pitar minto, “Ahtu so gv minchisinam si ngonua mindu nvre, vmalo mvnwngnga mindu nvre?”
Ahtu mirwkto, yvv, vbvrikunamv, alvnv okv mvnglaknv nyira ngv? Hv ho angv ninyigv atu hv ninyia naam nyi vdwa rigv dubv jinam, okv nyira kvvbi a bunugv dvse nga dvdw lo dvnam jinam.
Vdwgo mvngpu vku ho pakbu angv ninyigv atu v vdwlo naam aaku namv ninyia vbvridubv kaapa koku namv!
Vbvrung, Ngo nonua mindunv, Atu v ho pakbua-nga ninyigv yikungyira nga rigv modubv jire.
Vbvritola ho pakbu angv nw atu v minsu bolo ninyigv atu moing vngro baapubv aakur nyuku mare vla kvvbi nyira vdwa okv nyimv daka nyilo daka dvngrap laku, dvlaku tvnglaku okv dvkium tvngkium kubolo.
Vbvrikunamv Atu alugonyi aakur reku vdwlo pakbu gv ninyia dvmin marilo ho gv dwa nw chimpa kuma. Atu v ninyia patungpayung mvriku okv nw gv tvvma nvnga hingkw moreku.
Pakbu ngv yvv atu gv nw a ritokv mvngnam chindunv, vbvritola nw atu v hum ridubv okv agiarap madunv, hum achialvbv svnyakpare
Vbvritola pakbu ngv yvvdw ninyigv atu gv mvngnam um chima gvrila nw dvngku yadubv riredw hum miang yabv dvngre. Yvv nw kaigo jipvdw hum kaigo koore; Yvv nw kaiyachok go jipvdw um kaiyachok go koyare.
“Ngo nyiamooku so vmv rulwk tebv aato okv hv vbv ngoogv mvngkulo riro duku nvgo vla ngo mvngdu!
Ngo baptisma naase go doodu, okv hum richima dvdvlo ngo mvngdwk sakdwk bv ridu!
Nonu nga nyiamooku so sarsopoyo alvbv rigv nvnv nga aagvla aapvnv mvngdu nvlare? Ma, sarsopoyo bvma, vbvritola apinain dubv.
Vjak gvlokv rila vpin akolo nyi angu go doonv apin-ain reku, aom gunv anyia rinying reku okv anyiv aom a rinying reku.
Abu vdwv bunugv kuunyilo vdwa rinying reku okv kuunyilo vdwv bunugv abu vdwa rinying reku; anv vdwv bunugv kuunyijar vdwa rinying reku okv kuunyijar vdwv bunugv anv vdwa rinying reku; ayu vdwv bunugv dungnv vdwa rinying reku okv dungnv vdwv bunugv ayu vdwa rinying reku.”

“Ogulvgabv nonu atubongv alvnvngam mvngchinla kaakw sima dunv?

Ngo nonua mindu, nonu morko dvdua dornya ma dvdvlo, hoka nonu dooreku.”
Ho hoka nyi mego dooto bunu Jisu nyi minjito Pilot gv Galili nyi vdwa Pwknvyarnvnyi kumla erin rijila rimu gvrila mvki namgv lvga nga.

Ma vbvmare! Okv ngo nonua mindu, vdwlo nonu nonugv rimur lokv linku maridw nonu mvnwngngv vbvrila sire.”
Vbvrikunamv Jisu so minchisinam sum bunua minjito: “Ho hoka nyi ako dooto nw ninyigv nayamlo koksitkokrik singnv vkv soto. Nw vngtoku hoka apw kaakarla vbvritola kaapa kuma toku.

Aarinv anying tolo singnv ngv apw charlin bolo, v alvyachok namv; vbv maloka, no um tvngnga toku mabv.”
Jius Doonualu golo Jisu Jius kumkunaamlo japjila dooto.
Hoka nyimv nvgo nyingring gola nyingpinw go alvmanv dow hv ninyia lvvmala doodubv mvkunam go dooto; nw pookung toku okv achukguka gudung nyuku matoku.

Ninyigv mirwksinamv nyirunv vdwa hinying simudubv minto, nyi vdwv ninyigv lamrwpadubv mvnam rinam lokv himpu nyatoku.
Jisu tvvkato, “Pwknvyarnv gv Karv ngv oguaingbv ridunv? Um ngo ogu-am lvkobv mintak nvdubv?
Hv svbv ridu. Nyi ako yingmw naala okv ninyigv rongolo paklwkdo. Agar hv garlinla okv singnv gubv ritoku, okv pvta vdwv ho aala bunugv asup a vkvgv hakbv vdwlo suplwk toku.”

Jisu banggu vdwlo okv nampum vdwlo vnggoto nyi vdwa japgo jila okv ninyigv lamtv nga Jerusalem takbv vngdula.

“Jerusalem, Jerusalem! nonu nyijwk vdwa mvki do, nonu gvlo Pwnvyarnvgv gindungpingko vngmunama nonu vlwng kungpv! Vdwnvgo ngo noogv nyi vdwa laak kv lakyum nwngdu kubv, roknv gv ruu vdwa laap lokv lapyumnam aingbv, vbvritola nonu nga vbv rimuma!

Doonu alu golo Jisu Parisis nyi rigvnvgv akogv naam lo achin dvbv aato; okv nyi vdwv Jisunyi orchok mvla kaayato.
Nyi ako lvpa laak bingla lvvma nvgo Jisu gvlo aato,
Okv Jisu pvbv tamsarnv vdwa okv Parisis vdwa tvkato, “Ngonugv Pvbv lo doonu alu lo lvvma nvnga mvpu dubv minpvri?”

Dvbv gonv hejar vring nyiga go vnglingvla dvbv hejar chamnyi doonvgo mvmi sidubv riku bolo, nw atokchobv doopv tvla japka riku dvbv nga mvmi sinyu redw ma mvmi sinyu maridw vla.

“Alu v alv nvgo, vbvritola si tinam a ngemu kubolo, hum lvkodv tidukubv mvjiku lamtv kaakuma.

Okv um naam lo bakkor lwktoku. Vbvrikunamv nw ninyigv ajin vdwa okv namrwk vdwa gokkum tokula bunua mintoku, ‘Ngo achialvbv mvngpu duku ngo ngoogv svlar ngenv anga paakunamv. Klvi ngonu naayap lakuju!’
Ho apiabv, ngo nonua mindunv, nyidomooku tolo hum kaiyabv mvngpure rimurnv nyi go mvngdin kubolo chamkia gula kia yvv mvngdin kusegu kaakumanv mamsenga.”
“Vmalo nyimv nvgo ain lokdwng charring go doonv chargunyi ngemu toku—nw ogu ripvku? Nw mvdurrupum a baanu toku, ninyigv naam a pakak toku, okv kaapama dvdvlobv um alvyaungbv kaakar toku.

Ngo nonua mindu, ho apiabv rimurnv nyi gunv mvngdin kubolo vkvgv aolo Pwknvyarnv gv gindungpingko vdwv achialvbv mvngpu yadunv.”
Jisu mimbwngla minto, “Ho hoka nyi akonv nw kuunyilo anyigo dooto.
Boruya angv ninyia minto, ‘Abu, vjak yikungyira ngo gvnga ngam jilabv,’ Vkvlvgabv abu hv yikungyira vdwa kuunyilo anyi gv pingkolo orpin sitoku.

Nw vdwgo gvku bvdw hum mvnwngnga mva toku. Vbvrikunamv dvmayarwng go ho mooku hoka vngtoku, okv nw hoka oguka kaaku mabv ramkar toku.
Vkvlvgabv nw ho mookugv nyi gonvgv lvgabv kudungkua riji dukubv vngtoku, hv ninyia ninyigv rongo adukolo lo vrik kaaria modubv vnglin motoku.
Nw ninyigv dvse a vrik gv dvnam dvku lokv dvsu tvnvpv mvngto, vbvritola yvvka ninyia dvnam jinv kaama toku.
Anyung anya nga ninyigv haapok lo mvngchin raptoku okv mintoku, ‘Ngo Abu gv nyi riria modubv goknam mvnwng hvka bunu dvnam a dvlv kumabv dvmin duku, okv ngo soka kano gvbv sakap tvya dukunv!
Ngo gudung reku okv Abu gvlo vngreku, okv minreku, Abu, ngo Pwknvyarnv nyila okv nam la rinyingla rimur tokubv.
Ngo noogv kuunyilo ngv vla mindubv riya kuma; no nga noogv riria nvbv goknam nyi ako bv mvngla kubvka,’
Vkvlvgabv nw gudung toku okv ninyigv Abu gvlo vla vngkur raptoku. “Nw vjakgobv naam vngchi sengv lamtv ngv adudvto hoka ninyigv Abu hv ninyia kaapa toku; nw haapok v hau toku, okv nw joktoku, okv ninyigv laak hv ninyigv kuunyilo nga jarbwng toku, okv ninyia moopupdvtak toku.
Kuunyilo ngv mintoku, ‘Abu, ngo Pwknvyarnv nyila nam la rinyingla rimur tokubv. Ngo noogv kuunyilo ngv vla mindubv riya kuma.’
Vbvritola Abu hv ninyigv pakbu vdwa goktoku. ‘Baapubv!’ nw minto. ‘Jvtvlaklwk alvyachok nvnga bvnglwkto okv ninyia pilwkto. Ninyigv lakchinglo lakchup go pilwkto okv ninyigv lvpa lo lvsup goka.
Vbvrikunamv vngnyika okv svbv bakboknv akonyi paala hum mvki tvka, okv klvi ngonu naayapla dvpam go pamla kuju!
Ngoogv kuunyilo angv si sirokunv ngv, vbvritola vjak nw turpvku; nw ngooro kunvngv, vbvritola vjak ninyia paapv kunv.’ Okv vkvlvgabv dvpam ha pamrap toku.”
“Vbvrire hoka kuunyilo achi yangv agum rongolo rito. Ninyigv lamtvlo vngkur rikulo, vdwlo naam aachidvlv bv riri hoka, nw giomin okv soomin namgv sidu a tvvpa toku.
Vkvlvgabv nw pakbu ako goklwkla okv ninyia tvvkato, ‘Ogugo ridung dunvla?’

Achi yangv achialvbv kvchakbriak laila nw naam arwnglo aamato; vkvlvgabv ninyigv Abu agumlo linto okv ninyia arwng aatokv vla kodwkkrwkla minto.
Vbvritola nw ninyigv Abunyi mirwksito, ‘Kaatoka, anying mvnwnglo ngo nyira jvbv noogv lvgabv kudungkua nga rijito, okv ngo noogv minam a vdwloka tvvmabv rinam kaama. No nga ogugo jipv? Ngoogv ajin vdwaka lvkobv dvpam dvgv laka vla yabin akoka ka jinam kaama!
Vbvritola noogv kuunyilo angv si noogv yikungyira mvnwngnga randi vdwlo mva nvmin kunvngv, okv vdwlo nw naam aakur kunamv no ninyigv lvgabv svbv bakbok nvgonyi paki jiminla!’
Abu v mirwkto, ‘Ngoogv kuunyilo nga,’ ‘no ngam alu loki a lvkobv doobwng kunvngv, okv ngo ogugo doopv kudw mvnwngngv nokvku.
Vbvritola ngonuv naayap segorung okv mvngpu segorung, ogulvgavbolo no gv boruv siro kunvngv, vbvritola vjak nw turpvku; nw ngero toku, vbvritola vjak ninyia paapvku.’”
Jisu ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa minto, “Ho hoka nyitvnv nyi ako dooto nw pakbu go dooto hv ninyigv yikungyira nga kaayataya nvgo. Nyitvnv nyi anga ninyigv ogu rungyanv angv ninyigv morko nga mva dukv vla mintamto,
vkvlvgabv nw rungya nvnga arwnglo goklwkto okv minto, ‘Ngo noogv lvkwng nga tvvdunv si ogu gokula? No ngoogv yikungyira nga kaayataya nama vdw godw ogumvnwngnga ngam kaatam lakubv, ogulvgavbolo no vdwloka ngoogv rungyapayanam gubv rinyu kumare.’
Pakbu angv nw atu hv minsuto, ‘Ngoogv atu nga ngoogv nokori loka naalin tvduku. Ngo ogu rila kuse gubvri? Ngo dvnam lvgabv rongo ridubv gwlwk doyama, okv giago karse ngaaka yinying yapv.
Vjak ngo chinduku ngo ogugo risedw! Vbvrikunamv vdwlo ngo nokori lokv linre kudw, ngo ajin jinre bunu nga bunugv naam lo alvbv aamure.’
Vkvlvgabv nw ninyigv atu gvlo dvdu doonv nyi vdwa goklwk toku. Nw atokchogv anga tvvkato, ‘No ngo atu gvlo vkamgu narpvnv?’
Nw mirwkto, ‘Olib tvli vkv pumpa lvngo narto,’ ‘Siinv noogv jise ngv,’ rungyanv angv ninyia minto, ‘dootungto okv chamngu go lvkgapto.’
Vbvrikunamv nw kvvbi akonyi tvkato, ‘Okv no—vdwgo narpvnv?’ Nw mirwkto, ‘Giu vkv tagiam munv hejar go,’ ‘siinv noogv jise ngv,’ rungyanv ninyia minto; ‘lwngpinv go lvkgapto.’
Pakbu mvvlaknv gv Atu hv ninyia vbv rungkup runglik la ridanam lvgabv ninyia hartv toku; ogulvgavbolo nyiamooku so gv nyi vdwv achialvbv bunu rungkup runglik la lounglo rinv nyi vdwa kaiyabv ridu.”
Okv Jisu mimbwngla minto, “Okv vkvlvgabv ngo nonua mindunv: Nonuno atuv nyiamooku so gv yikungyira nga lvkobv ajin jinlaka, vkvlvgabv um vdwlo si topu rikudw, nonua simabv doobwng jiku naam lo alvbv aamu riku.
Yvvdw miangnv yikungyira nga alvbv mvnging dubv ridunv hv kainv yikungyira loka achialvbv kaiyabv mvnging dubv ridunv, okv yvvbunudw miangnv yikungyira lo jwkjwkvrwk bv mvngging dubv rima dunv v kainv yikungyira loka jwkjwkvrwkbv mvngging dubv rima dunv.
Hv bolo, vbvrikunamv, nonu nyiamooku so gv yikungyira nga alvbv mvnging dubv rinyu mabolo oguaingbv jvjvnv yikungyira nga mvnging dubv rinyure?
Nonu nyi kvvbi gvbvrinv yikungyira nga mvnging dubv riji mabolo, yvvla no gvbvrinv yikungyira nga nam jijinv?
“Pakbuv yvvka atu anyi gv nyirabv rinyu mare; nw akonyi pakre okv akonyi kaanwng mare; nw akonvgv minam a tvvre okv akonvgv nga tvvmare. No Pwknvyarnv nyila morko nga lvkobv rijivngji nyulamare.”
Vdwlo Parisis vdwv so mvnwng sum tvvtokudw, bunu Jisunyi nyarjito, ogulvgavbolo bunu morko nga mvngbiuto.

“Moses gv Pvbv okv nyijwk vdwgv lvknam vdwv Jon Baptist gv dw lobv ribwngto; okv ho koching nga Pwknvyarnv gv Karv gv lvkwng Alvnv Yunying nga mintam raptoku, nyi mvnwngngv ho Karv lo aadu bv gwnglilala nyadu.
Pvbv gv gaam achukguka minggap nama ria jemam svnga nyido gvla kvdw gv nyitv namv nyepu yare.”
“Yvv nyi akonv atugv nywng nga toa tokula ako kvvbi nyimvmvvga go nywng mvku bolo hv yoomurnv; okv toanam nyimvmvvga anga yvv nywng mvdunv hvvka yoomurnv.”
“Ho hoka nyi nyitvnv ako dooto nw kainv arv doonv vjia kooto okv achialvbv lokia himpukain la svngminto.
Ho hoka heemanv nyi ako dooto aminv Lajaras, ungvtarv ngv rara nvgo, hum nyitv nyi gv naam agi lo vvpvkinamgo,
nyitv nyi gv dvkulo dvala hoolin nama dvpa yare vla mvngnv go. Iki vka aala ninyigv ungngv nga dvriak riakbwngto.”
“Heemanv nyi angv sitoku okv nyidogindung vdwv ninyia gvvtoku Abrahamnyi lvkobv nyidomooku gv dvpam lo doomuto. Nyitv nyi v sitoku okv nyibung riitoku,

So ogu mvnwng sum kayu tvla, no gvla ngoogv pingko si kairungnv kobung go doodunv, vkvlvgabv yvvdw sokv noogv hoka vngrap dubv ritv nvngv vbv rinyu madunv, vmajeka yvvka noogv hokvkongv ngonugv so linyu madunv.’

Nyitvnv nyi hv mirwksito, ‘Hv pwngmare, Abu Abraham! Vbvritola siro kunv nyi gonv turkur laku okv bunua minbolo, vbvrikubolo bunu bunugv rimur lokv linreku.’
Vbvritola Abraham minto, ‘Bunu Moses nyila Nyijwk vdwa tvvmabolo, bunua mintap nyulamare sikunv akonv turkur kujvka.’”
Jisu ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa minto, nyi vdwa rimur mobv rinv ngv ho lokia doore! vbvritola yvvdw bunua rimu dunv hv mvngru gubv rire!
Ho nyi anga vlwng pwtv nvgo lvngpolo paklwk tvvla svlv lo orlwk namv nw gv lvgabv alvyare so gv vmi anga rimur modubv ritv svnga.
Vkvlvgabv hingto laka no ogugo ridudw! “Noogv achiboru vdwv rimur dubolo, ninyia yamtoka, okv nw mvngdin dukubolo, ninyia mvngnga jilaka.
Nw alua kanw go nam rinyingla rimur dubolo, okv riri gv dwkia no gvlo aala, ‘Ngo mvngdin dukunv vku bolo, no ninyia mvngnga jirung laka.’”
Nyitampingko vdwv Jisunyi minto, “Ngonugv mvngjwng nga kai molabv.”

“Minchisinam go nonu gvlo akonv pakbu doodu hv rongo padungdo vmalo svlar vdwa kaaya riadungdo. Vdwlo nw rongo lokv aari kunyi, um no ninyia baapubv okv dvnam a dvto vla minridw?
Vbvrirung mare! vmabvya, no ninyia minre, ‘Ngoogv dvnya dvse nga mvpvto, vbvrikunamv no noogv vji a kotoka okv ngoogv dvrilo okv tvngrilo no doya tvka; ho kochingbv no noogv dvse a dvla duku.’
Minam a tvvla pakbu angv umbonyikv go panyu mapvri, panyu pvri?
Vbvdvdvbv so si nonu gvloka doolwk laka; nonugv rise a vdwlo nonu ripv kudw, minlaka, ‘Ngonu pakbu bvtwkbv rimwngnv; ngonu ngonugv rise a rimwng pvnv.’”
Jisunyi Jerusalem bv vngrilo nw Samaria gvla Galili gv doorwsi pingkolo vngpitla vngto.

okv goktoku, “Jisu! Tamsarnv! ngonua aya mvngpa labv!”

Vdwlo bunugv lokv akonv poyapvku vla himpa tokudw, nw vngkur toku, Pwknvyarnvnyi gamtv rungbv hartv toku.
Nw Jisu gv lvpa lvkwng gv kvdw lo atu v gipv toku okv ninyia umbonyi vtoku. Nyi angv Samaritan go.

Yvv akonvka minla mare, ‘kaato si kunv!’ vmalo, ‘v kunv!’; ogulvgavbolo Pwknvyarnv gv Karv ngv no gvlo doodu.”
Vbvrikunamv Jisu lvbwlaksu vdwa minto, “Dw gv aariku vdwlo nonu Nyia Kuunyilo gv alu logonyi kaanwngre, vbvritola um nonu kaapa kumare.
Ho hoka nyi vdwv nonua minre ‘tolobv kaatoka!’ vmalo ‘so soka kaatoka!’ vbvritola vnglinla um kaakar mabvka.
Dooriak gv nyidomooku lo riaklinla okv chegunv lokv chegunvbv loung monam aingbv rire nyia kuunyilo ninyigv alu hv.
Vbvritola atukchobv nw achialvbv hinching chingchore okv silugv nyi vdwgv toanam gubv rire.

Nyia Kuunyilo gv daklwk rikulo ho vkv aingbv rireku.”
“Ho gv alu lo nyi gonv ninyigv namwng mwnglo lo rinv naam arwng aala ninyi gvbv rinam yikungyira mvnwngnga naadubv mvngrung mabvka; vkv aingbv nyi gonv yvv agum rongolo rinv naam aakur kuyoka.
Lot gv nywng nga mvngpa toka!
Yvvdw nyi atugv singdung nga ringdubv mvngdunv ngoore; yvvdw ninyigv singdung nga ngoomu dunv v hum ringyare.
Ho gv ayulo, ngo nonua mindu, ho hoka nyi anyigo gadw lo lvkobv yupbam la doore; akonyi naare okv akonyi kayure.
Nyimv anyi gonv daa hwkbasire: akonyi naaro reku okv akonyi kayu reku.
Nyi anyigo rongo mvba sila doore akonyi naaro reku okv akonyi kayu reku.”
Lvbwlaksu vdwv ninyia tvvkato, “Ogulo, Ahtu?” Jisu mirwkto, “Ogulo svmago doopvdw hoka Pvta nyidin dvnv dookumre.”

“Banggu guloka kvba japrianv nyi go dooto nw yvvnyika mvngdv manvgo okv Pwknvyarnv nyika busu manvgo.

Vjak, Pwknvyarnv nw atugv nyi gv lvgabv japjiriji maredw yvvdw aluayu bv ridur lvgabv kapki nvnga? Nw ninyia ridur svnga tapv ridw?
Ngo nonua mindu, Nw bunu gvbv japjire okv hum baapubv rijire. Vbvritola nyia Kuunyilo ngv vdwlo nyiamooku so aarikunyi mvngjwng go paarikudw?”
Atua darwk nvgobv mvngsinv okv kvvbi nyi mvnwngnga miyakaayanv vdwa Jisu so minchisinam sum minjidato.
“Alu golo nyi anyigo Pwknvyarnvnaam lo kumdubv vla chaato: akonv Parisi go kvvbi gonv lampu naaria nvgo.
Parisi angv atu hv akusubv dakrwsito okv kumto, ‘Ngo Pwknvyarnv nam, umbonyikv mvngdunv, ogulvgavbolo ngo dvgum madunv, tvvma nvgobv rima, vmalo nyi mvnwng gv ribv, yoomur nvgobv rima. Ngo nam umbonyikv vdunv ogulvgavbolo ngo alo v doonv lampunayanv aingbv rima.
Ngo lokkanw lo loonyi go yikla doodunv, okv ngo paanam lo vring loka akonyi nam jibwng dunv.’

Nyi mego bunugv vmi vdwa Jisu gvlo aagvjito ninyigv laak v bunuam lakpo modubv vla. Lvbwlaksu vdwv bunua vbvrinv gubv vla yamdarpato,

Sum mvnggap laka! Yvvdw vmi aingbv rigv rila Pwknvyarnv gv Karv nga naarwk madunv v hoka aanyu mare.”

No gamkinam gaam vdwa chindu: ‘Yoomur mabvka; gwngrw gwyoka; dvcho mabvka; mvvlarula yvvnyika mium mabvka; noogv anv okv abunyi mvngdv laka.’”

Vbvrikunamv Pitar minto, “Kaatoka! Ngonu nam vngming gvdubv ngonugv naam vdwa vngyu pvnv.”
“Am,” Jisu bunua minto, “Okv ngo nonua jvjvbv milv jidunv yvvdw naam vmalo nyimv vmalo achiboru vmalo anvabu vmalo kuu vdwa Pwknvyarnv gv Karv lvgabv vngyu dunv.

Ninyia kvvbi nyi vdwgvlo laklwk reku, bunu ninyia mvmin reku, nyarjikao reku, okv tachor chorke reku.
Bunu ninyia svnyak pareku, okv mvki reku, vbvritola alu loom kochinglo nw turrap reku.”
Vbvritola lvbwlaksu vdwv minam vdwa akonyika chinku mato; ogu ha minpv nvdw hv bunugv lokv adu toku, okv Jisu ogu gonyi minpv nvdw um bunu chinku mato.
Jisu Jeriko gv adarlo aadungto, hoka giagonv nyi ako lamtv hoka doopv tvvla giadungto.
Vdwlo nw nyipam vdwgv vngpit nama tvvpa tokudw, nw tvkato, “Si ogu v?”
Bunu ninyia minpato, “Najaret lokv Jisu vngpit dvnvkv.”
Nw kapla minto, “Jisu! Dabid gv kuunyilo! Nga aya mvngpa labvka!”
Haabo lokv nyi vdwv ninyia yamto okv ninyia choibvkv vla minto. Vbvritola nw gamtvyayabv gokla minto, “Dabid gv kuunyilo! Nga aya mvngpa labvka!”

okv boru aom nvnv ngvka. Vbvdvdvbv achiboru kanw mvnwnglo rito—bunu siyuto kuu dootv madvbv.

Chvrv nvgobv rito laka okv loki ha kumlaka so mvnwng gv riri kunyi nonua ogu riakuma dubv okv nyia kuunyilo gv kaagialo dakdu kubv.”
Jisu ho alu mvnwng a Pwknvyarnvnaam lo tamsarla dootoku, okv vdwlo ariumv aato kudw, nw Olib Moodw lo ayu a doolwk toku.
Arukamchi dwkibv nyi vdwv Pwknvyarnvnaam lo nw gvlo tvvria dubv vla vngnya toku.

Nw tvvkato, “Ogu gula?” Bunu mirwkto, “Najaret lokv Jisunyi rinam mamnv,” “So nyi angv si nyijwk go nw Pwknvyarnv nyila okv nyi mvnwngnga mvngpu dubv rila, ninyigv rinam minam mvnwngngv jwkrw doonv gubv okv kairungnv nyijwk gubvrila kaatam toku.
Ngonugv nyibu butvnv vdwv okv rigvdogvnv vdwv ninyia mvki tuku vla laklwk la lvklin jitoku, okv ninyi daapolo takki toku.
Okv ngonu ninyia Israel am ringlin laji kunv vla mvngtin nyato! hum mvnwng am mimabv, vbvrikunamv silu si alu loum dukunv.
Anvnyimv megonv ngonua lamrwpamupv; bunu doonyi nyika dubv nyibunglo vngto,
Vbvritola ninyigv svma nga kaapama. Bunu vngkorla mintoku bunu nyikrw bv nyidogingdung vdwa kaapvnv ho vdwv nw turkur pvkunv vla bunua mintam toku.
Ngonugv lokv megonv nyibunglo vngla kaanam v anvnyimv vdwgv minam rungbv kaapatoku, vbvritola bunu ninyia kaapa mato.”

Vbvritola bunu ninyia mintung gvrila, minto, “Ngonua lvkobv doomwng gvlaka; alu v tungtv yanv vngro pvku okv si kanv putv duku.” Vkvlvgabv nw doomwng gvdubv vla bunua vngming gvtoku.
Nw bunua lvkobv dvmwng gvdubv vla dootung toku, vtwng nga naatoku, okv bokta doolwk dubv minto; vbvrikunamv nw vtwng nga pintung toku okv bunua jitoku.

okv minto, “Ahtu jvjv bv turrap rungpvku! Nw Saimon nyika kaarwk supv!”
Nyi anyiv lamtvlo ogugo ripv kudw hum bunua minpa jitoku, okv Ahtu gv vtwng nga pintung rilo bunu oguaing bv kaachin pvkudw humka.
Vdwlo anyi gv sum mintam rilo, lamdubv Jisu atubongv bunugv dookulo daklwk toku okv bunua minto, “Nonu gvlo mvngpu v lvkobv doolaka.”
Bunu achialvbv lamrwpatoku bunu vram go kaadunv vla mvngto.

Ngoogv lvpa okv ngoogv laak am kaatoka okv kaakato si ngo kuna. Ngam mvsit toka, okv nonu chinreku, nonugv ngam kaanam aingbv vram v adwnayak okv loobung gvma doonv.”
Nw vbv mintam toku okv nw gv lvpa okv nwgv laak am bunua kaatam toku.
Bunu vjaklodvbv mvngjwng nyuma toku, bunu achialvbv mvngpubv okv lamrwpanam bv ritoku; vkvlvgabv nw bunua tvkato, “Nonu so dvse go dooma lare?”
Bunu ninyia ngui nunv go jito,
hum nw naagvrila okv bunugv kaakulo dvtoku.
Vbvrikunamv nw bunua mintoku, “So gv sum ngoogv nonua lvkobv riri hoka minam v: ngoogv lvga mvnwngnga Moses gv Pvbv lo lvkpv, nyijwk vdwgv lvknam loka okv mirimimpak minam loka v jvjvbv aarung jinv.”

okv bunua minto, “So svbv lvkpvnv: Kristo hingching chirungre okv alu loum kochinglo sinam lokv turrap reku,
okv ninyigv amin lokv mvngdin okv rimur a mvngnga kunamgv doin a Jerusalem lokv rirap laila, mooku mvnwnglo japgo reku.
Nonu kuna so vdw sum mingo yajikunv.
Okv ngo Atu v ngo Abu gv milv nama nonu gvlo jilu jire. Vbvritola nonu pamtv lo kaayala doorung laka aotolokv jwkrw v nonu gvlo aalwkma dvdvlobv.”
Vbvrikunamv nw bunua pamtv agum lo lingv toku Betani jebv adu lo, hoka nw ninyigv laak v idungto okv bunua boktalwkji toku.
Nw bunua aya jidung dvla, nw bunua vngyu toku okv nyidomooku bv naacha toku.

Gamchar v doorap lokv Pwknvyarnv gv lvkobv dooto.
Ninyigv lokv Pwknvyarnv ogumvnwngnga pwklin to; pwknamyarnam mvnwng lokv ako daka ninyia dooma mogvrila mvnam go kaama.
Gamchar v turnam gv linkubv rito, okv so turnam si nyi mvnwngnga loung naalwk jitoku.
Loung ngv kanv lo ungto, okv kanv ngv hum vdwloka mvngit nyuma toku.

So si jvjvbv alvyachoknv loung ngv—Loung ngv nyiamooku lo aatoku okv nyi mvnwnglo ungtoku.

Hv atugv mooku lo aatoku, vbvritola ninyigv nyi vdwv ninyia naarwk sumato.
Megonv, ninyia naarwk sutoku, okv ninyia mvngjwng toku; vkvlvgabv hv bunua Pwknvyarnv gv kuu bv ridubv tolwk toku.
Hv manv, bunu tanyi anvabu gv kuu bvngchwng lokv Pwknvyarnv gv kuu bv rima; Pwknvyarnv atubongv bunugv abu bv rito.
Gamchar v nyi gobv rilin toku okv jvjv okv aya ngv yarbing nvgobv rila, ngonugv dookurikulo doomingriming gvto. Ngonu ninyigv yunglit nama kaatoku, ninyigv Abu gv Kuunyilo hotum gubvrila yunglit nvgobv paanam a.

Hv aya gv yarbing kolokv hv ngonu mvnwngnga achialvbv ayato, ako jidv gv aolo ako jitamla bokta jidv toku.

Yvvka Pwknvyarnvnyi kaakw nvgo kaama. Kuunyilo mvngchik, Abu gvlo doonv, Pwknvyarnvnyi akin kunv, hv bunua Pwknvyarnvnyi chimu toku.

Bunu tvkato, “Vbvrikunamv no yvvla? No Elija re?” “Ma, ngo ma,” Jon mirwkto. Bunu tvvkato, “No Nyijwk vri?” Hv mirwkto, “Ma”.
“Vbvrikunamv ngonua minjilabv no yvvla,” bunu minto. “Ngonu ngonua kanamnv vdwa vngkur dukula mirwk jireku.” “No atubongv ogu vla minsu dunv?”

Gindungpingko vdwv, Parisis vdwgv vngmukunam vdwv,

Hv ngoogv kochinglo aadungdu, vbvritola ngo ninyigv lvkiam gv oso haka taasok yadubvka riyin yama.”
So mvnwng si Betani lo ritoku Jordan svko gv doonyi chaalin kiambv, Jon gv baptisma jidung kolo.
Alu loogu nvnga Jon Jisunyi ninyi gvlo aadu bv kaagv rikula minto, “Hvvnv Pwknvyarnv gv svlarkuu ngv nyiamooku gv rimur a naa jikunv!
So siinv ngoogv minamv, ‘Nyi go ngo kochingbv aadungdu, vbvritola hv nga kaiyanv, ogulvgavbolo hv nga bvngma dwbv doolinchonv.’
Ngo chimato hv yvvdw, vbvritola ngo Israel nyi vdwa ninyia chimu dubv vla isi lokv baptisma jila aapvnv.”
Okv Jon so gv gaam sum minji toku: “Ngo nyido ao tolokv Darwknv Dow v taakw jvbv ritola nw gvlo jarlwkla doodubv kaatoku.
Hvkunyi vla vjaklodvbv ngo chima toku, vbvritola Pwknvyarnv, yvvdw nga isi lokv baptisma jidubv aamunv, hv nga svbv minto, ‘No Dow a ila nyi ako gvlo doolwk dubv kaapare; ho nyi angv Darwknv Dow lokv baptisma jiji kunv.’

Alu loogu nvnga Jon ninyigv Lwbwlaksu anyia lvkobv hoka lvkodv dakdvto,

Lwbwlaksu anyiv ninyia svbv mindubv tvvgvrikula Jisunyi lvkobv vngming gvtoku.
Jisu dakur toku, okv bunua ninyia vngming gvdubv kaato, okv tvvkato, “Nonu ogugola kaadung dunv?” Bunu mirwkto, “Rabbi, no ogulo doodunv?” (Rabbi vnam si “Tamsarnv” vla minam v).
Hv mirwkto, “Aala kaatoka.” (Vbvrikunamv ho doonyiv tabv laku api baji toku.) Vkvlvgabv bunu ninyia vngming gvtoku okv ninyigv dooku a kaatoku, okv ho alu lo ninyia lvkobv doomwng gvtoku.
Bunugv lokv akonv Andriu, Saimon Pitar gv boru.
Vjakgobv ninyigv achi Saimonnyi kaapa toku okv ninyia minto, “Ngonu Messianyi paapvku.” (So gv minam si “Kristo”)
Vbvrikunamv hv Saimonnyi Jisu gvlo aagv toku. Jisu ninyia kaatoku okv minto, “No gv aminv Saimon Jon gv kuunyilo, vbvritola nam Kepas vla minreku.” (So minam si Pitar vla minam a akin v, “Vlwng lvngrak vnammv.”)
Alu loogu nvnga Jisu Galili lo vngdubv mvngtoku. Hv Pilipnyi kaapato okv ninyia minto, “Ngoogv lvkobv vngming gvlaak!”

Okv nw bunua minto, “Ngo nonua jvjv nvnga minjidunv: nonu nyidomooku agi hv kokok dubv okv Pwknvyarnv gv Gindungpingko ngv Nyia Kuunyilo gvlo ila chaala ridubv kaapare.”

okv nyida hoka Jisu nyila okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa gokto.

okv minto, “Nyi mvnwngngv tvngpunv anggor ala alvyanv nga jicho dvnv yikv, okv nyen vdwgv tvnggu dubv tvngro kochingbvku, hv sarchik nvnga jidunv. Vbvritola nonu vjaklodvbv anggor ala alvyachok nvnga doobwng mopv!”

So kochingbv, Jisu okv ninyigv Anv, achiboru vdwv, okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv Kaparnaum bv vngtoku okv hoka lonyi loum go dootoku.
So si vngbokunam pumja ridwv nvchibv ritoku, vkvlvgabv Jisu Jerusalem bv vngtoku.
Hoka Pwknvyarnvnaam arwng lo svv pioknv nyi, svlar, okv taakw, okv morko lwkmisinv vdwa tvbul lo doodubv hv kaapa toku.
Vkvlvgabv hv svnwngsvmin mvnwngnga bangngi lokv dvnggvrila Pwknvyarnvnaam loka charlin toku, svlar okv svv vdwaka; hv morko lwknv vdwgv tvbulla ngora jito okv bunugv morko lokdwng ngv kaayak padubv mvtoku;
okv hv taakw pyoknv nyi vdwa minto, “Bunua sokv agumlo bvngroto! ngo abu gv naam a bajar mookubv mvku mabvka!”
Ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv mvngpa nyatoku Darwknv Kitaplo mindu, “Ho Pwknvyarnv no gv naam ha ngoogv mvngbiula kumnam si vmv jvbv gudu.”
Jius nyi kainv vdwv Jisunyi mirwkla tvuto, “No sum rila dunv vla ngonua ogu lamrwpanam go rila kaatamre?”
Jisu mirwkto, “So Pwknvyarnvnaam sum toyak tvka okv ngo alu loum lo sum mvdi jiriku.”
“No alu loum lo sum mvdi jitv dunvre? Vla bunu ninyia tvvkato. Sum Pwknvyarnvnaam sum mvdubv anying champi gola nyingkv gobv ripvnv!”
Vbvritola Jisu gv Pwknvyarnvnaam vnam si ninyigv ayakka minpvnv.
Vkvlvgabv vdwlo nw sinam lokv turkur tokudw, ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv nw sum minpvnv vla mvngpa toku, okv bunu Darwknv Kitap okv Jisu ogugo mimpvkudw hum mvngjwng toku.
Vngbodvnam pumja lo Jisu gv Jerusalem lo doolwk dvla, ninyigv lamrwpadubv mvnam rinam a kaala awgo nyi vdwv ninyia mvngjwng toku.
Vbvritola Jisu atubongv bunua mvngjwk matoku, ogulvgavbolo hv bunu mvnwngnga chintoku.
Hoka bunugv lvgabv yvvka ninyia minji sego kaamato, ogulvgavbolo bunugv haapok arwnglo ogugo doopvdw hum atuv chinsu toku.
Hoka Jius vdwa rigvnv nyi go aminv Nikodemas vnamgo dooto, hv Parisis haalung lokv.
Ayu yupgolo hv Jisu gvlo vngto okv ninyia tvvkato, “Tamsarnv, ngonu chindu Pwknvyarnv nam tamsarnvbv vla vngmupvnv. Yvvka no gv rinam vbv lamrwpadubv rinam a rinyu mare Pwknvyarnv ngv ninyia lvkobv dooming gvma bolo.”
Jisu mirwksito, “Ngo nam jvjvbv mindunv; Lvnyibv kuu bvngdi kuma bolo yvvka Pwknvyarnv gv Karv nga kaapa kumare.”
“Nyi ngv nyigabv rikunv oguaingbv bvngdi kodu kubv?” Nikodemas tvvkato. “Hv lvkodv bvngdi kodu kubv vla anv gv namam lo aala nyuku mare!”
“Ngo jvjvbv nam mindunv,” Jisu mirwkto. “Yvvka Pwknvyarnv gv Karv lo vdwloka aanyu mare isi okv Darwknv Dow lokv bvnglin kuma dvdvlo.
Nyi v anvabu lokv bvngnam v nyi amarbv ridunv, vbvritola Darwknv Dow lokv bvngnam v dow bv ridunv.
Ngo gv nonu mvnwngnga kuu bvngdi kolaka vnam a no lamrwpamabvka.
Doori v ogolo ridubv mvngdudw hoka ridu; nonu ho gv adua tvvpa nyumdo, vbvritola nonuno chima v ogo lokv aapvnvdw okv ogolo vngdu nvdw. Dow lo kuu bvngnam v mvnwng v ho apiabv ridunv.”

Ngo jvjvbv nam mindunv: ngonu ogugo chindudw hum mindu okv ogugo kaadudw hum minpa jido, vbvritola nonuno yvvka ngonugv doin a naarwk sinv kaama.
Vdwlo ngo nyiamooku gv lvgabv nam minji renyi no nga tvjwngmanv; oguaingbv no tvjwng dukubv vdwlo ngo nyidomooku gv lvgabv nam minji rikunyi?

Chukrimooku lo Moses gv daachwng tabwa svngtung ao golo timpvto, vbvdvdvbv Nyia Kuunyilo ngamka aolo timpv rungre,
vkvlvgabv yvv mvnwngngv ninyi mvngjwng rikudw v turbwngnv singnam a paare.
Pwknvyarnv nyiamooku a achialvbv pakla ninyigv Kuunyilo akin mvngchik a jitoku, vkvlvgabv yvvdw ninyia mvngjwng rinv v simare vbvritola turbwngnv singnam a paare.
Pwknvyarnv ninyigv Kuunyilo nga nyiamooku so gv nyi vdwa jwngkadaka yanv gubv imu ma, vbvritola ringyanv gubv imu pvnv.
Yvvdw Kuunyilo nga mvngjwng rekunv bunua jwngkadaka kumare; vbvritola yvbunudw mvngjwng marinv ho vdwa jwngkadaka roku, vkvlvgabv vbolo hv bunu Pwknvyarnv gv Kuunyilo akin a mvngjwng kuma.
Jwngkadaka ngv svbv rireku: loung ngv nyiamooku so aatoku, vbvritola nyi vdwv loung nga kaiyabv kanv yanga mvngbiu yatoku, ogulvgavbolo bunugv rinam mvngnam v alvmatoku.
Yvvdw alvmanv nga ridunv hv loung nga kaanwng madunv, okv lounglo aamadunv, ogulvgavbolo ninyibunugv alvmabv rinam a kaatam nwngma dunv.
Vbvritola yvvdw jvjv rungnv nga ridunv, hv lounglo aadunv, ninyibunugv Pwknvyarnv gvlo mvnglwkkaalwk bv rinam a kaatam dubv vla.
So kochingbv Jisu okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv Judia mookubv vngtoku, hoka bunua lvkobv achukgo relwk tvkula okv nyi vdwa baptisma naamu toku.

So si Jonnyi patwk lvkma dwbv ripvnv.
Jon gv lvbwlaksu megonv darpudvbv sokbwngnam lvkwngbv Jius nyi gonyi larmi surapto.
Vkvlvgabv bunu Jon gvlo vngtoku okv minto, “Tamsarnv, no mvngpa dukudw Jordan takdv gv doonyi chaaku kyamgv nam lvkobv rinv nyi, okv yvvgv lvgabv no mindudw? Alvdo, hv nyi vdwa baptisma jiduku okv nyi mvnwngngv hvkv gvlo vngdung duku!”
Jon mirwkto, “Yvvka ogugo doogv nyuma vdwlo Pwknvyarnv hum ninyi jima dvdvlo.
Nonu ngoogv minam ha tvvnvkaanv pingko nyi vdwv, ngo minto ‘ngo Kristo ma, vbvritola ngam ninyia vngcho yamu pvnv.’
Nyimv nyamjibongv paapum gvjinv gvbv ridu; vbvritola paapumgvjinvgv ajin v, dakdula tvrianv, himpu yadu vdwlo hv paapumgvjinvgv gaam a tvvpa rikudw. Svbv dvdvbv ngo atubogv mvngpuv punya dukunv.
Hv kaiyaya rungre, ngo miang yaya rungre.”
Hv nyido mooku tolokv inv mvnwngnga kaiyadunv. Hv yvvdw Siching sokvdw Siching so gvbv ridunv okv Sichingmooku lvgabv mindu, vbvritola hv yvvdw nyido mooku tolokv idunv mvnwngnga kaiyanv.
Hv minpado ogugo hv kaapvdw okv tvvpvdw, vbvrijvka yvvka ninyigv doin ha torwk sinv kaama.
Vbvritola yvvdw ninyigv doin ha naarwk sidunv hv Pwknvyarnv jvjv rungnv ngv vla chindu.
Yvvnyi Pwknvyarnv vngmu pvdw hv Pwknvyarnv gv gaam a mindu, ogulvgavbolo Pwknvyarnv ninyigv Darwknv Dow ha ninyi gvlo jinya chekala jito.
Abu ninyigv Kuunyilo nga pakdu okv ogumvnwng nga ninyigv laak lo jilwk toku.
Yvvdw Kuunyilo nga mvngjwng dunv turbwngnv singnam ha paare; yvvdw Kuunyilo gv minam ha tvvma dunv hv singnam a paamare, vbvritola Pwknvyarnv gv mvritririt jiku arwng lo doore.
Parisi vdwv Jisu Jonnyi kaiyabv nyi naalwkla okv baptist jidu vla tvvpato.
Minje jvbolo Jisu atuv yvvnyika baptisma jimato; ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv mvngchik jito.
Vkvlvgabv vdwlo Jisu ogugo minpvdw tvvtoku, hv Judia nga vngyula okv Galili bv vngkur toku;
ninyigv vngku lamtv ngv Samaria bv vngpitla vngdubv rito.
Samaria lo Sikar vnam banggu lo hv aalwk toku, ho Jakop gv ninyigv kuu Josepnyi jinam rongo lokv adu mato.
Jakop gv isikua ngv hoka dooto, okv Jisu, moing vngkunamv anyu kuma toku, isi kua hoka dootungla doonu toku. Vbvrire hoka alu lopo bv rito.
Samaritan nyimv gonv isi mego tokdubv hoka aato, okv Jisu ninyia minto, “Nga isi tvngse go jilabv,”
Ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv dvnam rvvbv banggu lo vngyu roto.
Nyimv angv mirwksito, “No Jiu go, okv ngo Samaritan nyimv go—vkvlvgabv no oguaingbv nga tvngnamgu koodunv?” (Samaritan vdwgv dvnv tvngnvnv koobu okv bati vdwa Jius vdwv dvnv tvngnv madunv.)
Jisu mirwksito, “No Pwknvyarnv gv jinam a okv nam isi tvngse go koodudw ninyia chinv guilo, no ninyia koya dvnvpv, okv hv nam turgvnv isi a jiri nvpv.”
Nyimv angv minto, “Tamsarnv, no isi toknvnv bvngma, okv isi kua ngv arwng chekwng do. Ogolo no turnvnv isi a paala dubv?
Si ngonugv abuapa Jakob gv ngonua isi kua jinammv; ninyi okv ninyigv kuunyilo, okv ninyigv sonam svnwngsvmin mvnwngngv soka tvngnya pvnv. No atuv Jakobnyi kaiyanv gubv minsu dunvre?”
Jisu mirwksito, “Yvvdw so gv isi a tvngdunv hv tvngnwng nwngkor reku,
Vbvritola yvvdw ngoogv isi jinam ha tvngdunv hv vdwloka tvngnwng nwngkor kumare, ngoogv ninyia isi jinammv ninyigv lvgabv isi boklin sinv aingbv rila ninyi singnam a turnam jinv isi gubv rire okv ninyi turbwngnv singnam a jire.”
Nyimv angv ninyia minto, “Tamsarnv, ho isia ngam jilabvkv! vbvrikubolo ngo vdwloka tvngnwng mvngkor kuma dukubv, okv soka isi tokbv aakwng kuma dukubv.”
Jisu ninyia minto, “No vngyila no gv nyilua gokte kuka, okv aakur lakuka.”
Hv mirwkto, “Ngo nyilu guka kaama.” Jisu mirwk sutoku, “Noogv ngo nyilu kaama vla minam v no jvjvbv mirungdo.
No nyi angu go nyilubv mvtoku, okv noogv vjak lvkobv doogvnam nyi angvka noogv nyilu jvjvma. No nga jvjvbv minpa gvibv.”
Nyimv angv minto, “Tamsarnv, ngo kaanam v no nyijwk go,”
“Ngoogv Samaritan abuapa vdwv Pwknvyarnvnyi so moodw so kumtojotoku, vbvritola nonu Jius vdwv Jerusalem v ngonugv Pwknvyarnvnyi kumjijojiku mooku v vla mindo.”
Jisu ninyia minto, “Nyimv, nga mvngjwng tvka, vkvnv aluv aariku nyi vdwv Abunyi so moodw sokaka kumnyajonya kumare vmalo Jerusalem loka kumnyajonya kumare.
Nonu Samaritan vdwv jvjv rungbv chima nonu yvvnyi kumdujodu nvdw; vbvritola ngonu Jius vdwv chindu ngonu yvvnyi kumdujodu nvdw, ogulvgavbolo so si Jius lokv ringlinbaalin v aadu.
Vbvritola aluv aariku okv vjak si doopv, Pwknvyarnv gv Dow gv jwkrw lokv nyi vdwv Abunyi jvjvbv kumlajola, ninyigv mvnglwk kaalwkbv kumrejoreku.
Pwknvyarnv Dowbv ridunv, okv yvv ninyia kumdujodunv hv jvjv rungbv okv dow bv kumlajola rirung sego.”
Nyimv angv ninyia minto, “Ngo chindu Kristo aariku, okv vdwlo hv aarikudw, hv ogumvnwng nga ngonua minbwk jireku.”
Jisu mirwk sutoku, “Hv dv ngo mabv, nam lvkobv raamisidunv.”
Vbvrire hoka Jisu gv lvbwlaksu vdwv aakur toku, okv bunu ninyia nyimv gonyi raami sudubv kaala kairungbv lamrwpanya toku. Vbvritola bunugv lokv yvvka nyimv anga “No ogugo mvngdu?” Vla minv kaamato, vmalo Jisu nyika “No ogubv nyimv anga raami sudunv?” vla tvvka nvgoka kaamato.
Vbvrikunamv nyimv angv isi pvchwng nga kayupila, banggubv vngkur toku, okv hoka nyi vdwa mintoku,
“Aato okv nyi anga kaakwto ngoogv ogugo rikunam mvnwngnga minpa nvgo. Kristo vnammv v bri?”
Vkvlvgabv bunu banggu a kayupila okv Jisu gvlo vngtoku.
Vbvridung rilo lvbwlaksu vdwv Jisunyi dinchi rungbv minto, “Tamsarnv, dvnam go dvlakv!”
Vbvritola hv mirwkto, “Ngoogvlo nonugv chimanam dvnam v doodu.”
Vkvlvgabv lvbwlaksu vdwv bunugv aralo tvka minsunyato “Nyi gunv ninyia dvnamgu bvnglwk jipv nvgu bri?”
