Nonu mimbwng namgo doodu, ‘Poolu pwpi go doodvdu aam nvdwv’vla. Vbvritola ngo nonua mindunv, rongo nga alvbv kaatoka; rongo gv aam hv nginduku okv nvvdubv riduku!
Yvvnyiv aam nvvpvdw nvvjo nga paadu okv turbwng gvnv dubv nvvchingla vvpvdu, ho hv lvvlwk nvla nvvchingnv lvkobv himpu pubam dubv vla.
‘Nyi akonv lvvriare nyi akonv nvvching riare’ vnam si jvjv rungdo.
Ngo nonugv rongo nyingma kolo nonua aam nvdubv vngmuto; kvvbi vdwv hoka nyingdu okv nonuno boksi paayadu.”
Achialvnv Samaritan nyi vdwv Jisu nyi mvngjwng toku ogulvgavbolo nyimv angv minto, “Ngoogv ogumvnwng riku nama hv ngam minpa toku.”
Vkvlvgabv vdwlo Samaritan vdwv hv golo aatokudw bunu ninyia dinchi rungbv minto bunua lvkobv dooming gvdubv, okv Jisu hoka alu lonyi go dootoku.
Achialv nyi go ninyia mvngjwng toku ninyigv doin a tvgvrila.
Okv bunu nyimv anga mintoku, “Ngonu vjak mvngjwng dukunv, noogv minam lokvma, ngonu atuv ninyi gvlo tvvnam lokv okv ngonu chinduku jvjvbv hv nyiamooku gv Ringnvbaanv gorung.”
Hoka alu lonyi go dooro kochingbv, Jisu vngraplaku okv Galili bv vngtoku.
Hv atubongv minsuto, “Nyijwk ka atubogv mooku lo mvngdv madunv.”
Vdwlo hv Galili lo vngchi tokudw, nyi vdwv ninyia alvrungbv aamu toku, ogulvgavbolo bunu Jerusalem lo vngbo pumja hoka vngtoku okv ho pumja hoka bunu ninyigv rinam mvnwngnga kaatoku.
Vbvrikunamv Jisu Galili gv Kana nampum lo vngkur toku, ninyigv isi ha anggor ala bv mvku hoka. Sorkari nyigam go hoka dooto ninyigv kuunyilo ngv Kaparnaum lo lvvma toku.
Vdwlo hv Jisu Judia lokv Galili lo aapv vla tvvpa pvkudw, hv Jisu gvlo aala okv ninyia tvvkato Kaparnaum bv vngla ninyigv kuunyilo sida svngv bv rinv nga mvpu jilabv vla dinchi rungbv minto.

Nyigam angv mirwkto, “Tamsarnv, nga lvkobv vngming gvcholabv ngoogv kuunyilo ngv sitv madvlo.”

Ninyigv nampum lamtv hoka ninyigv pakbu vdwv ninyia kaarwksula yunying nga gvjito, “No gv kuunyilo ngv turduku!”
Hv bunua tvvkato vdwlola ninyigv kuunyilo ngv alvyakunamv, okv bunu mirwkto, “Doonyi hv chaanyala tabv rilo tamiramhv ninyia liu toku.”
Vbvrikunamv abu angv mvngpa toku, ho dw lo Jisu gv ninyia “No gv kuunyilo ngv turriku,” vla mindwbv ritoku. Vkvlvgabv hv la okv ninyigv nyimv kuu vdwv mvngjwng nyatoku.

So kochingbv, Jisu dormo pumja lvgabv Jerusalem bv vngtoku.
Jerusalem gv svlar agi nvchilo svpar pargo dooto taabio angu goka dooto; Hebru gaam bv um Betjata vla minto.
Lvvmanv nyipam go taabio lo karpv nyato—nyikchingnv, lvpiknv, okv digwngnv. Bunu isi gv binam a kayala dooto,
ogulvgavbolo nyido gindung ngv idw dwkibv ila isi a bidubv mvto. Vbv isi v birap rinyi yvvdw hoka poklwk chodunv hv ogugo lvvma go gvpvdw poya dukunv.
Hoka nyi ako anying chaam gola nyingpinw go lvvmala doonvgo dooto.
Jisu nyi anga hoka doodubv kaatoku, okv hv chintoku nyi angv vkvjegu kaibv lvvmala doopv nvgo vla; vkvlvgabv hv ninyia tvvkato, “No chvrv kunvpv mvngdure?”
Lvvmanv nyi angv mirwksito, “Tamsarnv, vdwlo svpar bolokv isi v birinyi ngam bolo dvlwk jinv nyi go doyama; vdwlo ngo gilwk dubv ritv rinyi, nyigonv gilwk choyado.”
Jisu ninyia minto, “Gudung tokuka, noogv doopikarpi nvnv nga naarap tokuka, okv vngkar tokuka.”
Vjakgobv nyi angv alvtoku; hv ninyigv karpi nvnv nga naarap toku okv vngkar raptoku. Vbvriri aluv Jius Doonualu bv ritoku,
Vkvlvgabv Jius nyi rigvnv vdwv poyakunv nyi anga mintoku, “Silu Jius Doonualuv, okv noogv karpiu nvnv nga baknam si ngonugv Pvbv nga rinying do.”
Hv mirwkto, “Ngam mvpunv nyi angv ngam karpiu nvnv nga naarapla vngto kuka vla minto.”
Bunu ninyia tvvkato, “Nam sum ritokv vla minv nyi angv yvvla?”
Vbvritola mvpunam nyi angv Jisu yvvdw um chimato, hoka nyi nyipam go dooto, okv Jisu nyipam lokv vnglintoku.
Ayungjvma nga, Jisu nyi anga Pwknvyarnvnaam lo kaapa toku okv minto, “Tvvtoka, no alvrungpvku; vkvlvgabv rimur kumabvka vmalo alvmanv ngv nam rijila.”
Vbvrikunamv nyi angv vngtoku okv Jius nyi rigvnv vdwa minpa toku ninyia mvpunv nyi angv Jisu kv vla.
Vkvlvgabv bunu Jisunyi alvmabv rirap toku, ogulvgavbolo bunugv Jius Doonualu lo hv nyi anga mvpu jinam lvgabv.
Jisu bunua mirwkto, “Ngoogv Abu alu lokia nyingdunv, okv ngooka nyingrung jinv.”
So minam si Jius nyi vdwa kaiyayabv ninyia mvkidubv mvngmuto; Jius doonualu gv Pvbv nga mvyakmvchak mvngma, vbvritola hv minto Pwknvyarnvnyi atugv Abu vkv okv svbv hv atuv Pwknvyarnvnyi karingching dubv minsuto.
Vkvlvgabv Jisu bunua mirwksito, “Ngo nonua jvjv nga minjidu: Kuunyilo ngv hv atuv oguguka rinyuma; hv ninyigv Abu gv rinam a kaagvrila rimwngdunv. Abu ogugo ridudw, Kuunyilo ngvka ridu.
Abu Kuunyilo nga pakdu okv ninyia ninyigv rinam mvnwngnga kaatamdu. Hv ninyia sum kaiyabv ridubv, okv nonu mvnwngngv mvngngak reku.
Abu gv nyi sinv nga turkur moduku okv singnam a bunua jidu, vkv apiabv Kuunyilo ngvka ninyigv mvngkubv bunua singnam a jidu.
Abu yvvnyika jwngkadaka madu. Hv ninyigv Kuunyilo nga ogumvnwng nga jwngkadaka dubv jito,
Abunyi mvnwngngv mvngdvnam aingbv, Kuunyilo ngaaka mvngdv dubv. Yvvdw Kuunyilo nga mvngdv madunv hv ninyia vngmunv Abu nyika mvngdv madunv.”
“Ngo nonua jvjv nga minjidunv: yvvdw ngoogv gaam ha tvvdunv okv ngam imu nvnyi mvngjwng dunv hv torbwngnama paariku. Hv jwngkadaka lo domare ogulvgavbolo hv sinam loka vngbola turnamlo aapv kunv.
Ngo nonua jvjv nga minjidunv: dw ngv aadungduku—dw ngv aaropvku—vdwlo sinv vdwv Pwknvyarnv gv Kuunyilo gv gaam a tvvpare, okv yvvbunudw um tvvpa rinv hv turnamlo aariku.
Abunyi atuv turnam gv kolv ngv, vbvdvdvbv ninyigv Kuunyilo nga turnam gv kolv gubv mvpvkunv.
Hv Kuunyilo gvbv alvpoma nga jwngkadaka nvnv ngaaka jipv, ogulvgavrinyi hv Nyia Kuunyilo ngv.
Nonu sum lamrwpagv mabvka, sinv mvnwngngv ninyigv gaam a tvvpadwv aariku
okv bunugv nyibung vdwlokv linreku: yvvbunudw alvbv rikunv vdwv gudungla okv turreku, okv yvvbunudw alvmanv nga rikunv vdwv gudungre okv darra koore.”
“Ngo atuv oguguka rinyuma, Pwknvyarnv gv minam mvngchik a ngo makardu, vkvlvgabv ngoogv makarnamv jvjvdu, ogulvgavbolo ngo atuv alvnam lvgabv ritvma, vbvritola ngam vngmunv mvngchik gv mvnggiabv rijire.”
“Ngo ngo atubogv lvkwngbv minjidunv bolo, ogugo mindudw hv torwk sunam jvjv gubv rilin jimare.
Vbvritola ngoogv lvkwng nga minji nvgo akin go doodu okv ngo chindu hv ogugo ngo lvkwngbv minam dvdv ngv jvjvngv.
Jon ho angv yvv gvlo nonu nonugv gindungpingko nga vngmu pvdw, okv hv jvjvgv lvkwng nga japjito.
So si vbvma, ngo nyi mirianv ako doodu vla, ngo sum mimwngdunv nonua ringnam vdwa paamu dubv.
Jon mvru aingbv rito, guto okv ungkato, okv nonu ninyigv lounglo dw achukgo himpu karnvpv vla mvngdungto.
Vbvritola ngo atubogv lokv minse risego doodu so si Jon gv minam vdwaka kaiyanv go: ngo ogugo ridudw, ho hv, ngo Abu gv ngam ridubv jinammv so vdw si ngogvbv miriadu okv Abu ngam vngmupvnv vla kaatamdu.
Okv Abu, yvvdw ngam vngmunv, ngoogv lvkwng ngaaka minjidu. Nonu ninyigv gaam ha vdwloka tvvkwma vmalo ninyigv nyukmu aka kaakwma,
okv nonu ninyigv doin a nonugv haapok lo vvpvma, okv nonu nw gv vngmunam angaka mvngjwngma.
Nonu Darwknv Kitap vdwa puri rido, ogulvgavbolo nonu mvngdo bunu gvlo turbwng nama paare vla. Okv si Darwknv Kitaplo ngoogv lvkwngbv mindu!
Vbvrijvka nonuno turnam paanam lvgabv ngoogvlo aanvpv vla mvngma.”
“Ngo nyia vdwgv hartvnama makar madunv.
Vbvritola ngo chindu nonu oguaingnv nyi gudw, okv ngo chindu nonugv haapok lo Pwknvyarnv gv lvgabv aya namgo dooma.
Ngo Abu gv jwkrw ha lvkobv aagv pvnv, vbvritola nonuno nga torwk suma; vdwlo, vbvrijvka, kvvbi akonv ninyigv atugv jwkrw ha lvkobv aagv nama, nonu um torwk sure.
Nonu akonv akonvnga hartv minsu nama mvngbiu do, vbvritola nonu Pwknvyarnv akin mvngchik lokv hartvnama paanvpv vla rikwma; vbvrikunamv, oguaingbv nonu nga mvngjwng nyudubv?
Vbvrijvka, mvngma bvka, Pwknvyarnv gvlo ngo nonua gungnying lwkji bongv vla. Moses nonugv mvnggingla dvmin kunam, hv nonua gungnying lwkji bongv.
Nonuno Mosesnyi jvjvbv mvngjwng doonv guilo, nonu ngaaka mvngjwng doore, ogulvgavbolo hv ngoogv lvkwngbv lvkpvto.
Vbvritola hv ogugo lvkpvdw um nonuno mvngjwng manv ngv, oguaingbv ngoogv minam a nonu mvngjwng nyudubv?”
So kochingbv, Jisu Galili Svpar vmalo, Tiberias Svpar vlaka minam a vngbola vngtoku.
Nyi nyipam twngtv nvgo ninyia vngming gvto, ogulvgavbolo bunu ninyigv lvvmanv vdwa lamrwpadubv mvpuripu nama kaatoku.
Jisu moodw gulo chaatoku okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa lvkobv dootung toku.
Vngbokunam Pumja ridw v nvchi toku.
Jisu kaitkarla kaato okv nyipam v nw gvlo aadungdubv kaapato, vkvlvgabv nw Pilipnyi tvvkato, “Ngonu so nyi vdw sum dvgu dubv dvmunam lvgabv ogolo dvnam rvvpa nyuredw?”
Hv svbv minam si Pilipnyi tvvka rungbv minto; minjvjvbolo hv chincho suto ogugo hv rise ngvdw.
Pilip mirwkto, “Nyichar mvnwngnga achukgo dvmu dajvka, so si lokdwng lvngnyi go dinchirungre dvgudvbv dvnam rvvdubv.”
Ninyigv lvbwlaksu akonv, Andriu, Saimon Pitar gv boru bv rinv, angv minto,
“Olo vka vmi ako vtwng tangu go okv ngui nvnyi go gvnvgo doopv. Vbvritola hv so nyi mvnwng gv lvgabv chirung mare.”
Jisu bunua minto, “Nyi vdwa dootung dubv mvtoka,” (Hoka achialvgo nvmwng ngv dooto.) Vkvlvgabv nyi mvnwngngv dootung nyatoku; hoka ho nyiga dvdv ngv hejar angu gubv ritoku.
Jisu vtwng nga naato, okv Pwknvyarnvnyi umbonyikv vto, okv hoka doonv nyi vdwa ortoku. Nw ngui haka vbvdvdvbv mvto, okv bunu mvnwngngv vdwgo dvla pvkudw dvgubv dubv dvtoku.
Vdwlo bunu mvnwngngv dvji dubv dvto kudw, nw ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa minto, “Dvlv nga naakumto; akoka ornam orsubv ora momabvju.”
Vkvlvgabv bunu vtwng tangu nyi vdwgv dvkunam lokv dvtung dvngo dvlv mvnwngnga paapi vring gola anyigo naakum toku.
Jisu gv svbv lamrwpanam rila kaatam nama kaala hoka nyi vdwv minto, “So si jvjvbv Nyijwk gurung Sichingmooku so aakujinv akonv!”
Bunu ninyia naatungla Dvbv bv mvlilala tvdu vla Jisu chintoku; vkvlvgabv nw atubongv moodw vdwbv vngyu toku.
Vdwlo arium tokudw, Jisu gv lvbwlaksu vdwv svpar lo ilwk toku,
svpw gulo aalwk toku, okv svpar lo Kaparnaum kiambv vngkorla vngtoku. Arium kanv toku, okv Jisu vjaklodvbv bunu gvlo aatv madvto.
Vbvrikunamv kainv doori go rilwkto okv isi a kiokdubv mvtoku.
Lwbwlaksu vdwv svpwa dula lvtw angu vmalo akv gubv dulwk toku vdwlo bunu Jisunyi isi aolo vngdung dubv, svpw nvchilo aadung dubv kaapa toku, okv bunu busu nyatoku.
Jisu bunua minto, “Nonuno busu mabvka, si ngo sumabv!”
Vbvrikunamv bunu mvngpula ninyia svpw arwnglo aamu toku okv svpw lo bunugv vnglwkjiku mooku lo baapubv vngchi nyatoku.
Logo nvnga nyipam v svpar takdv gonvbv doonv vdwv oloka svpw ngv akin gumwng vla mvngdi nyatoku. Bunu Jisunyi ninyigv lvbwlaksu lvkobv vngma, vbvritola bunu ninyia kayupila vngyu ropvku vla chintoku.
Kvvbi svpw vdwv, Tiberias lokv, Jisu gv vtwng nga umbonyikv vro kochingbv nyi vdwa dvmuku mooku nvchi gv isi adarlo aakum nyatoku.
Vdwlo nyipam v Jisu hoka dooma, ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwvka dooma vla kaato kudw, bunu ho svpw vdw ho aanyatoku okv ninyia kaakarla Kaparnaumbv vngtoku.
Vdwlo nyi vdwv Jisunyi svpar gv takdv gunvlo kaapa tokudw, bunu ninyia tvvkato, “Tamsarnv, vdwlo no so aapvnv?”
Jisu mirwksito, “Ngo nonua jvjv nga minpa jidunv: nonuno ngam makardu ogulvgavbolo nonu vtwng nga dvla okv nonugv mvngnam a dvkunam lvgalo, ngoogv lamrwpanam rinam a chinam lokvma.
Alvmanv gubv rijinv dvnam lvgabv rima bvka, vmabvya turbwngla svngya jinv dvnam lvgabv rilaka. So siinv Nyia Kuunyilo gv nonua dvnam jiji namv, ogulvgavbolo Pwknvyarnv Abu ninyia alvnvgobv tolwk laku mvu pvkunv.”
Vkvlvgabv bunu ninyia tvvkato, “Pwknvyarnv gv mvnglwkbv rinam lvgabv ngonu ogugo rila sego bri?”
Jisu mirwksito, “Pwknvyarnv gv nonua ritokv vla mvngnamv si ninyigv vngmunam anga mvngjwng laka vla.”
Bunu mirwksito, “Ogu lamrwpanam go no rila kaatam dubv ngonu um kaagvrila nam mvngjwng dubv? No ogugo ridubv?
Ngonugv abuapa vdwv chukrimooku lo manna nga dvto Darwknv Kitaplo minam aingbv, ‘Hv nyido mooku tolokv vtwng nga jito dvmu dubv.’”

Pwknvyarnv gv vtwng jinammv hv yvvdw nyidomooku tolokv inv okv nyiamookua turnam jidu.”

Ngo ogugo mindudw nonu ogubv chima dunv? So si ogulvgavbolo nonu ngoogv doin ha tvvya nwngmado.

Vbvritola ngo jvjv nga minjidu, vkvlvgabv nonu ngam mwngjwng madunv.
Nonu gvlokv akonv yvvla ngam rimur nvgobv vla gungnying lwkla gaknyu jinv? Ngo jvjv nga mindu bolo, vbvrikunamv nonu ogubv ngam tvvjing madunv?
Yvvdw Pwknvyarnv gvlokv aadunv Pwknvyarnv gv gamchar vdwa tvvdunv. Nonu, ogubvrijeka, Pwknvyarnv lokvma, okv vkvlvgabv nonuno tvya madunv.”

Vbvrikunamv bunu ninyia vlwng ordubv vla naarap toku, vbvritola Jisu atubongv tosisito okv Pwknvyarnvnaam a vngyu toku.

Ngo vdwgo nyiamooku so dooridw, ngo nyiamooku gv loung ngv.”
Vbv so miro kochingbv, Jisu kvdw lo tachor chorbiakto okv chorbiak kolokv eriungbv mego mvto; nw nyi hvkvgv nyiklo piaklwkto

Bunu kvvbia vngming gvmare; vmabvya bunu kiyu yare vkvnv nyi nga ogulvgavbolo bunu ninyigv vlv nga tvvchinma.”

Ngoogv svlar kvgonv so svlarnaam soka doomanv vka doodunv. Ngo bunuaka so naalwk rungre, bunu ngoogv vlv nga tvvre, okv bunu svlar vdwa akin gubvrila kaayanv akingv kaanam gubv rireku.”

Lvkodv nyi vdwv apumlo so gaam vdw so gv lvgabv asak sutoku.

vdwlo nyi vdwv ninyia goyum tokudw okv tvvkato, “No ngonua vdwnvgo ayungbv angaaja mobwng modubv? Jvjv nga ngonua minjilabv: no Kristo rungre?”

Okv hoka nyi achialvgo ninyia mvngjwng toku.

Nyi achialvgo Merinyi kaalwkla aanv vdwv Jisu ogugo ripvkudw kaanya toku okv bunu ninyia mvngjwng nyatoku.
Vbvritola megonv bunu Parisis vdwgvlo vngkur toku okv Jisu ogugo ripvkudw minpa toku.
Vkvlvgabv Parisis vdwv, okv nyibu butvnv vdwv Kvba vdwa lvkobv kaarwksuto okv minto, “Ngonu oguridukubv? Kaatokuka so nyi gv lamrwpanam kaatamnam ma!
Ngonu so nyi sum svbv ribwng mobolo, nyichar mvnwngngv ninyia mvngjwng riku, okv Roman nyi kainv vdwv tvvchar kayarre okv ngonugv Pwknvyarnvnaam ha mvyakmvchak riku okv ngonugv haalung ngakka!”
Bunugv lokv akonv, aminv Kayapas, yvvdw ho anying hoka Nyibu Butvyachok nvbv rinv angv, minto, “Nonu ogu pvcha pvnvri!
Nonu mvngdi malare, haalung gv yaktv svnga, nonugv lvgabv alvyanvngv, nyi akin gonv nyi vdwgv lvgabv siria monam si?”
Minjvjvbolo hv sung atuv mvngsula mimato; vmabvya hv ho anying gv Nyibu Butvyachok nvbv rinam lvgabv, hv nyikrw kaala Jisu Jius nyi vdwgv lvgabv siria tvdu vla,
okv bunua mvngchikma, vbvritola Pwknvyarnvnyi mooku mvnwnglo doosik kunv vdwa akin gubvku naadumsidu kubvka.

No alu gv lokia heema nvnga lvkobv ribam tvdu, vbvritola no ngam lokia ribam paaku mare.”
Nyitwng tvngtv go Jisu Betani lo doopvku vla tvvpa toku, vkvlvgabv bunu hoka vngtoku, Jisu dopvkv vnam mwngchik lokvma vbvritola Jisu gv nyi siku nvnga turkur mokunam, Lajaras nyika kaadu bvka.
Vkvlvgabv Nyibu butvnv vdwv Lajaras nyika mvki tadubv rungtoku,
ogulvgavbolo ninyigv lvgalo Jius nyi achialvgo bunua toa toku okv Jisunyi mvngjwng nyatoku.

Jisu gv rikulo lvkobv rinv nyi vdwv vdwlo nw Lajarasnyi nyibung loka goklin kunam ha okv siku nvnga turkur mooku nama kaanv vdwv minpa nyatoku ogugo ripvkudw.
Vbvrikunam lvgabv nyipam v ninyi kaarwk sutoku-ogulvgavbolo bunu tvvpa toku hv so lamrwpanam sum rila kaatampv vla.

Ngo nonua jvjv nga minjidunv: aam amchar hv kvdwbolo chilwkla simumabolo amchar hv charkin tvla doobwngre, vbvrikunamv um chilwkla simukubolo, hv hintar go amring ngv ringtvyare.
Yvvdw atugv singnam ha paksu dunv hv ung nyemuyare; yvvdw atubogv singnam ha nyiamooku so kaanwng madunv hv torbwngnama paayare.
Yvvdw nga mvdur ridur nvpv mvngdunv hv nga vngming gvvrung laka, vbvrikubolo ngoogv pakbuv ngo ogolo doopvdw lvkobv dooming gvreku. Okv ngoogv Abu nga mvdur ridur nvnga mvngdv re.”
“Vjak ngoogv haapok v adwkaku do—okv ngo ogugo mvku svngvdw? Ngo vbv minre, ‘Abu, so gv dw sum ngoogvlo aamu mabv?’ Vbvritola ngo ho lvgabv aapvnv-so gv hirukaya sung ngo hirung svngvrung.
Abu no gv aminha kai moya toka!” Vbvrikunamv nyido mooku tolokv vlv go duluto, “Ngo um yungnam gubv naalwk pvkunv, okv ngo lvkodv vbv ritare.”

Vjakgv alu si nyiamooku a jwngkadakaku alu vku; vjak nyiamooku gv dvbv nga chara reku.
Vdwlo ngam nyiamooku sokv naacha rekudw, ngo nyichar mvnwngnga ngoogvlo naalwk sureku.”
Svbv minam si ninyigv hirukayala sise nga minto.
Nyipam v mirwkto, “Ngonugv Pvbv lo mindu Kristo turla doobwngre. Vbvrikunamv, ogubv, no mindunv nyia Kuunyilo nga naacha riku vla? Nyia kuunyilo vnam si yvvla?”

Vbvrikunamv, vdwgo loung ngv nonu gvlo doodudw, loung nga mvngjwng laka, vkvlvga nonu loung gv nyi bv ridubv.” Jisu sum minro kochingbv, vngyu toku okv bunugv lokv tosi sutoku.
Hv vdwnvgo bunugv kaakulo so lamrwpanam mvnwngnga rila kaatam kujeka, bunu ninyia mvngjwng matoku,
vkvlvga nyijwk Aijaya ogugo minpvdw v jvjvbv aarungre: “Ahtu, ngonugv doin minkunama yvvla mvngjwng jinv? Yvvnyila Ahtu gv jwkrw a kaatam tvvdunv?”

Vbvrikujeka, Jius nyi kainv achialvgo Jisunyi mvngjwng nyatoku; vbvritola Parisis vdwgv lvgalo bunu um minkokla milin nyumato, Jius kumkunaam lokv naalin konwng manam lvgabv.
Bunu Pwknvyarnv gv naarwk sunamma mvngbiu mabv nyi gv naarwk sunamma mvngbiu yato.

Yvvdw ngam kaadunv hv ngam vngmunv humka kaadunv.
Ngo nyiamooku so loung gubvrila aapvnv, vkvlvga yvvdw ngam mvngjwngnv nyichar mvnwngngv kanv arwnglo doobwng manam lvgabv.
Yvv akonv ngoogv doin ha tvvdunv okv um rima dunv, ngo ninyia jwngkadaka mare. Ngo nyiamookua jwngkadaka dubv aamapvnv, vbvritola um ringdubaadu bv aapvnv.
Yvvdw nga toa dunv okv ngoogv doin ha naarwk suma dunv um ninyia jwngkadaka reku. Ngoogv gaam japnam vdwv ataranya alulo ninyi jwngkadaka rireku!

Okv ngo chindu ninyigv gamki namv torbwngnama naalwk jidu. Vbvrikunamv, ngo ogugo mindu kudw hv Abu gv nga mintokv vla mimu namv.”
So si Vngbokunam Pumja aluv loma dwbv loochoyanv alu bv rito. Jisu ninyigv nyiamookua kayupikula okv Abu gvlo vngdwv aaduku vla chintoku. Nw nyiamooku so nw gvbvrinv vdwa alu gv dwkia arwng rungbv paktoku okv nw bunua ataranya alu lobv pakbwngre.
Jisu la ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwv dvnam dvla doonyato. Uyudvbv ngv Saimon Iskeriot gv kuunyilo Judas Iskeriot gv haapok lo Jisunyi kubdubv mvnggv nvnv nga lwkro toku.

Vkvlvgabv hv tvbul lokv dakrap toku, ninyigv agumlo vji a pilin toku, okv vbee vkv leit am puchingsito.
Vbvrikunamv nw gamla lo isi mego pwlwkto okv lvbwlaksu vdwgv lvpa vdwa harkak kakrap toku okv ninyigv leit lo puchingnam vbee lokv tipw toku.

Jisu chintoku yvvdw ninyia kubjinv angv; vkvlvgabv nw minto, “Mvnwngngv darwk pvku, akin gomwng.”
Jisu bunugv lvpa vdwa harkakro kochingbv nw ninyigv agum gv vji a pilwk sutoku okv ninyigv dooku tvbul lo aakur toku. Nw tvvkato, “Ngo vjak nonua ogugo ripvdw nonu chimpvre?”
“Nonu nga Ahtu okv Tamsarnv vla mindu, okv si rijwkkv nonu svbv rila, ogulvgavbolo ngo vbv rirungdo.
Ngo, nonugv Ahtu okv Tamsarnv, vjak nonugv lvpa vdwa harkakto. Vbvrikunamv, nonuka, akonv akonvgv lvpa nga harkak minsu laka.
Ngo nonua rimurilam jipvnv, nonua ngoogv nonua rinam apiabv rimu dubv vla.
Ngo nonua jvjv nga minjidunv: pakbu hv ninyigv Atua kaiyama dunv, okv jokria nvngv ninyia kanamla vngmunv anga kaiyama dunv.
Vjak nonu so gv jvjv nga chindu, nonu achialvbv mvngpu reku sum nonu riying bolo!”

Ngo nonua jvjv nga minjidunv: yvvdw ngoogv kanamla vngmunam akonyi naarwksidunv hv ngam naarwk tadunv; okv yvvdw ngam naarwksidunv hv ngam vngmunv ninyia naarwksitadunv.”
Jisu sum minro kochingbv, hv achialvbv mvngdwk mvngku lakula okv minlin toku, “Ngo jvjv nga nonua minjidunv: nonugv lokv akonv ngam koa tvduku.”
Lwbwlaksu vdwv akonv akonyi kaagap minsuto, achialvbv abwkalo kuma toku yvvnyi mindu nvbvre vla.

Pwknvyarnv gv kai nammv nw gvlokv kaapa duku nvbolo, vbvrikunamv Pwknvyarnvnyi Nyia Kuunyilo gv kai nama ninyigv lokv kaatamre okv hv vbv vjakgobv rireku.
Ngo gv kuu vdwa, ngo nonua kaigo lvkobv ribam kumare. Nonu nga kaakar reku; vbvritola ngo vjak nonua mindunv ngo oguaingbv Jius nyi kainv vdwa mindudw, ‘Ngo ogolo vngdudw nonu vngnyu mare.’
Okv ngo vjak nonua anwnv gamki gaamgo jidunv: ajin anyingnga pakmi sulaka. Ngoogv nonua paknam apiabv, vkvlvgabv nonuno pakmi sulaka,
Nonu akonv akonvnga pakmi sibolo, vbvrikunamv nyi mvnwngngv chinreku nonu ngoogv lvbwlaksu v vla.”
Saimon Pitar ninyia tvvkato, “Ahtu, no ogolo vngtv dunv?” Jisu mirwkto, “No vjak vngming gvnyu mare ngoogv vngkulo; vbvritola kokwnglo no nga vngming gvreku!”

“Mvngdwk mvngkula doomabvka,” Jisu bunua minto. “Pwknvyarnvnyi mvngjwng laka okv ngaaka mvngjwng laka.
Ngo Abu gv naam tv karchung ngv awgo doodu, okv ngo nonugv lvgabv dooku riku mvpvripv jitebv vngjinv. Minggvdvnam si doorung mabolo ngo nonua svbv mima dvnvpv.
Okv ngo vngla nonugv lvgabv dooku riku nga mvpv ripvro kochingbv, ngo aakur reku okv ngo atuv nonua naareku, vbvrikubolo ngo ogolo doopvdw nonuka dooming gvreku.

Ngam mvngjwng laka ngo vdwlo abu ngoogvlo doodunv okv ngo Abu gvlo doodunv vla minam a. Ho malo, ngoogv rinam a kaagvrila mvngjwng tvka.
Ngo nonua jvjv nga minjidunv: yvvdw ngam mvngjwng dunv hv ngoogv rinam aingbv rire—am, hv kaiyanv goka rire, ogulvgavbolo ngo abu gvlo vngjinv.
Okv nonu ngoogv amin bv ogugo kooridw ngo rijire, Abu gv kairungnv jwkrw nga Kuunyilo gvlokv kaatam kunam lvgabv.
Nonu ngoogv amin bv ngam ogugo kooridw, ngo um rijire.”
“Nonu nga mvngjwng bolo, nonu ngoogv gamki nama tvjirijire.
Ngo Abunyi koore, okv hv nonua ridur rianv kvvbigo jire, hv nonua dvbvsvngtambv dooming gvvre.
Hv Dow hv Pwknvyarnv gv jvjv nga kaatam rianv. Nyiamooku v ninyia naarwk nyumare, ogulvgavbolo hv ninyia chima vmalo kaakwma. Vbvritola nonu ninyia chindu, ogulvgavbolo hv nonu gvlo lvkobv doobwngdu okv nonu lo doodu.”
“Vdwlo ngo vngro jeka, nonua ngo opin jvbv doomu mare; ngo nonu gvlo aakur reku.

Vdwlo ho aluv lori kudw, nonu chinre ngo Abu gvlo doodu, okv nonu ngoogvlo doodu, ngo oguaingbv nonu gvlo doodudw ho apiabv.”
“Yvvdw ngoogv gamki nama torwk sudunv okv um tvduridunv hv ngam paknvrinvbv ridunv. Yvvdw ngam pakdunv um ngoogv Abu pakre; ngooka ninyia paktare okv ngo atuv ninyia kaatam sure.”
(Judas Iskariotnyi miyamabv) Judas gunv minto, “Ahtu, no atuv ngonua kaatamre okv nyiamookua kaatam sumare, hv oguaingbv ritv dunv?”
Jisu ninyia minrwkto, “Yvvdw ngam pakdunv hv ngoogv tamsar nama tvduridunv. Ngoogv Abu ninyia pakre, okv ngo la Abu ninyi gvlo aala lvkobv dooming gvvre.
Yvvdw ngam pakma dunv ngoogv tamsar nama tvvmarima dunv. Okv nonugv tvvnam ngoogv tamsar namv ngo gvngvma, vbvritola ngam vngmunv Abu gvlo naapvnv.”
“Ngo nonua minpvkunv nonuam lvkobv doodula.
Ridur rianv, Darwknv Dow, Abu gv ngo amin bv imu kujinam v, nonua tamsarre okv ngoogv nonua minam dvdv nga mvngpa more.”
“Nonua ngo sarsopoyo nama lvkobv kayu jido; so si ngo atugv sarsopvyo nama nonua jipvnv. Um ngo nyiamooku gv rinam aingbv jima. Mvngdwk mvngkula doomabvka; Busu mabvka.
Nonu ngam nonua ‘Ngo vngjinv, vdubv tvvdu, vbvritola ngo nonu gvlo aakur reku,’ nonu ngam pakdu bolo, ngoogv Abu gvlo vngnam ha nonu mvngpure; ogulvgavbolo hv ngam kaiyanv.
Ngo nonua mintam chodunv so gv ogumvnwng si ritv madvbv, vkvlvga vdwlo si rirekudw nonu mvngjwng reku.

Nikodemas, yvvdw kvvlo Jisunyi ayubv kaarwk sudubv aanv angv, hv mairrh okv aloe mvyomvchila amok nampunv vkv keji chaamgo gvla Josepnyi lvkobv vngming gvto.

Jisunyi ogolo mvki pvkudw hoka mooku hoka nayam ako dooto, okv hoka ho svma magoka lwkw manam anwnv nyibung bunggo dooto.

Vjwngalu gv arukamchi bv, kanv ngv doodv dubv, Meri Magdalene nyibung lo vngto okv aagiagv vlwng nga naala naa rodubv kaapa toku.
Nw Saimon Pitar okv Jisu gv paknam kvvbi lvbwlaksu vdwgvlo riolwk toku, okv bunua minpa jitoku, “Bunu Ahtunyi nyibung loka naaropvku vla, okv ngonu chima ogolo bunu ninyia vvpvpvkudw!”

okv nyido gindung anyigo vji yapung tojinv kotola Jisunyi vvpvku hoka doodubv kaatoku, akonv dumpo dooku kyambv okv akonv lvpa dooku kyambv,

“Nyimv, no ogubv kapdunv?” Jisu ninyia tvvkato. “No Yvvnyila kaakar dunv?” Nw um nayam kaaya nvgo vla ninyia mvngto, vkvlvgabv nw ninyia mintoku, “No ninyia naaropvnvbolo, tamsarnv, nga minpalabv no ninyia ogolo vvpv pvnvla, ngo vngla ninyia naaku nvpvla.”

Vkvlvgabv Meri Magdalene vngtoku okv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa minpa jitoku nw Ahtunyi kaapv nvkv vla okv ninyigv bunua minam vdwa hv mintam jitoku.
Vjwngalu gv arium riumdwng bv, okv lvbwlaksu vdwv bunu adarai lo agi a koktum sutola lvkobv dookum nyato, ogulvgavbolo bunu Jius nyi kainv vdwa busu nyato. Vbvrikunamv Jisu aatoku okv bunu gvlo daktoku. Nw minto, “Sarsopoyo ngv nonu gvlo lvkobv doolwk laka.”

Nonu nyi vdwgv rimur a mvngnga jibolo, bunuaka mvngnga jireku; nonu bunua mvngnga mabolo, bunuaka mvngnga mare.”

Vbvritola so lvkgap pvvnam vdw so gv lvkwng ngv nonua Jisunyi Kristo, Pwknvyarnv gv Kuunyilo ngv vla mvngjwng modukubv, okv nonugv vbv ninyi mvngjwng kolokv nonu turbwng nama paadu kubv.

Saimon Pitar, Tomas (Bvngpiam sinam vla minam), Natanael (Hv Galili gv Kana lokv), Jibedi gv kuunyilo vdwv, okv Jisu gv kvvbi lvbwlaksu anyiv la mvnwngngv lvkobv dookumtoku.

Nw bunua minto, “Nonugv vsap a svpw hokv lakbik takbv orlwk kwto, okv nonu mego naare.” Vkvlvgabv bunu bunugv vsap a orlwk toku okv um pukorla pulwk nyuma toku, ogulvgavbolo achialvbv ngui naakunam lvgabv.
Jisu gv paknam lvbwlaksu angv Pitarnyi minto, “Si Ahtu laka!” Vdwlo Pitar Ahtu vla tvvpa tvkudw, hv ninyigv agum vji a koorum sutoku (hv ninyigv vji a pilinla vvpv kunam um) okv isi bv poklwk toku.
Kvvbi lvbwlaksu vdwv svpw lokv agumbv dulunlinla vsaplo ngui yarpok kunam a puming gvto. Bunu agum gv kvdw a adu jeyo kumato, mitar lwngkin gubv adu to.
Vdwlo bunu agum kvdwlo korlin tokudw, bunu vtwng vkvla ngui go vmv mvri lo baalwk tvla doodubv kaapato.

Jisu bunua minto, “Aato okv dvto.” Lwbwlaksu vdwv yvv akonvka mvngpakla ninyia “No yvvla?” Vla tvvka nvgoka kaama, ogulvgavbolo bunu si Ahtu kv vla chintoku.
Vkvlvgabv Jisu vngla, vtwng nga naato okv bunua jitoku; okv ngui haka vbvdvdvbv rito.
Jisu sinam lokv turrapro kochingbv ninyigv lvbwlaksu vdwa kaarwk sunamv si lvom nvnvku.
Bunu dvro kochingbv, Jisu Saimon Pitarnyi minto, “Saimon, Jon gv kuunyilo, no ngam so kvvbi vdwgv ngam paknama kaiyabv pakya dunvre?” Hv mirwkto, “Vkv, Ahtu, nam ngoogv paknam ma no chindu.” Jisu ninyia minto, “Ngoogv svlarkuu vdwa alvbv kaaya laka.”
Jisu lvnyi nvbv ninyia minto, “Saimon Jon gv kuunyilo, no ngam pakdunvre?” Hv mirwkto, “Vkv, Ahtu, nam ngoogv paknam a no chindu.” Jisu ninyia minto, “Ngoogv svlar vdwa alvbv kaaya laka.”
Jisu lvom nvbv minto, “Saimon Jon gv kuunyilo, no nga pakdunvre?” Pitar mvngru toku ogulvgavbolo Jisu ninyia lvom go “No nga pakdunvre?” Vla tvvka kunam lvkwngbv vkvlvgabv hv Jisunyi minto, “Ahtu, no ogumvnwngnga chindunv; no chindu nam ngoogv paknama!” Jisu ninyia minto, “Ngoogv svlar vdwa alvbv kaaya laka.
Ngo nam jvjv nga minjidunv: nonugv yaapa rilo nonu ogolo vngso mvngpvdw no mvgemvrap sula vngdung vngbab karminto; vbvritola noogv nyikam rilo, no lak v laklin reku okv kvvbi akonv nam leeriku okv noogv vngso mvngma kolo vnggv reku.”
(Jisu gv ninyia svbv minam si Pitar silaku Pwknvyarnvnyi kaibv yunglit mosenga mintoku.) Vbvrikunamv Jisu ninyia “Nga vngming gvlaak!” vla mintoku.
Pitar kaakor kaarwk namv Jisu gv paknam kvvbi lvbwlaksu anga adarlo dakdubv kaapato—hv Jisu gv dvnam dvgv rilo ninyigv nvchilo doolwk dvla “Ahtu nam yvvla koa tvdunv?” vla tvvkanv angv.

Nw kuna lvbwlaksu angv yvvdw so vdw sum mindunv, okv sum lvkgap pvnv angv; okv ngonu chindu nw ogugo minpvkudw hv jvjv ngv.
Vjak, Jisu gv kvvbi aba rikunam dvdv ngv hoka achialv toku. Um akin akinbv lvknv guilo ngo mvngkanamv nyiamooku mvnwng si um lvkpv nama dvbwng nyulamare.
Pakmisinam Tiopilas: Ngoogv lvktulwkke lwknam kitap lo ngo Jisu gv ogumvnwng rinam okv minam ninyigv atukalu ho rinama lvkpvnv
ninyi nyidomooku chaatv madvbv alulo. Ninyigv chaama dvbv, Hv kaatamritamla Darwknv Dow jwkrw lokv ninyigv Apostol gobv darlin kunam nyi vdwa.
Vkvgv siro kunam kochingso alu champi go ogolo lamtv lo hv nyi vdwa kaarwksuku nama ho hv turpvkunv vv nyi vdwa kaatam kunam. Bunu ninyia kaatoku, okv hv bunua lvkobv Pwknvyarnv gv Karv gv lvgabv japbam toku.
Okv vdwlo bunu lvkobv aato kudw, hv bunua so orto sum jitoku: “Jerusalem am vngyu mabv kv, vbvritola jwkrw lvgabv doyato ngoogv nonuam minpv nama, ngo Abu gv jwkrw milv nama.
Jon isi lokv baptisma jito, vbvritola so lonyiloum so nonua Darwknv Dow lokv baptisma jire.”
Vdwlo Apostol vdwv Jisunyi kaarwk sikubvdw, bunu vdwv ninyia tvvkato, “Ahtu, no so vjakdadw suka Israel am Karv nga jikur dooku bvre?”
Jisu bunua minto, “Ridwvngdw ngv ngoogv Abu gv atubogv tujupkunamv, okv so si nonu lvgabv chinsvma vdwlo vv bunu ririkudw.
Vbvritola vdwlo Darwknv Dowv nonu gvlo aaku bolo, no jwkrw doriku, okv no ngo gvbvku minjiyanv gobv ririku Jerusalem lo Judia mvnwnglo okv Samaria okv sichingmooku gv dotvr mvnwnglo mingo jinv gobv ririku.”
Miro koching so ninyi nyidomooku naacha kunama ho vdwv kaaria toku, okv ho vdwgv kaanyung aku ninyia hapumv kaklum toku.
Bunu vdwv vjaklodvbv nyido tlo bv ninyigv chaanama roodungla kaaria kunamv, ogolokv nyi anyigo vji jipung kootola dvminmabv bunu vdwgvlo aala dakbamto
okv minto, “Galili nyi vdwv, ogulvgabv nonuno daktola nyidotolo kaadung dunv? Si Jisu si, nonugv lokv nyidomooku bv naacha kunama, nonu ninyia nyidomooku bv chaadubv kaaming gvnam aingbv nw vbvching lvkodv aakur reku.”
Okv Apostol vdwv Olib gv Moodw lokv Jerusalem lo vngkur toku, hv pamtv lokv lvtw gobv aduto.
Bunu banggu lo aachi toku okv ho vdwgv karchung dookulo chaachi toku: Pitar, Jon, Jems okv Andriu, Pilip okv Tomas, Bartolomiu okv Metiu, Alpius gv kuunyilo Jems, Saimon ringria kunv okv Jems gv kuunyilo Judas.
Bunu dookum nyato kumbwng nyala, anvnyimv vdwv okv Jisu gv anv Meri okv ninyigv boru vdwv lvkobv.
Alu lonyiloum koching ho mvngjwngnv vdwv doopamgo pamto, hokaku lwnggola chamnyi gubv, okv Pitarnyi japdubv daktoku.
“Ngoogv ajin vdwv,” hv minto, “Darwknv Dow lokv minamv darwknv kitapv jvjvbv aaduku, Dabid gv lokv, oogv Jisunyi booku nama chigudabianv Judas gv lvkwng lo mincho moodubv mvtoku.
Judas ka ngonugv apam lo ribamv, hv ngonugv kudungkua aba lo ribam kunam akobv darlin kunamv.” (
Judas gv alvmanv rijo morko paanama rongo rvvnv toku, ho rongo hoka ninyi atubongv hoksar sitoku; ninyi godit goitla okv ninyigv tangiv pokdik lintoku.

Darwknv Dowv lvkobv ho mvnwng nga aaku namv Dowv kvvbi gaam aingbv japdu kubv bunua mvtoku.

Vdwlo bunu so svdua tvvpapvdw, nyi nyitwnggo aakum toku. Bunu mvnwng ngv yaa mvngtoku, ogulvgavbolo akinakin bv mvnwng ngv mvngjwngnv vdwa bunu atugv gaambv japdubv tvvtoku.

Si oguaingbv, vbvrikunamv, ngonu mvnwng ngv ho bunua ngonugv atugv gaam nga japdubv tvvdunv?
Ngonu Partia lokv, Media, okv Elam; Mesopotamia lokv, Judia, okv kapadosia; Pontus okv Asia lokv gvngv,
Prigia lokv, okv Pampilia lokv, Ijipt okv Sairen nvchi Libya mooku lokv. Ngonu kvvgonv Rom lokv gvngv,

Lamnam okv mvngbwk mabv, bunu akonv akonyi tvvka minsuto, “Si ogu gubvri?”

So nyi vdwv tvngmanv, oguaingbv no mvngdudw; si arugv kia baje mvngchikdu.
Vmabvya, so si nyijwk Joel gv ogugo mingkunamv vvkv:

Vvka tikmabv, ngoogv nyira anyi, pakbu okv paknv loka, Ngo aamure ngoogv Dow ho alunyi, okv bunu minjire ngoogv doina.
Ngo nyido aolo lamrwpadubv kaatamre okv sichingmooku lvkwnglo kaasartabo more. Hoka ka oyi, vmv, okv mvkwv doore;

Okv vbvrikunamv, yvvdw Ahtunyi ringkudubv gokdunv um ringreku.’

Ninyigv atubongv mvngdung lokv Pwknvyarnv mvngpv kunam ho Jisunyi bunu gvlo laklwk jitoku; okv nonuno rimurnv nyi vdwa ninyia daapo lo takki motoku.

No nga kaatamto singjiku lamtv nga, okv noogv doonam lokv nga lvkobv himpu moto.’
“Ngoogv ajin vdwa, Ngo nonua minda kalabv mindunv ngoogv yungnam abuapa Dvbv Dabid gv lvkwngbv. Hv sitoku okv svma nga ritoku, okv ninyigv nyibung ngv silu gudvbv ngonua lvkobv dooming gvdo.
Hv nyijwk gubv ritoku, okv Pwknvyarnv ogugo ninyia milv pvdw um hv chindu: Pwknvyarnv milv toku Dvbv Dabid aingnvgo, ninyigv husi lokv akonyi Dvbv bv mvre.

Hv ka turkur kunv ngv Pwknvyarnv gv lakbik peelvbv doonv, ninyigv Abu lokv okv Darwknv Dowa ninyi naarwk sitoku, ninyigv milvnam lokv. No ogu gunyi vjv kaadunv okv tvvdunv si ninyigv jinamgo ho hv ngonua Darwknv Dowa jilwk toku.

ngo noogv nyimak am lvchu arwnglo vvpvma dvdvlo.’
“Israel gv nyi mvnwng ngv, vbvritola hoka nonu chirungto si Jisu, yvvnyi nonu daapolo takipvdw, ho angv Pwknvyarnv gv mvkunam Ahtu okv Messiah!”

Pitar bunua dinchinam gaam minto okv hv mindwkkrwkla minto, “Alvmanv nyi vdwgvlo mvritririt aarinvpv nonuno ringsu laka!”
Bunu vdwv awgonv mvngjwngto ninyigv doina okv baptisma naakunam, okv ho alulo hejar aom dvsv gobv nyitwnggo apam hoka aapwng toku.
Bunugv dwa jila Apostol vdwgvlo risar sunya toku, kumkulo kumbam nyato, dvnam am jimi suto okv kummi suto.

Mvngjwngnv mvnwng ngv lvkin gubv nvchibv kumkulo kumbv ribv nyatoku okv bunugv yikungyira am ajinanying nga jimi sunya toku.
Bunu vdwv atugv yikungyira okv ayi nga pyoktokula okv morko nga mvnwng ngv pingkolo akinakin gv ogugo dinchinam nga orpinorin sito.
Alu logo yayaku bunu lvkobv Pwknvyarnv gv Naam arwnglo apam gubv kaarwksuto, okv bunugv dvnamtvngnam nga bunugv naamlo lvkobv, hapokv mvngpula okv nyaknyak bv dvbamto,
Pwknvyarnv hartv la, okv nyi mvnwng gv alvbv mvngnam saknama himpala himpu nyatoku. Okv alu lokia Ahtu ringlin kunam vdwa bunugv apumlo aapwng momu toku.
Alu logolo Pitar okv Jon kumdw lo, ariumgv gunta aom lo kumbv Pwknvyarnvnaam lo vngtoku.
Hoka Kaapunv Agi minamgo dooto, nyi ako ninyigv singcha ilo gvngv lvpik bogobv rinvgo dooto. Aludwkibv ninyia agi lo baklwk kito nyi vdwlokv morko koonam lvgabv yvvbunu Pwknvyarnv gv Pwknvyarnvnaam bv vngdudw.
Vdwlo hv Pitar okv Jon bunyia arwngbv aadubv kaapa tokudw, hv ogu achukgo ninyia jikubv bunua kootoku.

Vkvlvgabv hv bunua kaato, mvngto bunu gvlo ogu achukgo paiji vla.
Vbvritola Pitar ninyia mintoku, “Vjak ngo gvlo morko achukguka kaama, vbvritola ngo nam jire ngo gvlo ogugo doopvdw: Najaret Jisu Kristo gv amin bv ngo nam mindunv gudungto okv vngkar tokuka!”
Vbvrikunamv hv gakbwngto ninyigv laakbik laak lokv okv ninyia svvraptoku. Vjakpigobv nyi angv gv lvpa okv gorbwng ngv gwlwktoku;
hv pokdinpokrin toku, ninyigv lvpa ngv dakdin jitoku, okv vngraptoku angchar vngyarla. Vbvrikunamv hv bunugv lvkobv Pwknvyarnv gv Naam arwngbv aaming gvvto, vngyingla okv pokyingla okv Pwknvyarnv hartvbamtvla.

okv vdwlo bunu ninyia kaapunv agilo dootola koriak karnv gubv kachin tukudw, bunu mvnwng ngv lamdokpanyato okv mvngnyato ogugo ninyia ripv kunvdw.
Pitar okv Jon Solomon gv giabv, vla um vbvching mintoku hoka vngrilo nyi angv bunyia gakbwng toku, nyi vdwv lamngakpanyato okv bunu gvlo joklwk nyatoku.
Vdwlo Pitar nyi vdwa kaapa tokula, hv bunua minto, “Israel gv nyi vdwv, Ho so nonuno ogubv lamdokpadunv, okv nonuno ogubv ngonua kaagap chinchila kaadunv? Nonu vbv mvngdunvre soogv nyi angv sum vngdu kubv mvnam si ngonu atugv gwlwk vmalo jwkrw lokv mvpv nvgo mvngdu ai?
Abraham gv, Isaak gv, okv Jakop gv Pwknvyarnv, ngonugv abuapa vdwgv Pwknvyarnv, ninyigv Pakbu Jisunyi ninyigv kainv jwkrwa jito. Vbvritola nonuno ninyia rigvdoogvnv vdwgvlo laklwkto, okv nonuno Pilot gv dookulo ninyia toa jitoku, Pilat gv ninyia topu dokubv vla minro koching bvka.
Hv darwkto okv alvnvbv ritoku, vbvritola nonuno ninyia toa toku, okv bununo nyi mvki yanv anga alvyabv mvngla tulin kunam lvgabv pilatnyi nonuno koonyato.

Jisu ninyigv amin bv jwkrwa so lvpiknv nyi anga turnv nvnga jitoku. Nonuno ogu gunyi kaadudw okv chindu kudw mvngjwng lokv ninyigv amin bv ripvkonv; Jisunyi mvngjwng kunam lvgalo ninyia alvmopv kunv, vbv nonu mvnwng nga kaadubv.
“Okv vjv, ngoogv ajin vdwv, ngo chindu ho nonuno ogugunyi okv nonugv nyi rigvnv vdwv Jisunyi chinchirichi mabv rinyato.

Vbvrikunamv, mvngdwn tokuka, okv Pwknvyarnv gvlo aanyato, nonuno vbv rikubolo, hv nonugv rimur am mvngnga jiriku.

Hv nyidomooku lo doyare ho dw vv aama dvdvlo ogumvnwng ngv anw malo, Pwknvyarnv vbv mimpa jito ninyigv darwknv nyijwk yvvbunudw krimklu gv rinv lokv.

Akonv yvv ho nyijwk am tvvmabolo Pwknvyarnv gv nyi vdwgvlo mvpin suriku okv mvyakmvchak riku.’
Okv nyijwk mvnwng ngv yvv doin minpvdw Samuelnyi mindvla okv yvvbunu ninyigv kochingbv aakunv, japta jitoku Silumelu ogugo ridu kudw.
Nonu gvbv nyijwk vdwgv lokv Pwknvyarnv milv jito, okv ogugonyi Pwknvyarnv nonugv abuapa vdwa lvkobv mvrwjinama nonuno mvpinmiyin minsuto. Hv Abrahamnyi vbv minto, ‘Nonugv husi lokv ngo schingmooku gv nyi mvnwng nga ayare.’
Okv vkvlvgabv Pwknvyarnv ninyigv Pakbu nga gaklin riku okv ninyia nonu lo jilwk chore, nonua ayare nonugv akinakin gv alvmanv lamtv loka lingkur moriku.”
Pitar okv Jon nyi vdwa mindung rilo, nyibu kvvgonv, Pwknvyarnvnaam dakriakarianv okv Sadusi kvvgonv vngchi toku.
Bunu ridwkriku nyato vkvlvgavbolo Apostol anyiv nyi vdwa tamsarla ho Jisu gv sipikula turkur kunama, vdwlo chintoku ho sitokula turkur kunv nga.
Vkvlvgabv bunu bunua naatungto okv bunua patwk arwnglo tumpvto alu lonyinvnv aama dvdvbv, si ogubvrijvka tapv rotoku.
Vbvritokula meegonv yvv doina tvvpvdw vv mvngjwngto; okv nyi vdwv aapwng yayala hejar angu dvsv gubv ritoku.
Alu logonvgv kochingbv Jius gv rigvbu vdw, nyigagatv vdw, okv pvbv tamsarnv vdwv Jerusalem aakumto.
Bunu lvkobv kaarwk minsuto nyibu butvyachok Annas okv Kaiapas, Jon, Alekjandar, okv yvvdw nyibu butv gv dvpar parkin bv rinv kvvbi vdwaka.
Bunu milinto Apostol vdwa bunugv atuklo dakmu tvla okv bunua tvuto, “No oguaingbv ripvnv so? No ogolokv jwkrw papvnv vmalo yvvgv amin bv nonu rinv dunv?”
Pitar, Darwknv Dow ngv akomaring bv dootola, bunua mirwksuto, “Nyi vdwa tujupkunam vdwa la okv nyigagatv vdwa:
ngonu silu alvrungnv rinam nyi lvpikbo anga okv oguaingbv hv mvpunam vdw tvvkabolo,
vbvrikunamv nonu mvnwng ngv chinto kulaka, okv Israel gv nyi mvnwng vka chinto kulaka, ho nonugv kaagialo so suka daknv nyi angv ogumvnwng ngv alv duku Najaret Jisu kristo gv amin gv jwkrw nonugv daapo lo takkinam okv sikunv anga Pwknvyarnv gv turkur mokunam.
Jisu Darwknv kitaplo minpvnam angv, ‘Nonu naam mvnv vdwgv toakunam vlwng angv mvnwng nga dinchi yachok nvgobv ritoku.’
Ringlinbaalin nama ninyi akin lokv pamwngre; nyiamooku soka Pwknvyarnv yvvnyika jinam kaama ngonua ringnyu dubv.”
Dopam gv nyi vdwv Pitar okv Jon bunyia kaanyato okv chintoku bunyiv ogumanv ngv puriputa kaama nvgo oguaingbv busu mabv mindu nvgoda vla lamnyato. Vbvrikunamv bunu mvngdw toku ho bunyiv Jisu gv rikulo rinvgo.
Vbvritola bunu hoka oguka minyu kumato, ogulvgavbolo nyi mvpunam angv Pitar okv Jon bunyi lvkobv dakdubv bunu kaato.
Vkvlvgabv bunu bunua kvbadopam karchung lokv vngro dukubv mintoku, okv vbvrikunamv bunu bunugv pinkolo japrap minsuto.
“Ngonu so nyi vdwa lvkobv ogu ridubv?” bunu tvvkato. “Jerusalem gv nyi nyicharv ho chinyato so bunu gvlo akusubv rinyu manam lamrwpanam go kaatamto, okv ngonu hum miya jinyuma.
Vbvritola so gaam sum pvpvlaju nyi vdwgv pinkolo tvvsik suma dubv, klvi ngonu so nyi vdwa gamrw laju yvvnyika lvkodv Jisu gv amina minkar kuma dubv mintor laju.”
Vkvlvgabv bunu arwnglo bunua gokkur lvkto okv bunua mintoku ogugoka tvvkayo nonuno Jisu gv amin bv japkuyo vmalo tamsarka koomabvkv.
Vbvritola Pitar okv Jon bunua mirwksuto, “Nonu atuv jwngkadaka suto ogolo angv Pwknvyarnv gvlo tarwkbak yadunvdw—nonua tvvria svgobvri vmalo Pwknvyarnvnyi tvvria svgobvri.
Ngonu atubongv ogugo kaapvdw okv tvvpvdw um ngonu mintong nga topunyuma.”
Vkvlvgabv dopamv bunua kaiyayabv gamrw rwkto okv vbvrikunamv bunua topu nyatoku. Bunu kaatoku hoka bunua mvrit nyomare vla, ogulvgavbolo ogugo ripvkudi um nyi mvnwng ngv Pwknvyarnv hartv tvvdung nyatoku.
Yvvnyi lamrwpadubv kaatamla mvpunam nyi angv anying champi lvgubv ritoku.
Pitar okv Jon bunyia topusopitda, bunugv ribam achamlo bunu vngkurtuku okv bunua mimpa toku ogugo nyibu butv vdwgv okv nyigagatv vdwgv minku nvnga.
Vdwlo mvngjwngnv vdwv um tvvpa namgola, bunu mvnwng ngv lvkin gobv Pwknvyarnvnyi kumto: “Ahtuv okv nyidomooku nga Pwklinyarlinv, sichingmooku, okv Svmasa, okv ho bunu doonv mvnwng ngv ninyi gvngv!
No minto Darwknv Dow lokv ngonugv abuapa noogv pakbu, Dabid gvlo, vdwlo hv minto, ‘Ogubv Jentail vdwa haak nyadunv; ogubv nyi vdwv anyung kaamabv bunu gwngnya dunv?
Sichingmooku gv dvbv vdwv bunu atubongv mvngbv rinyato, okv nyi am rigvnv vdwv lvkobv kaarwk minsula Ahtunyi okv ninyigv Kristonyi nyiru nyato.’
Herod okv Pontius Pilat soogv pamtvlo jentail vdwa lvkobv kaarwk minsuto okv Israel gv nyi vdwvka Jisunyi nyirula, noogv Darwknv Pakbu, yvvnyi noogv Messiah mvnamv.
Bunu ogumvnwng nga ridubv vngkum nyatoku ho noogv jwkrw okv mvngnam lokv rirung nvpv vnamv.
Okv vjv, Ahtua, bunugv milam mincham la rinam am kaayato, okv ngonua jito, noogv pakbu vdwa milakdubv, noogv doin mvnwng nga lvkobv busukano kamabv mindubv.
Mvpudubv noogv laakv irapto, okv ho gv kaasartabo okv lamrwpanama kaatam dubv jilinto noogv darwknv Pakbu Jisu gv amin bv.”
Vdwlo bunu kumnya kunam gola, hoka bunugv dopam dookulo hwkdinto. Bunu mvnwng nga lvkobv Darwknv Dow aatoku okv Pwknvyarnv gv doina lvkobv busukano kamabv japgo raptoku.
Mvngjwngnv vdwv haapokv pwkin gubv mvngtoku. Yvvka ninyigv atu gvngv kv vla minkumato, vbvritola bunugv ogugo doodudw mvnwng nga bunu vdwv lvkobv orpin sitoku.
Kainv jwkrwa lvkobv Apostol vdwv Ahtu Jisu gv turkur kunama mingo jitoku, okv Pwknvyarnv bunu mvnwng nga nyitv nga boktalwkji toku.
Hoka nyipam arwng hoka yvvnyika paajinv dvdv ngv pamanam kaakuma. Yvvbunudw rongo vmalo naam doonv ngv um pyoktokula, pyoknam morko naarwk sukunama bvnglwk nyatoku,
okv um Apostol vdwgv laak lo laklwk toku; okv morko nga barsaksakbv ninyigv mvngnam lo orpin sitoku.
Okv vbv ho Josep vnamgo, Lebi nyigo Saipraslo bvngnamgo, ninyia Apostol vdwv Barnabas vla minto (ho minamsi “Oogv mintvmiru yanv”),
hv atubongv gv rongo nga pyoklaku, morko nga bvnglwk jitoku, okv Apostol vdwgvlo laklwk jitoku.
Vbvritola hoka nyi akonvgv aminv Ananias, ho ninyigv nywng Sapphira lvkobv bunugvlo yikungyira doonv nga kvvgonyi pyoktoku.
Vbvritola ninyigv nywng gv lvkobv umkvpakv vmisila hv morko kvvgonyi nyigvbv pvchingto okv kvvgonyi Apostol vdwlo laklwkto.

Atuk lo no yikungyira nga pyoktv madvbv, vv no gvbv rito; okv pyokro kochingbv, morko ngv nokvku. Vbvrikunamv, no ogubv so svkvnvgo ridubv mvngpvnv? No nyi am mvvmado—no Pwknvyarnvnyi mvvdu!”

Okv so lvgabv, ngo nonua mindunv, oguguka ho nyi vdwa mvmarima bvka. Bunua mvngchik toputo! Bunu ogugo rungdupadudw okv ridupadudw vv nyi mvngdungridung lokv ridubolo, vv nyeri kunvpv,
vbvritola vv Pwknvyarnv gvlokv aadubolo, nonuno bunua mvchinrichin nyomare. Nonuno chinsure atubongv Pwknvyarnvnyi rinyingriru bv padarminsu namnga!” Kvba mvnwng ngv Gamaliel gv minam am tvvtoku.
Bunu Apostol vdwa goklwk tvla, bunua svnyak patoku, okv bunua Jisu gv amin bv mingku madu kubv mintoku; okv vbvrikunamv bunua anyubv topu jitoku.

Okv aludwkibv Pwknvyarnvnaam lo okv nyi mvnwng gv naam lo bunu minsar sarbv dula okv alvnv yunying nga Jisu Kristo lvkwnglo gvvtam jitoku.
Ayungjvma nga, lvbwlaksu vdwv twngtv yaya toku, hoka Grik gaam minv Jius gola okv Jius jvjvgo bunu gvlo yalunggo dumisito. Grik minv Jius vdwv minyato ho bunugv hvngmi vdwv aludwkibv dvnamtvngnam ornam nga mvnglwk makv vto.

Vbvritola Darwknv Dowv Stipinnyi mvnglak moto vdwlo hv mirap tokudw, bunu ninyia larya yanyumato.

okv ninyia minto, ‘Noogv mooku isi okv vpinvriap vngyuto okv vnglinto ho mookulo nam ngo kaatamre.’

Vbvritola ngo nyi vdwgvlo vngbo jwngkadaka namgo doore ho bunu vdwv pakbu jvbv ririku, Okv Hokochingbv noogv singsit vdwv bunu vnglin riku ho diringmooku lokv okv nga kumriku so gwngda arwnglo.’

“Vdwlo Pwknvyarnv Abrahamnyi milv namv dw vv aanwk tokudw, Ijipt lo ngonugv nyi ngv twngtv yaya toku.

okv vdwlo ninyigv naam lokv ninyia agum lo topak tokudw, dvbv gv umvnyijar angv ninyia laato okv ninyia atugv kuunyilo gubv mvla ninyia sootv toku.

(Hv mvngnamv ninyigv atugv nyi vdwv mvngchin pvkunvpv Pwknvyarnv ninyia bunua linggv dukubv ritv dunv vla, vbvrilachin bunu vdwv oguka mvngchin mato)

“Vdwgo nonuno mvngkuk linyu madunv!” Stipin um mimbwng dvdvto. “Vdwgo nonugv haapokv chimadunv, vdwgo nonuno Pwknvyarnv gv doina rungji nyadunv! Nonuno nonugv abuapa vdwgv apia jvbv ridu; nonuka Darwknv Dowa naarwk mabv dvdvbv rikidu!
Nonugv abuapa vdwv nyijwk akoka mvjwk mvbit la rima nvngvre? Bunu Pwknvyarnv gv gindungpingko go, hogv klu kuchugv ninyigv darwkchongjornv Pakbu go aaji kunv nga mimpa jiyakunv om mvkito. Okv vjak nonu ninyia pyoktoku okv mvki toku.
Nonuno kunv Pwknvyarnv gv Pvbv nga nyidogindung gv laak loka naarwk sikunv—vbvrijvka nonuno vjaklodvbv um mingku lo tvvma duku!”

pamtv gv agum bv ninyia charlin nyato, okv ninyia vlwng ngv ornyato. Kaayatvrianv vdwv bunugv vji laklwk am Sol vnam yaapa gvlo kaachumtai yadubv orkum jito.

Okv Sol vkvgv gwngrw sinama alv nvgobv mvngtoku. O alulo Jerusalem gvrja lo alvmanv nyi vdwv mvdwmvku namv rirapto. Mvngjwngnv mvnwng ngv Judia mooku lola okv Samaria mookulo vngyakvngchak nyato, Apostol vdwv vmwngku.

Vbvritola Sol gvrja nga mvyakmvchak dubv gwngtoku; naam lo vngla, hv mvngjwngnv vdwa svdarlinto, anvnyimv jvka nyiga jvka okv bunua patwk lo tumlwk nyatoku.
Mvngjwngnv vdwv ogolo mooku mvnwng lo vngsik karpv kudw, mooku mvnwng lo vnggola doina mingkar nyatoku.

Achialvbv nyi vdwgvlo alvmanv dow achialvbv kapla linya toku, achialvgo nyi dwgwngnv okv lvpiknv ponya toku.
Vkvlvgvbv ho pamtv okaku achialvbv mvngpu nyatoku.

okv minto, “So jwkrw sum ngaka jila bvkv, vkvlvgabv ngoogv yvvnyika laakv lakpv ridw bunu Darwknv Dowa paadubv.”

Ngo kaanamv no achialv bv kabiutari yaya nvgo okv rimur gv patwk lo tumnamgo.”

“Vbvritola gudungto okv pamtv lo vngnyika ho hoka nam mimpare no ogugunyi risvdw.”

Vbvritola Sol gv japnamv tvvngam yaya toku, okv ninyi Jisu Messiah vla kaatam la mintoku ho Damaskas lo doonv Jius nyi vdwv ninyia yvvka mirwk sinyu matoku.

Joppa hoka ka Tabita vnam nyimv ako dooto, Hv mvngjwng nvgo. (Grik bv ninyigv amina Dorkas gobv minto, minam si “svdum ako”). Ninyigv singnam mvnwng nga alvnvgobv rito okv heemanv vdwa ridurto.

okv minto: ‘Kornelias! Pwknvyarnv noogv kumnam am tvvpato okv noogv nyi am jinamrungnama kaapa duku.

Hoka bunu Alvnv Yunying nga japtoku.

Okv gaam gamtv bv goktoku, “Noogv lvdubv dakdin chinchila daktokv!” Nyi angv pokdinpokrinla okv vngchar vngyarla vngrab toku.

Vkvlvgabv oogv Pwknvyarnv gv aya jikunam angu angusinv amin gv lokv atu atugv ridung lo ngonu risudosu tvka. Pwknvyarnv gv doin am ngonu mila jidubolo, ngonugv mvngjwng namgv lokv ngv ngonu minto laka.
